dialogue_en: I'm waiting, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: 早く来い　クラウド

dialogue_en:
Alright, then. Seein' as we've got the time,
wanna tell the rest of us about you and
your buddy Sephiroth?
dialogue_jp:
さーて　聞かせてもらおうか
おまえさんと　セフィロスの因縁をよ

dialogue_en: Sure...if Tifa doesn't mind.
dialogue_jp: ティファ　ぜんぶ話すぞ

dialogue_en:
Me?
Yeah, no problem. It's cool.
dialogue_jp: うん　私は大丈夫

dialogue_en: It all started five years ago. Was sixteen at the time.
dialogue_jp: ５年前　俺は１６歳だった

dialogue_en: There was hardly any work for SOLDIERs back then─and what little there was...was boring as hell. My heart wasn't in it.
dialogue_jp:
もう　ソルジャーにはあまり出番がなくて
あっても　気の乗らない任務が多かった

dialogue_en: Then, outta nowhere, the job of a lifetime came up.
dialogue_jp: そんな中　命令が下ったんだ

dialogue_en: A mission with Sephiroth.
dialogue_jp: 英雄セフィロスが一緒で……

dialogue_en: I couldn't believe my luck...
dialogue_jp: 俺は　はしゃいでいた

dialogue_en: It's really comin' down, huh?
dialogue_jp: すごい雨だな

dialogue_en: Hey, man. Feelin' any better?
dialogue_jp: おい　気分はどうだ？

dialogue_en: I'm good...
dialogue_jp: だいじょうぶ

dialogue_en: Sure don't look it.
dialogue_jp: つらそうだな

dialogue_en:
Wish I could help, but never been motion sick.
Sorry, man.
dialogue_jp:
俺　乗り物酔いなんて経験ないから
わからなくて

dialogue_en: Ready to do this?
dialogue_jp: 準備はオーケー？

dialogue_en: Yeah, you bet...
dialogue_jp: オーケー　オーケー

dialogue_en: Hey. Rein it in.
dialogue_jp: おい　落ち着け

dialogue_en: Sorry... No can do.
dialogue_jp: そんなの　無理

dialogue_en: Kids...
dialogue_jp: 子供か

dialogue_en: Say...
dialogue_jp: なあ

dialogue_en: I'd like to be briefed on the mission at some point.
dialogue_jp: そろそろ今回の仕事　教えてくれよ

dialogue_en:
'Cause if it's another one of those Turks gigs,
you can let me off right here.
dialogue_jp:
また　タークスみたいな仕事だったら
やってられないからな

dialogue_en: Really?
dialogue_jp: ほう？

dialogue_en: Finally make First, and what do they do? Call a cease-fire with Wutai, stealin' my shot at glory.
dialogue_jp:
せっかく１ｓｔになったのに
休戦協定で　戦争は事実上の終結

dialogue_en: I didn't join SOLDIER to be an errand boy.
dialogue_jp: 俺は　活躍の舞台を奪われたんだ

dialogue_en: I joined up so I could be a hero like you.
dialogue_jp: あんたみたいな　英雄になりたいのにさ

dialogue_en: Well, our mission is to survey a run-down reactor.
dialogue_jp: この任務は　老朽化した魔晄炉の調査

dialogue_en: Another one of those Turks gigs.
dialogue_jp: 残念ながら　タークス案件に近い

dialogue_en: Ugh, fine... Job's a job, I guess.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　いいや
仕事があるだけマシだな

dialogue_en: Where is it?
dialogue_jp: 現場は　どこ？

dialogue_en: Nibelheim.
dialogue_jp: ニブルヘイム

dialogue_en: Nibelheim? That's where I grew up.
dialogue_jp: ニブルヘイムは　俺の故郷だ

dialogue_en: Got some fiends at our twelve!
dialogue_jp: 進行方向に　モンスターです！

dialogue_en: Let's go.
dialogue_jp: 行くぞ

dialogue_en: You take one, I'll take the other.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　そっちはまかせる

dialogue_en: Wait in the truck.
dialogue_jp: 荷台で待ってろ

dialogue_en: No way! I got this!
dialogue_jp: イヤだ　やれる！

dialogue_en: He was in a different league from the rest of us.
dialogue_jp: セフィロスの強さは　別格だった

dialogue_en: Nibelheim... That's where they built the first reactor.
dialogue_jp:
ニブルヘイムといやあ
世界初の魔晄炉があるところだ

dialogue_en: Right?
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: うん……

dialogue_en: It all started in the fall.
dialogue_jp: ５年前の９月

dialogue_en:
Something was wrong with the reactor,
and the whole village was up in arms.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉の様子がおかしいって
大人たちが騒ぎ出して

dialogue_en: Talk of strange new monsters on the mountain only made things worse.
dialogue_jp:
見たことのなかったモンスターが
村の近くで目撃されて

dialogue_en: People were scared─desperate.
dialogue_jp: それが　はじまり

dialogue_en:
The villagers tried to take care of the monsters themselves, but it was no good.
Ended up calling Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
村は自警団を作ったが手に負えず
神羅に　事態の収拾を依頼した

dialogue_en: So the company sent help─best they had.
dialogue_jp: そこに派遣されたのが　俺たちだった

dialogue_en: Home sweet home, right?
dialogue_jp: 久しぶりの　故郷なんだろ？

dialogue_en: Tell me, how does it feel?
dialogue_jp: どんな気分がするものなんだ？

dialogue_en: I have no home, so I wouldn't know.
dialogue_jp: 俺には故郷がないから　わからないんだ

dialogue_en: You still got parents though, right?
dialogue_jp: えっと　両親は？

dialogue_en: A mother named Jenova.
dialogue_jp: 母の名は　ジェノバ

dialogue_en: She died shortly after I was born.
dialogue_jp: 俺を産んで　すぐに死んだ

dialogue_en: My father...
dialogue_jp: 父は――

dialogue_en: Whoa there!
dialogue_jp: ちょっと待て！

dialogue_en: "Jenova"? Like, from the Shinra Building?
dialogue_jp: ジェノバって　神羅ビルのあれか？

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Don't worry, I'm getting to that.
dialogue_jp: でも　あとで話す

dialogue_en: Why am I talking about this?
dialogue_jp: 俺は　なにを話してるんだ

dialogue_en: Come on. Let's go.
dialogue_jp: さあ　行こうか

dialogue_en: Hope I didn't keep you waiting!
dialogue_jp: お待ちしておりました！

dialogue_en: I'm Zander, the mayor here.
dialogue_jp: 私は　村長のゾンダー

dialogue_en: I wanted to greet you myself─to welcome you to our humble little town!
dialogue_jp:
しかし　なんとまあ
英雄セフィロスが来てくださるとは

dialogue_en: Please─if you'll follow me...
dialogue_jp: では　早速こちらへ

dialogue_en: Consider yourself off duty till sundown.
dialogue_jp: 日暮れまで　好きに過ごすといい

dialogue_en:
So, any friends here you wanna see?
Maybe a girlfriend?
dialogue_jp:
幼なじみとか　いないのか？
カワイイ女の子とかさ

dialogue_en: Speaking of which, I'll bet you're dying to hear about mine. Am I right?
dialogue_jp:
ってか　俺がいま
いっちばん好きな子の話聞く？

dialogue_en: "Backwater" is an understatement... Don't blame you for gettin' the hell outta here.
dialogue_jp:
しっかし　な～んにもない村だな
アンタ　出て正解

dialogue_en: They got anything worth eating?
dialogue_jp: 名物料理とか　あんのか？

dialogue_en: Uh, hey. We got a job to do, in case you forgot?
dialogue_jp: おい　あんまり遠くまで行くなよ

dialogue_en: C'mon, eyes on the prize, buddy. We ain't done here yet.
dialogue_jp:
おーい　任務を忘れたか？
村を離れるな

dialogue_en: Look at all this mud. It's never gonna come off.
dialogue_jp: 泥がすごいな　交代で落とそうぜ

dialogue_en: What a pain...
dialogue_jp: はあ　めんどくせえな……

dialogue_en: Oh, I'll be telling everyone how I welcomed the great Sephiroth to town till the day I die!
dialogue_jp:
いやはや　英雄を迎えられるなんて
死ぬまで自慢できるよ

dialogue_en: Do our village proud.
dialogue_jp: 明日は頼んだぞ

dialogue_en: Sephiroth's in there right now.
dialogue_jp: なかに　セフィロスがいるんだ

dialogue_en: Would kill for a shot of him...but I should prob'ly wait till later, huh?
dialogue_jp:
写真を撮りたいけど
そういう雰囲気じゃないよな

dialogue_en: Sephiroth's at the inn. I tried to sneak a shot of him, but my hands were shaking!
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスなら宿屋に行ったよ
圧倒されて　隠し撮りもできなかった

dialogue_en: You want me to take your photo?
dialogue_jp: きみも　撮ってほしいのかい？

dialogue_en: Sorry, but I can't afford to waste my film on, uh...who are you again?
dialogue_jp:
でも　無名だろ？
ここじゃフィルムも貴重でね　悪いね

dialogue_en: Mind asking Sephiroth to come out?
dialogue_jp: セフィロスに　取り次いでくれるのかい？

dialogue_en: Shinra's here, I see. Thank you for coming.
dialogue_jp: 神羅の方ですね　ご苦労さまです

dialogue_en: You're Shinra?
dialogue_jp: しんら～？

dialogue_en: Chinra?
dialogue_jp: ちんら～？

dialogue_en: Oh, whoops.
dialogue_jp: あら　ごめんなさい

dialogue_en: I didn't recognize you, Cloud. How you've grown.
dialogue_jp: クラウドくんだったのね　気づかなくって

dialogue_en: I must say, you look dashing in that uniform.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドくん
なかなか　たくましくなったわね

dialogue_en: You're so cool!
dialogue_jp: カッコイ～！

dialogue_en: You so cool!
dialogue_jp: カッキ～！

dialogue_en: You just... You look so different.
dialogue_jp: ほんと　見ちがえたわ

dialogue_en: You a SOLDIER?
dialogue_jp: ソルジャ？

dialogue_en: You a shoulder?
dialogue_jp: そるざ？

dialogue_en: Gonna beat those monsters?
dialogue_jp: モンスター　やっつけるの？

dialogue_en: Gonna be 'em?
dialogue_jp: つけるの？

dialogue_en: Then I stopped by my mom's─not that it matters.
dialogue_jp: 俺の実家だ　事件とは関係ない

dialogue_en: Sure it does! I know I wanna hear what happened.
dialogue_jp: でもよ　興味あるぜ

dialogue_en: Me too!
dialogue_jp: わたしも！

dialogue_en: Yeah... Go on.
dialogue_jp: うん　聞きたいな

dialogue_en: "Go on."
dialogue_jp: 実家について聞きたいな

dialogue_en: Ugh, fine.
dialogue_jp: やれやれ……

dialogue_en: I don't think so.
dialogue_jp: 話したくないんだ

dialogue_en: I don't think so.
dialogue_jp: 話したくないんだ

dialogue_en: My dad died when I was a kid, so after I left for Midgar, she was on her own.
dialogue_jp:
親父は　俺が子供の頃に死んだ
だから母さんは　ひとりで住んでいた

dialogue_en:
Was the first time we'd seen each other
in two years.
dialogue_jp: 顔を見たのは　ほとんど２年ぶりだった

dialogue_en: First time...and last.
dialogue_jp: あれが……最後になった

dialogue_en: I'll be right there!
dialogue_jp: クラウディア

dialogue_en: Cloud? Is that you!?
dialogue_jp: うそ　クラウドなの？

dialogue_en: Hey.
dialogue_jp: ただいま

dialogue_en: Welcome home!
dialogue_jp: おかえりなさい

dialogue_en: Come in!
dialogue_jp: どれどれ……

dialogue_en: Let me get a good look at you!
dialogue_jp: 晴れ姿　よ～く見せておくれ

dialogue_en:
My, my...
So that's what they've got you wearing, huh?
dialogue_jp: うんうん　ほれぼれするねぇ

dialogue_en: You SOLDIERs sure do clean up nice!
dialogue_jp: これが　ソルジャーさんの制服なのかい？

dialogue_en: I've never been so proud.
dialogue_jp: 本当に立派になってぇ

dialogue_en: The man you've become...
dialogue_jp: そんなんじゃ　あれだね

dialogue_en: Women must be hounding you day and night.
dialogue_jp: 女の子もほっとかないだろ？

dialogue_en: Not really.
dialogue_jp: べつに……

dialogue_en:
You know, there's all kinds of
temptations in the big city.
dialogue_jp: 都会には　いろいろ誘惑が多いんだろ？

dialogue_en: I'd feel a lot better if I knew you'd found a good girl─one who'd make sure you didn't get into trouble.
dialogue_jp:
ちゃんとした恋人がいれば
母さん　すこしは安心できるってもんだ

dialogue_en: I can take care of myself.
dialogue_jp: 俺は　だいじょうぶだよ

dialogue_en: An older, more mature girl that could keep you on the straight and narrow─and tell you when you're being a silly goose.
dialogue_jp:
あんたにはねぇ　ちょっとお姉さんで
あんたをグイグイ引っ張っていく

dialogue_en: That's the perfect type for you, I'd say.
dialogue_jp: そんな子が　ぴったりだと思うんだけどね

dialogue_en: They are feeding you properly, aren't they?
dialogue_jp: ちゃんと　ご飯は食べてるのかい？

dialogue_en: Oh! Cloud?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　クラウド

dialogue_en: But you know, Cloud...
dialogue_jp: でもねえ　クラウド

dialogue_en: Wouldn't you agree, Cloud?
dialogue_jp: そうだろ　クラウド？

dialogue_en: You're my son. Of course I'll always be─
dialogue_jp: 母さんはね　いつだってあんたの――

dialogue_en: Okay. That's enough.
dialogue_jp: もう　やめよう

dialogue_en: Sorry... We won't push you.
dialogue_jp: 話したくないなら　いいよ

dialogue_en: "Sorry... We won't push you."
dialogue_jp: 話したくないなら　いいよ

dialogue_en: On second thought...
dialogue_jp: いや　聞いてくれ

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: Huh? You went to my place?
dialogue_jp: 私のうちにも行ったの？

dialogue_en: "You went to my place?"
dialogue_jp: 私のうちにも行ったの？

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ
いや……

dialogue_en: I figured you might be there.
dialogue_jp: ティファが　いると思って

dialogue_en: You went into my room?
dialogue_jp: 私の部屋も？

dialogue_en: I did...
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: You went through my stuff!?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　それ　本当？

dialogue_en: "You went through my stuff!?"
dialogue_jp: タンスを開けたの？

dialogue_en: Yes.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: No, I was making a joke.
dialogue_jp: いや　冗談だ

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド……

dialogue_en: I know I shouldn't've...
dialogue_jp: あとには　ひけなかった

dialogue_en: You asshole!
dialogue_jp: 最低！

dialogue_en: If that's your idea of a joke, I'm not laughing.
dialogue_jp: そういう冗談　好きじゃないな

dialogue_en: Yeah, me neither.
dialogue_jp: うん　笑えない

dialogue_en: C'mon, Cloud. I know you're better than this.
dialogue_jp: 時代は変わったぜ　クラウド

dialogue_en: Did you actually play it?
dialogue_jp: ピアノ　ひいたの？

dialogue_en: "Did you actually play the piano?"
dialogue_jp: ピアノ　ひいたの？

dialogue_en: Thought about it, but no.
dialogue_jp: ひかなかった

dialogue_en: Went to town on it.
dialogue_jp: ひいた

dialogue_en: Thought about it, but no.
dialogue_jp: いや　ひかなかった

dialogue_en: Wow... Where'd you learn to do that?
dialogue_jp: ピアノ　ひけたんだね

dialogue_en: Hey! You gotta play for us sometime!
dialogue_jp: すごい　今度きかせてね

dialogue_en: Well, shit. You're a merc of many talents.
dialogue_jp: へえ　意外な特技だぜ

dialogue_en: You could've just left it alone, you know.
dialogue_jp: なんで　ひいたのかな

dialogue_en: Ugh... What were you even thinking?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　なにしてるの？

dialogue_en: Yeah, uh, don't quit your day job.
dialogue_jp: おまえにピアノは　似合わねえよ

dialogue_en: Remember my cat?
dialogue_jp: ネコ　飼ってたんだ

dialogue_en: Her name was...Fluffy, I think?
dialogue_jp: 名前は　マルだったな

dialogue_en: Yeah. She was always disappearing.
dialogue_jp: そう　よく家出する子でね

dialogue_en: And that day was no different...
dialogue_jp: あの日もいなくて……

dialogue_en: Wait a second. You two were neighbors?
dialogue_jp:
なんだよ　おまえら
お隣さんじゃねえか

dialogue_en: We were, but...it's not like we hung out that much.
dialogue_jp: そうだけど　あまり行き来はなかったよね

dialogue_en: We had our reasons.
dialogue_jp: 色々あったからな

dialogue_en:
"Our" reasons, huh?
Bet most of 'em had to do with you.
dialogue_jp: やらかしたな　クラウド

dialogue_en: So, how did it feel being back up there?
dialogue_jp: 給水塔　のぼったんだ

dialogue_en:
I don't know─nostalgic, I guess?
After two years away and all that.
dialogue_jp:
２年ぶりの故郷だったからな
やっぱり　懐かしかった

dialogue_en: Uh-huh...
dialogue_jp: そっか……

dialogue_en: You worked out with everyone?
dialogue_jp: 体操に参加してたの？

dialogue_en: Just for a bit.
dialogue_jp: なんとなく

dialogue_en: Could you keep up?
dialogue_jp: グラグラした？

dialogue_en: "Weak legs betray a weak mind." Heh... Takes me back.
dialogue_jp: 体の揺れは心の揺れ　懐かしいな

dialogue_en: Ah, hello there. All our rooms are reserved for you Shinra boys, so take your pick.
dialogue_jp:
いらっしゃい
本日は　神羅カンパニーさんの貸し切りですよ

dialogue_en: You'll find 'em just up─
dialogue_jp: ２階の部屋を……

dialogue_en: No... Cloud!?
dialogue_jp: クラウドちゃんなの？

dialogue_en: My my, get a load of you! And you've only been away a couple of years!
dialogue_jp:
２年ぶりじゃない？
なんだか　立派になっちゃって

dialogue_en: Traveling with the Sephiroth now? Okay, Mr. Big Shot!
dialogue_jp: 英雄セフィロスといっしょなんて　大出世だねえ

dialogue_en: Welcome back! Sephiroth's already gone upstairs.
dialogue_jp:
あら　おかえり
セフィロスさんも　お戻りだよ

dialogue_en: Hm... A SOLDIER.
dialogue_jp: 神羅のソルジャーだな

dialogue_en: And you are?
dialogue_jp: あんたは？

dialogue_en: Rashard Zangan.
dialogue_jp: 私は　ザンガン

dialogue_en: A humble traveler of the world, and teacher of martial arts to the youth.
dialogue_jp:
子供たちに武術を教えながら
東へ西へ　あちこち旅をしている

dialogue_en: Well-toned, but lacking mass. You need to bulk up.
dialogue_jp:
しなやかだが　まだまだ細いな
もっと食べなさい

dialogue_en: Who asked you?
dialogue_jp: ほっといてくれ

dialogue_en: You could learn a lot from me.
dialogue_jp: きみも　弟子にならんか？

dialogue_en: Pass.
dialogue_jp: いやだ

dialogue_en: Don't be shy. I have many pupils your age.
dialogue_jp: きみと同世代の弟子が　大勢いるぞ

dialogue_en: At last count...one hundred and twenty-eight.
dialogue_jp: その数　１２８人！

dialogue_en: In fact, one of them's from this very village.
dialogue_jp:
この村では　ティファという子に
稽古をつけている

dialogue_en: Perhaps you know her? Tifa.
dialogue_jp: 知っているかな　ティファ

dialogue_en: Sure.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: A real talent, that one. She'll go far.
dialogue_jp: あの子はセンスがいい　強くなるぞ

dialogue_en: Yeah right.
dialogue_jp: まさか

dialogue_en: "Yeah right"?
dialogue_jp: まさか？

dialogue_en: Got anything to say for yourself?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　見る目ないね

dialogue_en: I didn't know!
dialogue_jp: ５年前だぞ？

dialogue_en:
I'd be interested to see
how one of Shinra's finest fights.
dialogue_jp: 神羅流の戦いぶり　しっかり見せてもらうよ

dialogue_en: Should you need my help, just say the word.
dialogue_jp: なにか手伝えることがあったら　言ってくれ

dialogue_en: I've been working on some new techniques.
dialogue_jp: 新しい型を模索していてね

dialogue_en: Haha! I need but one look, people of Nibelheim, to see that you lead happy, healthy lives.
dialogue_jp:
ははは　ニブルヘイムのみなさん！
日々健康に向かって励んでおるかな？

dialogue_en: As the creator of Zanga-cise, I couldn't be more proud. And you should be too, considering the strides you've made.
dialogue_jp:
私　ローシャ・ザンガンが編み出した
長生き体操のできばえ
しかと　見せてもらった

dialogue_en: Yet ours is a never-ending journey of self-improvment. We must press on!
dialogue_jp:
その調子で大いに人生を謳歌し
みなで長生きしようではありませんか！

dialogue_en: So allow me─Rashard Zangan─to lead you all today.
dialogue_jp:
では　ここからは
私が　じかに指導しましょう！

dialogue_en: Alright then! Let's get started!
dialogue_jp: さあ　みなさん準備はいいですか！

dialogue_en: And where better to begin than with pose one: the Seraph. Are...you...
dialogue_jp:
ザンガン流長生き体操
第１の型　よーい！

dialogue_en: ready!?
dialogue_jp: はじめ！

dialogue_en: Lift your arms straight up and reach for the sky!
dialogue_jp: 両手の指先を天に向かって突き出して！

dialogue_en: Press your arms to your ears...and show me your palms.
dialogue_jp: 腕は耳につけて　手のひらは前へ

dialogue_en: Keep those fingers straight─all the way to their tips.
dialogue_jp: まっすぐ　指先までピンと伸ばして！

dialogue_en: Now picture an angel descending from the heavens. Imagine her reaching down and gently clasping both your wrists.
dialogue_jp:
空から天の使いが舞い降りて
あなたの手首をつかみますぞ

dialogue_en: Feel her lifting you higher and higher...
dialogue_jp: そして　あなたは宙に浮く

dialogue_en: as you stretch...and stretch!
dialogue_jp: そんな気持ちで体を伸ばして！

dialogue_en: That's right. Just a little further... You can almost touch the clouds!
dialogue_jp: はい　伸びきったらそのまま背伸び！

dialogue_en: She's got you on your tiptoes. The stars are in reach!
dialogue_jp: 足の甲まで意識して　ピーン！

dialogue_en: Hnnn...whewww... Slow breaths now. And after counting to ten...shake, shake, shake it all out.
dialogue_jp:
ふーーはーー　ゆっくり呼吸
１０数えたら脱力～！

dialogue_en: Moving on!
dialogue_jp: では　次！

dialogue_en: Pose two: the Stone Bird. Ready? Let's...
dialogue_jp:
ザンガン流長生き体操
第２の型　よーい！

dialogue_en: Zanga!
dialogue_jp: はじめ！

dialogue_en: Lift both hands straight up... Arms to your ears.
dialogue_jp: 両手を上へ　腕は耳につけて！

dialogue_en: Just like that. Keep those palms facing me! Now bend your right knee...and lift it...
dialogue_jp:
そう　手のひらは前！
そのまま右の膝を曲げながらあげていく

dialogue_en: Focus on your core, now. Don't let your legs do all the work.
dialogue_jp: 足ではなく　体の内側の筋肉であげる

dialogue_en: Extend your foot... Like the heron in the river poised to take a step.
dialogue_jp:
つま先を伸ばして
湖に立つ鳥のように優雅に

dialogue_en: Hold it there... Become as immutable as a statue!
dialogue_jp: そこで不動　石像のように凜と立つ！

dialogue_en: Don't forget to breathe. First, breathe out...and in...
dialogue_jp:
呼吸は止めない
ゆっくり　吐いて～吸って～

dialogue_en: And now...your wings have returned.
dialogue_jp: いざ　石像は羽ばたく！

dialogue_en: Beat them with effortless grace. Take to the sky and fly into the sunset.
dialogue_jp:
空に浮かび上がり
遠くの街　村まで飛んでいく

dialogue_en: Remember: visualization is key to achieving results.
dialogue_jp: 良き想像力で　体を律して！

dialogue_en: Hnnn...hahhh... Count to ten...and shake, shake, shake...
dialogue_jp:
ふーーはーー
１０数えたら脱力～！

dialogue_en: You're doing well. Now let's finish strong!
dialogue_jp: さあ　最後の型　いきますぞ

dialogue_en: It's time to assume our final pose: the Scales of Justice. Let's...
dialogue_jp:
ザンガン流長生き体操
第３の型　よーい！

dialogue_en: Zanga!
dialogue_jp: はじめ！

dialogue_en: Arms in the air once more! Squeeze them tight against your ears!
dialogue_jp: 両手を上へ　腕は耳につける！

dialogue_en: Next, slowly lower and spread your arms wide...until they're parallel to the ground. Now bend your left knee and slowly lift your leg, while focusing on your thighs and core.
dialogue_jp:
続いて　腕をゆっくりと開いて
おろしながら　左の膝を曲げて
ももを腹の力であげていく！

dialogue_en: Keep those arms straight and balanced like a scale. Now stretch!
dialogue_jp:
両手は　天秤棒のように
まーっすぐ伸ばして～

dialogue_en: Now close your eyes...and feel the angel wings that have sprouted from your shoulder blades. Take to the sky with them and ride the wind!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　肩から天の使いの羽が生えてくる
あなたは宙に浮かび上がりますぞ

dialogue_en: Imagine flying to the house of a faraway friend.
dialogue_jp:
遠くのお友達に
会いに行くことを想像して

dialogue_en: Treat them to a hearty greeting. "Long time no see!"
dialogue_jp: ごぶさたしてますと挨拶しましょう

dialogue_en: And of course, remember to smile! ...Once you count to ten...shake, shake, shake it all out!
dialogue_jp:
はい　笑顔で　ふーーはーー
１０数えたら脱力～！

dialogue_en: Excellent work.
dialogue_jp: よーし　いいでしょう！

dialogue_en: Let's take a short break. The body needs time to recover from its adventures.
dialogue_jp: すこし休憩　しっかり休んでくだされ

dialogue_en: Okay! Once more─from the top!
dialogue_jp:
では　いいですか
もういちど！

dialogue_en: Would you care to join us?
dialogue_jp: きみも　やってみんか？

dialogue_en: Every pupil of mine must first master these stretches.
dialogue_jp: 弟子になりたいなら　まずは体操からだよ

dialogue_en: Work up a nice sweat?
dialogue_jp: いい汗かけたかい？

dialogue_en: The secret to a fruitful workout is a vivid imagination.
dialogue_jp: 良き想像をして　体を動かすのがコツだ

dialogue_en: Didn't really notice at the time...
dialogue_jp: あの時は気づかなかったけど

dialogue_en: But looking back, all the signs were there. From the moment we arrived, Sephiroth just wasn't himself.
dialogue_jp:
いまになって思えば　村に着いた時から
セフィロスの様子は変だったかもしれない

dialogue_en: Whatcha lookin' at?
dialogue_jp: なにを見ている？

dialogue_en: This landscape...
dialogue_jp: この風景

dialogue_en: I could swear I've seen it before.
dialogue_jp: 俺は　知ってるような気がする

dialogue_en: You okay?
dialogue_jp: セフィロス？

dialogue_en: Big day tomorrow. We'll be leaving bright and early.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄炉への出発は　明朝早くに決まった

dialogue_en: You should get some rest.
dialogue_jp: そろそろ　休んでおけ

dialogue_en: Alright. Will do.
dialogue_jp: ああ　そうする

dialogue_en: Night.
dialogue_jp: おやすみ

dialogue_en:
I tried, but I couldn't get to sleep that night.
Was too excited─too...nervous.
dialogue_jp:
その夜は　なかなか眠れなかった
緊張と不安と興奮

dialogue_en: Was pretty much the same for me...
dialogue_jp: じつは私も……

dialogue_en: Why?
dialogue_jp: どうして？

dialogue_en: Yeah...I was surprised too.
dialogue_jp: ティファには驚かされたな

dialogue_en: We leave once our guide arrives.
dialogue_jp: ガイドが来たら　出発だ

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: 了解！

dialogue_en:
Sephiroth, sir, I must insist that
I take you up the mountain.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロス　聞いてくれ
ガイドは　やっぱり私が行こう

dialogue_en: My daughter isn't─
dialogue_jp: いくら本人の――

dialogue_en: Dad!
dialogue_jp: パパ！

dialogue_en: Tifa...
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: You can still back out. You don't have to do this.
dialogue_jp: まだ間に合う　辞退しなさい

dialogue_en: I'm going, and that's that!
dialogue_jp: その話は　もうおしまい！

dialogue_en: There'll be two SOLDIERs with me. I'll be fine!
dialogue_jp:
つよ～いソルジャーが　ふたりもいるんだから
だいじょうぶ

dialogue_en: Pumpkin!
dialogue_jp: ティファ……

dialogue_en: Good morning, sir! I'll be your guide for the day.
dialogue_jp:
おはようございます
よろしくお願いしま～す

dialogue_en: Tifa!?
dialogue_jp: ティファ！

dialogue_en: You're our guide?
dialogue_jp: ティファが　ガイドなのか？

dialogue_en: I sure am!
dialogue_jp: そういうこと

dialogue_en:
You can ask anyone around here.
I'm the best there is.
dialogue_jp:
この村で　いちばんのガイドといえば
私のことでしょうね

dialogue_en: You could get hurt!
dialogue_jp: 危険すぎる

dialogue_en: Not if you remember to do your job, she won't.
dialogue_jp: おまえが守ってやれば　問題はなかろう

dialogue_en: Come on.
dialogue_jp: 行くぞ

dialogue_en: For, uh...posterity, sir?
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　記念に１枚！

dialogue_en: Not today.
dialogue_jp: 出発だ

dialogue_en: Can you talk to him?
dialogue_jp: ティファちゃ～ん

dialogue_en: Please, Sephiroth? It'd mean a lot to us.
dialogue_jp: セフィロスさん　お願いします

dialogue_en: It's just one photo.
dialogue_jp: 俺からも頼むよ

dialogue_en: C'mon, where's the harm in that?
dialogue_jp: 俺の顔　立ててくれよ

dialogue_en: There?
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: ありがと

dialogue_en: Say "Cheese!"
dialogue_jp: 撮りまーす！

dialogue_en: Later!
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: Sounds like you were havin' a good time.
dialogue_jp: ずいぶん　楽しそうじゃねえか

dialogue_en: Yeah... I guess we were. For a while.
dialogue_jp: そうだね……うん　この時はね

dialogue_en: The reactor was halfway up Mt. Nibel.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄炉は　ニブル山の中腹にある

dialogue_en: I was looking forward to breathing that crisp, clean mountain air again.
dialogue_jp: 寒々とした山の空気が　懐かしかった

dialogue_en: You prob'ly already know this, but our reactor's the first of its kind. It really put Mt. Nibel on the map.
dialogue_jp:
ニブル山は　最初の魔晄炉が建てられた場所として
その頃は有名だったそうです

dialogue_en: I've seen a few reactors in my time, but none with such a breathtaking view.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉がある土地は　どこも似たような風景だが
ここは独特だな

dialogue_en: Who could tire of it?
dialogue_jp: 見ていて飽きない

dialogue_en: Everyone, eventually.
dialogue_jp: 毎日だと飽きるよ

dialogue_en:
Man, I wish I could go on trips
all over the world like you guys...
dialogue_jp:
いいな～
ソルジャーは　いろんなところに旅ができて

dialogue_en: "Trips"?
dialogue_jp: 旅か

dialogue_en:
I think you mean "business trips"─
which are no fun at all.
dialogue_jp: そんないいものじゃない　ただの移動だ

dialogue_en: Though you do learn stuff on 'em.
dialogue_jp: でも　刺激的ではある

dialogue_en: That's so cool.
dialogue_jp: いいな～

dialogue_en: Everything okay? Not goin' too fast for you, am I?
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫？　ついてきてる？

dialogue_en: 'Course not. We're just tryin' to pace ourselves is all.
dialogue_jp:
当たり前だ
ティファこそ　先に行きすぎ

dialogue_en: But I thought you guys were in a hurry.
dialogue_jp: だって　急ぐんでしょ？

dialogue_en: Even so─you'll burn yourself out runnin' like that.
dialogue_jp: そうだけど　無理しなくていいよ

dialogue_en: I'm not even close to burned out.
dialogue_jp: 無理なんかしてませんよ～

dialogue_en: Not with all the training I've had.
dialogue_jp: 私　鍛えてますから

dialogue_en: Huh. Guess you really are "the best there is."
dialogue_jp: へえ　そりゃ頼もしいな

dialogue_en: Shh!
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: Seen those near the village, and they're not nice.
dialogue_jp: 最近は　村の近くにも出るようになったの

dialogue_en: Whaddya think?
dialogue_jp: どうしよう

dialogue_en: I think I got this.
dialogue_jp: 俺の出番だな

dialogue_en: Then they're all yours.
dialogue_jp: よし　まかせよう

dialogue_en: Copy that!
dialogue_jp: 了解！

dialogue_en: That was awesome!
dialogue_jp: すごーい！

dialogue_en: You think?
dialogue_jp: まあな

dialogue_en: If this is how it's going to be, there doesn't seem much point in me fighting.
dialogue_jp:
この辺りのモンスターは
おまえだけで　対応できそうだな

dialogue_en: I...guess not! You leave it all to me, huh?
dialogue_jp:
ああ　そんな感じだな
セフィロス　休んでなよ

dialogue_en: Don't mind if I do.
dialogue_jp: そうさせてもらおう

dialogue_en: Not again!
dialogue_jp: また出た！

dialogue_en: You're up!
dialogue_jp: よろしく！

dialogue_en: You know what to do, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　お願い！

dialogue_en: Take it away!
dialogue_jp: まかせるね！

dialogue_en: Heads up.
dialogue_jp: きたぞ

dialogue_en: Hostiles.
dialogue_jp: 出番だ

dialogue_en: Off you go.
dialogue_jp: いけるな？

dialogue_en: All yours.
dialogue_jp: まかせる

dialogue_en: No you don't.
dialogue_jp: どこへ行く？

dialogue_en: Fight's not over yet!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　お願い！

dialogue_en: Whoa!
dialogue_jp: おわっと！

dialogue_en: Is that mako...?
dialogue_jp: 魔晄か？

dialogue_en:
Come on, SOLDIER.
You can do better than that, can't you?
dialogue_jp: ほら　ボーッとしないで　ソルジャーさん

dialogue_en: Just you watch.
dialogue_jp: あとはまかせろ！

dialogue_en: Well done, trooper.
dialogue_jp: よくやった

dialogue_en: Thank you!
dialogue_jp: ありがとう

dialogue_en: I got the rest.
dialogue_jp: さがってな

dialogue_en: We still have a long way to go.
dialogue_jp: 先は　長そうだな

dialogue_en: Shall we pick up the pace?
dialogue_jp: 走れば　すぐだ

dialogue_en:
Not unless we absolutely have to.
Our guide might not be so lucky next time.
dialogue_jp:
予想よりもモンスターが多い
急げば　守りが疎かになる

dialogue_en:
Then...how 'bout I go on ahead
and clear the way for you guys?
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　俺が先に行って
モンスターを掃除しておくよ

dialogue_en: I'll be careful.
dialogue_jp: へーき　へーき

dialogue_en: You'd better.
dialogue_jp: まかせる

dialogue_en: Cool. See ya at the reactor.
dialogue_jp: そんじゃあ　上で合流な

dialogue_en: Hey! Not that way!
dialogue_jp: お～い　そっちじゃないよ

dialogue_en:
It's a dead end.
Rockslide took out the bridge a while ago.
dialogue_jp:
そっちは行き止まりなの
落石で　橋が崩れちゃって

dialogue_en: Come on back, okay?
dialogue_jp: だから　戻ってきて

dialogue_en: Okay!
dialogue_jp: りょーかい

dialogue_en: This way.
dialogue_jp: こっち

dialogue_en: Gotta make a detour through a Shinra facility.
dialogue_jp: この先にある　神羅の土地を抜けるの

dialogue_en: To think I almost made you our guide.
dialogue_jp: おまえがいるから　ガイドは不要

dialogue_en: Good thing I reconsidered. Otherwise, you'd have led us straight off a cliff.
dialogue_jp:
最初はそう言って断ったが
考え直して　正解だったようだ

dialogue_en: Lead on.
dialogue_jp: 頼むぞ

dialogue_en: Yes!
dialogue_jp: よし！

dialogue_en: The reactor may have been around for a while, but there are still pockets of mako gas all over the mountain.
dialogue_jp:
天然の魔晄ガスだ
この山は　今でも魔晄が豊富らしい

dialogue_en: Try not to breathe it in if you can.
dialogue_jp: 危険だから　吸いすぎるなよ

dialogue_en: Don't wanna get mako poisoning.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄中毒は　ゴメンだもんな

dialogue_en:
Elevator access restricted due to
mako gas concentrations.
dialogue_jp:
高濃度魔晄ガスを感知
ただいまリフトをロックしています

dialogue_en:
Air purification unit must be employed
to clear excess mako gas.
dialogue_jp:
空気清浄装置を移動して
周囲の魔晄ガスを除去してください

dialogue_en: Mako gas levels reduced by 20%.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄ガスが２０％除去されました

dialogue_en: Mako gas levels reduced by 50%.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄ガスが５０％除去されました

dialogue_en: Mako gas levels reduced by 70%.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄ガスが７０％除去されました

dialogue_en: No mako gas detected. Elevator access granted.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄ガスの除去を確認しました
ロックを解除します

dialogue_en: Systems nominal. Elevator in operation.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄濃度　正常
リフト稼働中です

dialogue_en: C'mon.
dialogue_jp: 行こう

dialogue_en: Just thinking about crossing that thing...
dialogue_jp: ここ　緊張しちゃうんだ

dialogue_en: Then lemme go first!
dialogue_jp: いっきに抜ければいい

dialogue_en: Hey! I'm the guide here!
dialogue_jp: ガイドは私！

dialogue_en: Tifa! Are you okay!?
dialogue_jp: ティファ　大丈夫か！

dialogue_en: Not really!
dialogue_jp: クラウド！

dialogue_en: What are you─
dialogue_jp: おい！

dialogue_en: Help!
dialogue_jp: 助けてくれ！

dialogue_en: He's in fate's hands now.
dialogue_jp: あいつの運に期待しよう

dialogue_en: Do you know the way?
dialogue_jp: 案内はできるか

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: Following the river should get us back to the village.
dialogue_jp: 川沿いを下流に行けば　村です

dialogue_en:
We're not going to the village.
Can you get us to the reactor?
dialogue_jp:
俺たちには　任務がある
魔晄炉まで行けるか？

dialogue_en: Sorry, I...I don't think I can.
dialogue_jp: ごめんなさい　わかりません

dialogue_en: I see...
dialogue_jp: そうか

dialogue_en:
Well, we certainly can't send you back alone.
You'll be safer with us.
dialogue_jp:
だが　ひとりで帰すわけにはいかない
一緒に来てもらおう

dialogue_en: Okay.
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: I'll be joining you up front this time.
dialogue_jp: ここからは　俺も前に出る

dialogue_en: For your performance review.
dialogue_jp: 隣で　見せてもらうぞ

dialogue_en: You kidding me!?
dialogue_jp: 査定？

dialogue_en: Good luck.
dialogue_jp: さあな

dialogue_en: Ugh... More mako gas ahead.
dialogue_jp: ここも魔晄ガス！

dialogue_en:
There's no way around it, either.
Just have to go through.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　濃いな
くれぐれも気をつけろ

dialogue_en:
Let's not waste any time.
Mako this thick is dangerous.
dialogue_jp:
早めに抜けるぞ
濃すぎる魔晄は危険だ

dialogue_en: A mako spring.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄の泉だ

dialogue_en: It's beautiful.
dialogue_jp: きれいだな

dialogue_en: Yeah, but if we keep using mako to power our homes, springs like this will disappear, right?
dialogue_jp:
でも　魔晄エネルギーを使い続けたら
この泉は　なくなっちゃうんだよね

dialogue_en: What're you talking about? Who told you that?
dialogue_jp: 誰だよ　そんなこと言ってるの

dialogue_en: My dad.
dialogue_jp: パパ

dialogue_en: And the mayor, if you must know.
dialogue_jp: あと　村長も言ってるよ

dialogue_en: 'Cept the planet's huge. Mako will never run out.
dialogue_jp: 星は大きく　魔晄は無限！

dialogue_en: Right?
dialogue_jp: なあ？

dialogue_en: Naturally formed materia.
dialogue_jp: 天然のマテリアだ

dialogue_en: And look at the size of it. Astounding.
dialogue_jp: マテリアは　魔晄エネルギーが凝縮されたもの

dialogue_en:
For the mako energy to condense into something
like this, it must have taken an eternity.
dialogue_jp:
自然の状態で　ここまでになるには
いったい　どれほどの時間が掛かることか

dialogue_en: I've always wondered: how does materia let you cast spells exactly?
dialogue_jp:
なあ　マテリアがあると
どうして　魔法を使えるんだ？

dialogue_en: How did you ever get to be a SOLDIER?
dialogue_jp: おまえは　本当にソルジャーなのか？

dialogue_en: To put it simply, the knowledge of the Ancients is sealed within each orb.
dialogue_jp:
マテリアの中には
古代種の知識が封じこめられている

dialogue_en: That knowledge not only connects us to the planet...
dialogue_jp: 星の力を自在に操る知識

dialogue_en: it allows us to tap into her power. That's how we can use magic, or so they say.
dialogue_jp:
その知識が星と我々を結び　魔法を呼び出す
と言われている

dialogue_en: Really...?
dialogue_jp: 魔法……

dialogue_en: Magic sure is weird.
dialogue_jp: 不思議な力だな

dialogue_en:
I know someone who'd be livid to hear you call it "weird"─or "magic," for that matter.
I can just imagine what he'd say.
dialogue_jp:
『不思議な力なんて　非科学的な言い方は許さん
　魔法なんて呼び方もダメだ』

dialogue_en: "It's an affront to science!"
dialogue_jp: そう言って　怒った男がいてな

dialogue_en: Who?
dialogue_jp: だれ？

dialogue_en:
Hojo from Research & Development.
His predecessor was a great man, but him?
dialogue_jp:
科学部門の宝条だ
偉大な科学者の仕事を引き継いだ凡人

dialogue_en: He is anything but.
dialogue_jp: 劣等感の塊だ

dialogue_en: We should press on.
dialogue_jp: さあ　行くぞ

dialogue_en:
Elevator access restricted due to
mako gas concentrations.
dialogue_jp:
高濃度魔晄ガスを感知
ただいまリフトをロックしています

dialogue_en:
Air purification unit must be employed
to clear excess mako gas.
dialogue_jp:
空気清浄装置を移動して
周囲の魔晄ガスを除去してください

dialogue_en: No mako gas detected. Elevator access granted.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄ガスの除去を確認しました
ロックを解除します

dialogue_en: Up ahead! Looks like a way out!
dialogue_jp: あれ見て　出口かな？

dialogue_en: Wait.
dialogue_jp: 待て

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: なんだ？

dialogue_en: Get back.
dialogue_jp: さがれ！

dialogue_en: This way!
dialogue_jp: あっちへ

dialogue_en: You said you wanted to be a hero.
dialogue_jp: おまえ好みの展開だな

dialogue_en: Wish I hadn't.
dialogue_jp: そうでもない

dialogue_en: On me.
dialogue_jp: 合わせろ

dialogue_en: Done?
dialogue_jp: 終わりか？

dialogue_en: Sephiroth!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス！

dialogue_en: You're practically panting.
dialogue_jp: 息があがっているな

dialogue_en: I'm excited.
dialogue_jp: 楽しくてね

dialogue_en: Such a puppy.
dialogue_jp: 子犬か

dialogue_en: Got ya.
dialogue_jp: よし！

dialogue_en: Take it from here.
dialogue_jp: あとはまかせる

dialogue_en: Nice work.
dialogue_jp: よくやった

dialogue_en: Okay, hold up...
dialogue_jp: おいおい　待てよ

dialogue_en: Maybe I'm missin' somethin' here...
dialogue_jp: さっきから聞いてればよ

dialogue_en:
but everything you've said makes Sephiroth
sound like a stand-up guy.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスは　ずいぶんとご立派で
いいヤツに聞こえるじゃねえか

dialogue_en: Well...he was.
dialogue_jp: 実際　そのとおりだった

dialogue_en:
And now he's pure evil─
tryin' to kill everyone on the planet.
dialogue_jp: 星の敵じゃねえか　悪のカタマリだろうが！

dialogue_en: Help me to understand this shit. Tell me something that'll really make my blood boil!
dialogue_jp:
もっと　憎くて憎くて
怒りが爆発しそうな話をくれよ

dialogue_en: Oh, I will. I will...
dialogue_jp: ああ　そうだな

dialogue_en: You wait out here, Tifa.
dialogue_jp: ティファは　ここにいてくれ

dialogue_en: No way!
dialogue_jp: そんなぁ

dialogue_en: I wanna go too! Please?
dialogue_jp: 私も中へ行く　見たい！

dialogue_en: Sorry, no civilians─even if we weren't on a mission.
dialogue_jp: 一般人立ち入り禁止だ　今日は特にな

dialogue_en: Come on!
dialogue_jp: でも～！

dialogue_en: Keep the young lady safe.
dialogue_jp: おじょうさんを　守ってやりな

dialogue_en: Carry on.
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: Awww!
dialogue_jp: もうっ！

dialogue_en: You better keep me safe.
dialogue_jp: しっかり守ってね

dialogue_en: I really wanted to see the reactor...
dialogue_jp: 魔晄炉　見たかったな

dialogue_en: Would it kill this guy to say something?
dialogue_jp: この人　ぜんぜん話してくれないんですけど

dialogue_en: Didn't expect it to be "all systems go."
dialogue_jp: ここ　普通に稼働中だよな？

dialogue_en:
You'd think it'd be running at reduced output,
like most last-gen models.
dialogue_jp:
地方の旧式魔晄炉は
低率運用に切り替えたはずだが

dialogue_en:
And lemme guess─villagers
don't have a clue about this?
dialogue_jp: 村の人たち　稼働中だってこと知らないよな

dialogue_en: Knowing Shinra? Of course not.
dialogue_jp: 神羅らしいやり方だ

dialogue_en: The company really needs to be more transparent.
dialogue_jp: そういうところ　直したほうがいいのに

dialogue_en: Tell that to the president.
dialogue_jp: プレジデントに言ってやれ

dialogue_en: What exactly is the problem with this place?
dialogue_jp: 異常動作って　なんだと思う？

dialogue_en: The people in charge. While most reactors are under the jurisdiction of Urban Planning, this one is overseen by R&D.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉は本来　都市開発部門の管轄だが
ここは科学部門に貸し出されている

dialogue_en:
Huh. Why do I suddenly have
a bad feeling about this?
dialogue_jp: すごくイヤな予感がする

dialogue_en: Whatever you see here, you're not to speak of it.
dialogue_jp: ここで見たことは　他言無用だ

dialogue_en: Oh, I won't.
dialogue_jp: わかってるよ

dialogue_en: Shh...
dialogue_jp: セフィロス

dialogue_en:
Perhaps you'd like to say a few words
to your sword first?
dialogue_jp: 剣に祈るなら　いまのうちだ

dialogue_en: Hojo, you are really something.
dialogue_jp: 宝条め　やったな

dialogue_en: What are those things?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　ここ……

dialogue_en: "Jenova"?
dialogue_jp: 『ジェノバ』？

dialogue_en: Wasn't that...
dialogue_jp: ジェノバって……

dialogue_en:
The malfunction must be forcing
the pods to depressurize.
dialogue_jp: ポッドから漏れ続けるエアが　異常動作の原因だ

dialogue_en: Cloud. Go out and shut off the valve.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　外のバルブを閉じてこい

dialogue_en: Copy.
dialogue_jp: 了解

dialogue_en: Huh?
dialogue_jp: えっ？

dialogue_en: What're you doing!?
dialogue_jp: セフィロス？

dialogue_en:
These pods were built for the production
of artificial materia.
dialogue_jp: ここにあるのは　人工マテリアの生成装置だ

dialogue_en:
But Hojo repurposed them as incubators─
cages for animals─infused with mako.
dialogue_jp:
だが　宝条はこの中に動物を入れ
魔晄とともに凝縮した

dialogue_en: All to birth a new breed of monster.
dialogue_jp: それが　新種のモンスターの正体だ

dialogue_en:
But he didn't stop at animals...oh no.
There were other subjects.
dialogue_jp:
そして　宝条が装置に入れたのは
動物だけではない

dialogue_en: Look.
dialogue_jp: 中を見ろ

dialogue_en: My mother's name was Jenova.
dialogue_jp: 母の名は　ジェノバ

dialogue_en: Could it be...that I...
dialogue_jp: まさか　俺も？

dialogue_en: was created the same way?
dialogue_jp: 俺は　こうして生み出されたのか？

dialogue_en: Am I the same as these monsters?
dialogue_jp: 俺は　モンスターと同じだというのか

dialogue_en: Sephiroth...
dialogue_jp: セフィロス……

dialogue_en: Ever since I was a child, I knew...
dialogue_jp: 子供の頃から　俺は感じていた

dialogue_en: I knew that I was different. That I...was special.
dialogue_jp:
俺は　他のやつらとは違う
俺は特別な存在なんだと思っていた

dialogue_en: But not like this.
dialogue_jp: しかし　それは……

dialogue_en: Not like this.
dialogue_jp: それは　こんな意味じゃない

dialogue_en: Am I even...human?
dialogue_jp: 俺は　人間なのか？

dialogue_en: Eventually, we went back to the inn.
dialogue_jp: そして　俺たちは村へ戻った

dialogue_en:
But when we got there...
Sephiroth locked himself in his room.
dialogue_jp: でも　セフィロスは部屋にこもってしまった

dialogue_en: The mayor had been looking forward to having dinner with "bona fide SOLDIERs," so he didn't take the news too well.
dialogue_jp:
その夜はね　ソルジャーたちと食事会だって
村長が楽しみにしてたの

dialogue_en:
Dad had to put up with his bellyaching
for hours afterward.
dialogue_jp: それが中止になったから　パパにぐちぐち言ってた

dialogue_en:
Musta sucked, but what about Sephiroth?
What happened to him?
dialogue_jp:
んなことより　セフィロスは？
そのあと　どうした

dialogue_en: He left. Didn't tell a soul where he was going.
dialogue_jp: 夜のうちに　宿から姿を消した

dialogue_en:
Hm? Sephiroth?
Ah, I did see him leave a little while ago.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロス？
彼なら　すこし前に外へ出ていったな

dialogue_en: Don't know what bee got in his bonnet, but the man was not in a good mood.
dialogue_jp:
なにやら　深刻な様子だな
手伝うことがあれば言ってくれ

dialogue_en: Looking for Sephiroth? He just left, I'm afraid... Maybe he needed some fresh air?
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスさんなら　ついさっき出ていったよ
お散歩かしら

dialogue_en: So, how was the reactor? Did you find out what was wrong with it?
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉の調査はどうだったの？
原因はわかった？

dialogue_en: I met Sephiroth as he was heading for Shinra Manor, and he acted like I wasn't even there.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスが　神羅屋敷のほうへ行ったぞ
声をかけたのに無視してな

dialogue_en: "Busy," I suppose.
dialogue_jp: 無礼にもほどがある

dialogue_en: Haven't heard anything about the reactor either. What happened up there anyway?
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉の報告もまだだ
いったい　どうなってる

dialogue_en: I saw Sephiroth making a beeline for the manor. Wonder why.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスが神羅屋敷に入っていったんだけど
なにかあったの？

dialogue_en: While I got you: any chance you could convince him to autograph that photo I took?
dialogue_jp:
なあ　写真を現像したら
セフィロスのサインをもらってくれないか

dialogue_en:
Shinra Manor was the biggest building in town.
And older than the reactor.
dialogue_jp:
神羅屋敷は　村でいちばん大きな建物で
魔晄炉より古くからあるの

dialogue_en: The company used to conduct research there, back when they were still a small manufacturer.
dialogue_jp:
神羅カンパニーが　まだ小さかった頃の
研究施設だったんだって

dialogue_en: Even so, the rent on that plot was basically what kept the village afloat.
dialogue_jp: その地代が　村の重要な収入だったみたい

dialogue_en: Took a look around the place...but Sephiroth was nowhere to be seen.
dialogue_jp:
屋敷の中を見てまわったけど
セフィロスの姿はなかった

dialogue_en: Never knew it had a basement.
dialogue_jp: 地下室があったんだね

dialogue_en:
Was news to me too.
Doubt anyone in the village had a clue.
dialogue_jp: ああ　俺もあの時まで知らなかった

dialogue_en:
Excavated from a 2,000-year-old rock layer.
A life-form in stasis.
dialogue_jp:
２０００年前の地層から見つかった
仮死状態の生物

dialogue_en: Professor Gast named this life-form "Jenova."
dialogue_jp: その生物を　ガスト博士は『ジェノバ』と命名した

dialogue_en: <>[μ]-εγλ 7/7/1977. Jenova verified as an Ancient.
dialogue_jp:
［μ］-εγλ　１９７７年７月７日
ジェノバを古代種と確認

dialogue_en: <>[μ]-εγλ 9/13/1977. Jenova Project approved.
dialogue_jp:
［μ］-εγλ　１９７７年９月１３日
ジェノバ・プロジェクト承認

dialogue_en: So...they named the life-form "Jenova."
dialogue_jp: その生物を　ジェノバと命名

dialogue_en: And once they understood what she was...
dialogue_jp: ジェノバを　古代種と確認

dialogue_en: they grew ambitious.
dialogue_jp: ジェノバ・プロジェクト承認

dialogue_en: Uh...
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: Hey, Sephiroth... Whatcha got there?
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　なにしてるんだ？

dialogue_en: Leave me be.
dialogue_jp: ひとりにしてくれ

dialogue_en:
And that was it.
He stayed holed up in the basement...
dialogue_jp:
それから　セフィロスは
地下室にこもりきりになって

dialogue_en: reading and reading...like a man possessed.
dialogue_jp: なにかに取り憑かれたみたいに　資料を読んでいた

dialogue_en: We got Jenova...
dialogue_jp: ジェノバ……

dialogue_en: A locked reactor door...
dialogue_jp: 魔晄炉の　開かずの扉

dialogue_en: The name of Sephiroth's mother...
dialogue_jp: セフィロスの　お母さんの名前

dialogue_en: And Ancients...
dialogue_jp: 古代種……

dialogue_en: Ah, screw it.
dialogue_jp: ああ　もう！

dialogue_en:
Racking my brain's not gonna get me anywhere.
May as well just ask the guy.
dialogue_jp:
考えてたって　仕方ないよな
セフィロスと話さなくちゃ

dialogue_en:
Ah, Cloud.
I've come across the most fascinating passage.
dialogue_jp:
なあ　クラウド
実に興味深い記録だ

dialogue_en: "The specimen, found in strata dating back two thousand years, smiled with what could only be described as 'ethereal grace.'
dialogue_jp:
『２０００年前の地層から発見されたその人は
　優美な微笑みをたたえているように見えた』

dialogue_en: "Though the truth eluded me at first, I later determined that she was an Ancient─or a 'steward of the planet,' as they are referred to in legend.
dialogue_jp:
『やがて私はその人こそが太古の時を生きたという
　伝説の古代種だと気づいたのだ』

dialogue_en: "She needed a name...and so I dubbed her 'Jenova.'"
dialogue_jp: 『私はその人をジェノバと命名した』

dialogue_en:
The Jenova Project was approved soon after─
a bold initiative to resurrect the long-dead Ancients.
dialogue_jp:
やがて　ジェノバ・プロジェクトが始まった
プロジェクトの目的は　古代種の再生

dialogue_en: An initiative...that resulted in my conception.
dialogue_jp: そして　俺が創り出された

dialogue_en: Or rather, my creation! The crowning glory of Professor Gast's wondrous experiment!
dialogue_jp:
ジェノバ・プロジェクトの責任者
天才科学者ガスト博士が　俺を創り出したんだ

dialogue_en: He created you?
dialogue_jp: 創り出したって……

dialogue_en: I should go. Mother is waiting.
dialogue_jp: 母に　会いに行く

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: 待て！

dialogue_en: Hey! Hold on!
dialogue_jp: 待てって　セフィロス！

dialogue_en: Sephiroth...
dialogue_jp: セフィロス……

dialogue_en:
I keep asking myself...
"Why couldn't I have come to sooner?"
dialogue_jp: あの時　俺が早く意識を取り戻していれば

dialogue_en: If I had...maybe I coulda saved the village.
dialogue_jp: もしそうだったら　村を守れたかもしれない

dialogue_en: Or...tried, at least.
dialogue_jp: いや　どうかな

dialogue_en: What!?
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: Hey, you!
dialogue_jp: おい　きみ！

dialogue_en: Get in there! The villagers need your help!
dialogue_jp: 動け　ひとりでも多く助けるんだ！

dialogue_en: Let me through! My son's still in there!
dialogue_jp: 息子が　息子がまだ中に！

dialogue_en: I'm sorry─he's gone!
dialogue_jp: 無茶だ　もう戻れない！

dialogue_en: Mom...
dialogue_jp: 母さん……

dialogue_en: Is it true? Sephiroth did this!?
dialogue_jp: 村長　本当にセフィロスさんが？

dialogue_en: Oh, it was him alright! And he's still here! So keep your eyes peeled!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　セフィロスがやったんだ！
きっとまだ近くにいる

dialogue_en: God...
dialogue_jp: そんな……

dialogue_en: Get your heads straight! I need you to secure the way out. Now!
dialogue_jp:
しっかりしろ！
おまえたちは　退路の確保だ

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: はっ……はい！

dialogue_en: "Sephiroth"?
dialogue_jp: セフィロス？

dialogue_en: But he... Why would he...?
dialogue_jp: そんな　まさか……

dialogue_en: Shit! Can't get close!
dialogue_jp: くそ　近づけない

dialogue_en: It's no use!
dialogue_jp: ここは無理だ

dialogue_en: Find another route!
dialogue_jp: ほかの道はないか！

dialogue_en: Hold on, Mom!
dialogue_jp: ほかの道を……

dialogue_en: I'm coming!
dialogue_jp: 母さん……

dialogue_en: Sephi...roth...
dialogue_jp: セフィ……

dialogue_en: Mo...
dialogue_jp: かあ……

dialogue_en: Is this...? Am I gonna...die?
dialogue_jp: なあ　俺　死んじゃうの……？

dialogue_en: Almost there...
dialogue_jp: ここを抜ければ……

dialogue_en: Please... Please be okay.
dialogue_jp: 母さん　無事でいてくれ

dialogue_en: Mom...
dialogue_jp: 母さん……

dialogue_en: Run, Cloud. Run away.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　走るんだ

dialogue_en: You have to leave... You have to live.
dialogue_jp: 逃げて　生き延びて……

dialogue_en: Hey... Hey!
dialogue_jp: おい……おい！

dialogue_en: Hang in there! You're gonna be okay!
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫か　しっかりしろ

dialogue_en: Don't worry. I got you.
dialogue_jp: よかった　無事か！

dialogue_en: C'mon, let's get you up.
dialogue_jp: いま運んでやるから

dialogue_en: Sephiroth...
dialogue_jp: セフィロス……

dialogue_en: Murderer... You...monster!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　これが英雄のやることか！

dialogue_en: There he is!
dialogue_jp: いたぞ

dialogue_en: Sephiroth!
dialogue_jp: 囲め！

dialogue_en: Stop!
dialogue_jp: 動くな

dialogue_en: You sick son of a bitch!
dialogue_jp: 貴様　なんてことを

dialogue_en: That's far enough!
dialogue_jp: そこから動くな！

dialogue_en: Drop the sword!
dialogue_jp: 刀を捨てろ！

dialogue_en: Wait for me... I'm coming.
dialogue_jp: いま　迎えにいくよ

dialogue_en: Sephiroth!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス！

dialogue_en: I followed Sephiroth all the way back to the reactor.
dialogue_jp: 俺はセフィロスを追って　魔晄炉へと向かった

dialogue_en: Dad and I had gone there to hide.
dialogue_jp: 私は　パパと避難してたの

dialogue_en:
When Sephiroth showed up, Dad decided that
he was going to confront him.
dialogue_jp:
でもパパは　セフィロスと話そうとして
追いかけて

dialogue_en: Dad...
dialogue_jp: パパ……

dialogue_en: It was Sephiroth, wasn't it? He did this, didn't he!?
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスね……
セフィロスがやったのね！

dialogue_en: Sephiroth... SOLDIERs...
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　ソルジャー……

dialogue_en: Mako... Shinra...
dialogue_jp: 魔晄炉　神羅……

dialogue_en: I'm sick of this!
dialogue_jp: ぜんぶ……

dialogue_en: I'm sick of all of this!
dialogue_jp: ぜんぶ　大キライ！

dialogue_en: Now, open the way for me.
dialogue_jp: この扉をあけておくれ

dialogue_en: Mother, I have come for you.
dialogue_jp: 母さん　会いに来たよ

dialogue_en: You murdered my dad... You burned my village!
dialogue_jp: よくもパパを　よくも村のみんなを！

dialogue_en:
You promised you'd save me...
if I was ever...trapped...or in trouble...
dialogue_jp:
ピンチの時には　来てくれるって
約束したのに……

dialogue_en: Here I am─your son.
dialogue_jp: 母さん　俺だよ

dialogue_en: Mother, together we will reclaim our world.
dialogue_jp: 母さん　一緒にこの星を取り戻そうよ

dialogue_en: And I know exactly how we can do that.
dialogue_jp: 俺　いいことを考えたんだ

dialogue_en: The promised land.
dialogue_jp: 約束の地へ行こう

dialogue_en: Sephiroth!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス！

dialogue_en: Mother, they have come again.
dialogue_jp: 母さん　またやつらが来たよ

dialogue_en: The ones who robbed you of the planet...your planet.
dialogue_jp: 母さんから　この星を奪ったあいつらが

dialogue_en:
But there's no need to be sad, Mother.
Because I'm here for you─now and forever.
dialogue_jp:
もう悲しまないで　母さん
これからは　俺が一緒だからね

dialogue_en: You killed my mom! You killed Tifa!
dialogue_jp: よくも母さんを　よくもティファを！

dialogue_en: My village─my home!
dialogue_jp: 村を　故郷を！

dialogue_en: They were mine by right.
dialogue_jp: 俺は　選ばれし者

dialogue_en: This planet too, for I have been chosen.
dialogue_jp: やがて　星の支配者となる

dialogue_en: I believed in you...
dialogue_jp: 信頼していたのに

dialogue_en: No.
dialogue_jp: いや……

dialogue_en: Not you─whoever the hell you are!
dialogue_jp:
おまえはもう　俺の知っている
セフィロスじゃない！

dialogue_en:
Uh, Cait? Meant to tell you before,
but the terminal's prob'ly gone.
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー
ニブルヘイムは　５年前に燃え落ちた

dialogue_en: Nibelheim burned down five years ago.
dialogue_jp: 端末が残っていても　使えるかどうか

dialogue_en: It did, aye... Not to worry, though. The terminal's as snug as a bug in a rug.
dialogue_jp:
５年前の事件のことは知っとります
でも　端末の心配なら無用ですわ

dialogue_en: 'Cause Shinra wasnae about to let that facility burn down.
dialogue_jp: あそこはいまでも　神羅の重要施設ですから

dialogue_en: Meaning the reactor?
dialogue_jp: 魔晄炉のことか？

dialogue_en: Well, that's important too─but no.
dialogue_jp: あ～　それもですが……

dialogue_en: I'm no expert on Nibelheim...
dialogue_jp: よく　わっかんないけどさ～

dialogue_en: but what I do know is that it's the only lead we have on that materia.
dialogue_jp:
端末で調べないかぎり
黒マテリアの場所　わかんないんでしょ？

dialogue_en: So...not much choice.
dialogue_jp: んじゃ　行くしかないじゃん

dialogue_en: Yeah. It's this or nothing. We should get going.
dialogue_jp: うん……そうだね　行ってみようよ

dialogue_en: Nibelheim's not far now.
dialogue_jp: この先が　ニブルヘイムだ

dialogue_en: First time back since...?
dialogue_jp: あれから　帰ってねえんだろ？

dialogue_en: Yup. First time.
dialogue_jp: ああ　５年ぶりだな

dialogue_en: Same here...
dialogue_jp: 私も……

dialogue_en: Didn't seem worth coming back till now. Didn't think there was anything to come back to.
dialogue_jp:
ぜんぶ　燃えちゃったって聞いたから
帰っても仕方ないだろうなって

dialogue_en: Sorry...
dialogue_jp: いいのか

dialogue_en: It's alright. Lot's happened since then.
dialogue_jp: あれから色々　ありましたから

dialogue_en: I'll see ya when I see ya!
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　またな～！

dialogue_en: Hey, Sephiroth! Wait up!
dialogue_jp: 待ってくれよ　セフィロス

dialogue_en: Bring me the black materia.
dialogue_jp: 俺は　黒マテリアが欲しい

dialogue_en: Wha─?
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: The black...materia...
dialogue_jp: くろ……まてりあ……

dialogue_en: You okay?
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫？

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en:
Looks like we're not the only ones
headed for Nibelheim.
dialogue_jp: この人も　ニブルヘイムに向かってるみたい

dialogue_en: Huh... Almost like they swung by Cosmo Canyon just so they could lead us here.
dialogue_jp:
コスモキャニオンの黒マントは
オイラたちを呼びに来たのかな？

dialogue_en: Sorry, just thinking out loud. Forget about it.
dialogue_jp: そう思っただけだよ　なんとなく

dialogue_en: Uh... Cloud? Stay close, would you?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　いっしょに行こう

dialogue_en: I honestly thought I was ready for this, but...
dialogue_jp: 想像したら　やっぱり怖くなっちゃって

dialogue_en: It's just...too real.
dialogue_jp: もうすぐだね

dialogue_en: No...
dialogue_jp: うそ……

dialogue_en: Wait...what? I thought...
dialogue_jp: どういうことだよ　こりゃあ

dialogue_en: Cloud, look at this.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　見て

dialogue_en: It's...
dialogue_jp: ほら

dialogue_en: It's...brand new.
dialogue_jp: これ　新しいよ

dialogue_en: They rebuilt the whole village.
dialogue_jp: 作り直したんだ　村ごと

dialogue_en:
Don't scare me like that.
Thought Cloud might've lost it ag─
dialogue_jp:
おどかすなよ
また　おかしくなったのかと──

dialogue_en:
I mean, I thought he got us lost.
'Cause it looks different.
dialogue_jp: いや　またっつーのも　アレだけどよ

dialogue_en: So...who do you think rebuilt it?
dialogue_jp: でも　誰がこんなことしたんだ？

dialogue_en: Shinra.
dialogue_jp: 神羅……

dialogue_en: Never mind all that─we've got a terminal to find!
dialogue_jp: さ～て　端末を探しましょ！

dialogue_en: Well, shit...
dialogue_jp: こりゃあ……

dialogue_en: Lotta robes out here...
dialogue_jp: 黒マントだらけだな

dialogue_en: Yeah. And look... "Locals."
dialogue_jp: うん　それに村の人たちも

dialogue_en: Only they aren't quite the same, are they?
dialogue_jp: 知らない人だよね

dialogue_en: Hello there. Can I help you?
dialogue_jp: この村に　なにかご用ですか？

dialogue_en: Greetings, good sir!
dialogue_jp: ど～も　ど～も！

dialogue_en: I am a proud employee of Shinra Resorts.
dialogue_jp: ボク　神羅リゾートの社員です

dialogue_en: And since I was nearby, I thought I might pop in and check something on the company database.
dialogue_jp:
神羅のネットワーク端末をお借りしたくて
ちょっと寄らしてもろたんですわ～

dialogue_en: And your companions?
dialogue_jp: うしろの方々は？

dialogue_en: Oh them? They're...
dialogue_jp: この人たちは

dialogue_en: I used to live here. Until...you know.
dialogue_jp: ここは　私の故郷……でした

dialogue_en: I see...
dialogue_jp: なるほど

dialogue_en: And are you aware of what Nibelheim is now?
dialogue_jp: ニブルヘイムの　いまの状況はご存知です？

dialogue_en: Nope. No idea.
dialogue_jp: いや　驚いた

dialogue_en:
Five years ago, Shinra assumed direct control
over this village.
dialogue_jp:
ここは　５年前から
神羅カンパニーの直接管理区域でしてね

dialogue_en:
It now serves as a treatment center
for mako poisoning.
dialogue_jp: いまは　魔晄中毒の方々の療養所になっています

dialogue_en: All property rights have been transferred.
dialogue_jp: 権利関係は処理済みと聞いています

dialogue_en: If that's why you're here, contact Special Facilities at corporate. They'll be able to help you.
dialogue_jp:
なにか問題がある場合は
本社の特殊施設管理課へ　ご連絡いただけますか

dialogue_en: Very helpful─thank you, sir!
dialogue_jp: ご親切に　どうも～

dialogue_en: Ah, but the database. I'll not be a wee minute!
dialogue_jp: 端末　ちゃちゃっとお借りしちゃいますね

dialogue_en:
I'm sure you're eager to see your hometown,
but please, don't stay too long.
dialogue_jp:
故郷が懐かしい気持ちもわかりますが
どうか　早々にお引き取りを

dialogue_en: Question. This always been here?
dialogue_jp: これ　昔からあった？

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: It totally screams "climb me," doesn't it?
dialogue_jp: のぼりたく　なるよね

dialogue_en:
So, let's give the poor thing what it wants
and see the sights!
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　のぼろう
なに見えるかな？

dialogue_en: Hey, don't just─
dialogue_jp: おい……

dialogue_en: To look at this place...you'd never know...
dialogue_jp: 村……だね　ちゃんと

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: So─which one's your house?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　クラウドんちは？

dialogue_en: That one.
dialogue_jp: あれだ

dialogue_en: Aw, looks cozy.
dialogue_jp: へえ～　かわいい

dialogue_en: I'm sorry. I shouldn't have said that.
dialogue_jp: ごめん　無神経だった

dialogue_en: Nah, don't worry about it. It's all new to you.
dialogue_jp:
似せてはいるが　全然違う
だから　なんとも思わない

dialogue_en:
That building right there is the inn...
where I stayed five years ago.
dialogue_jp:
ほら　あれが宿屋
５年前は　あそこに泊まった

dialogue_en: You got the town hall...
dialogue_jp: あれが　村役場で

dialogue_en: the general store...
dialogue_jp: あそこが　よろず屋

dialogue_en: and that there...
dialogue_jp: それから

dialogue_en: Tifa's house.
dialogue_jp: ティファの家だ

dialogue_en: So lemme guess. This is where you kept lookout?
dialogue_jp: もしかして　ここから見てた？

dialogue_en: Huh?
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: C'mon, you never came up here hopin' she'd wave?
dialogue_jp: ティファのこと　見てたかなって

dialogue_en: "You never came up here hopin' she'd wave?"
dialogue_jp: ティファのこと　ここから見てた？

dialogue_en: Sounds like something I'd do.
dialogue_jp: そうだな

dialogue_en: What? No way.
dialogue_jp: 見てない！

dialogue_en: That's not funny.
dialogue_jp: バカにするな

dialogue_en: Prob'ly. Sounds like something I'd do.
dialogue_jp: そんなこともあったかもな

dialogue_en:
If I was in your shoes?
I woulda been up here all the time.
dialogue_jp: きっと　わたしも見ちゃうな

dialogue_en: What? N-no way. I-I'd never do that.
dialogue_jp: そんなこと……するはずないだろ

dialogue_en: Mm-hmm.
dialogue_jp: ふ～ん？

dialogue_en: That's not funny.
dialogue_jp: バカにするな

dialogue_en: Wasn't trying to be. Honestly. Just wanted to know.
dialogue_jp:
してないよ
ぜんぜん　そんなのない

dialogue_en: I'm gonna head down.
dialogue_jp: そろそろ　降りよう

dialogue_en: Think I'm good where I am. I'll see ya later.
dialogue_jp: わたしは　もうすこしだけ

dialogue_en: If you don't mind, I'd like to be alone.
dialogue_jp: ひとりにしてください

dialogue_en: You angry?
dialogue_jp: 怒ってるのか

dialogue_en: Mm-hmm.
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: At me?
dialogue_jp: 俺か？

dialogue_en: Not at you. At everything.
dialogue_jp: ううん　ぜんぶ

dialogue_en: Must be nice...
dialogue_jp: うらやましい

dialogue_en: To have a friend you've known since you were a kid. Someone you can say "Remember the time when...?" to. Someone you can reminisce with.
dialogue_jp:
いっしょに懐かしいねって言える友達がいる
子供のころの思い出をいっしょに覚えてる

dialogue_en: I don't have anyone like that...and it feels like I'm being taunted for it. Which stings─more than it should.
dialogue_jp:
そういうの　すごくうらやましくて
気持ち　もてあましてる

dialogue_en: That is why I wanna be alone.
dialogue_jp: だから　ひとりにして

dialogue_en: Plus, I might take it out on you, and I don't want that.
dialogue_jp: クラウドに　やつあたりしそう

dialogue_en: I don't mind.
dialogue_jp: してもいい

dialogue_en: Well I do. And it'd only make me feel worse.
dialogue_jp: しない　あとで落ち込むから

dialogue_en: Thank you, though. Really.
dialogue_jp: ごめんね　ありがと

dialogue_en: I'll be down in a bit. See you then.
dialogue_jp: もうすこししたら　降りるね

dialogue_en:
Fresh air... Peace and quiet...
Not a bad place to grow up.
dialogue_jp: いい風　いい村だったんだね

dialogue_en: I know it's not the village you knew...but it's still nice.
dialogue_jp:
ここ　好き
気に入っちゃった

dialogue_en: Y'know...
dialogue_jp: パパは……

dialogue_en: Hmm?
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: I never understood it. Why'd my dad go into the reactor? Why chase Sephiroth?
dialogue_jp:
あの日　パパはなぜセフィロスを追って
魔晄炉まで行ったのか

dialogue_en:
Thought about it ever since waking up in Corel.
It just seemed liked such a bad idea.
dialogue_jp:
病院で目を覚ましてから　私……
ずっと　そのことを考えていたの

dialogue_en:
I mean, what did he think he was gonna do?
Fight a famous war hero and win?
dialogue_jp:
だって　セフィロスに追いついても
パパじゃ　なにもできないよね

dialogue_en: Well, he didn't...
dialogue_jp: 実際　そうだったし

dialogue_en: But after moving to Midgar...after making a life for myself, I finally realized where my dad was coming from.
dialogue_jp:
でも　ミッドガルに出て
自分の力で生活するようになって　わかった

dialogue_en: He was angry. And he'd had enough.
dialogue_jp: パパはただ　怒ったんだって

dialogue_en: Everything he'd worked so hard for had been destroyed in an instant.
dialogue_jp:
今日は大変だった
でも　明日はきっとよくなる

dialogue_en:
All that he'd built for himself, for us─gone.
Sephiroth had burned it to the ground.
dialogue_jp:
そうやって積み上げてきた
大切な毎日を壊されたことに　パパは怒った

dialogue_en: That's why he went─even though he had to have known how it'd end.
dialogue_jp: その怒りが　パパを動かした

dialogue_en: I see.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: And like him, I took my pain, my grief─everything I was feeling...
dialogue_jp: だから私も　悲しい気持ちや　虚しい気持ち

dialogue_en:
I took it all and turned it into anger.
Anger that led me to Avalanche.
dialogue_jp:
ぜんぶを　怒りに変えて
アバランチに入ることを決めたの

dialogue_en: The problem is... Anger doesn't last.
dialogue_jp: でも　怒りって長く続かないんだ

dialogue_en: So when Avalanche started to become more violent, there wasn't enough left to hold back the fear and the doubt.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチの活動が過激になるにつれて
疑問や不安が大きくなって

dialogue_en: It was taking a toll... Then you turned up.
dialogue_jp: クラウドと再会したのは　そんな時だった

dialogue_en: "It was taking a toll... Then you turned up."
dialogue_jp: 不安だった頃にクラウドと再会したの

dialogue_en: Have I helped you get through it at all?
dialogue_jp: 力になれたか？

dialogue_en: Like it was fate.
dialogue_jp: 運命だな

dialogue_en: I never knew that.
dialogue_jp: 覚えてない

dialogue_en: Have I helped you get through it at all?
dialogue_jp: すこしは力になれたか？

dialogue_en: Yeah, you have. If it wasn't for you, I wouldn't have had the courage to come back here.
dialogue_jp:
うん　クラウドが居てくれたから
ここに帰る決心がついた

dialogue_en: Like it was fate.
dialogue_jp: 運命だな

dialogue_en: Yeah, like it was fate.
dialogue_jp: うん　私もそう思う

dialogue_en: I...never knew that.
dialogue_jp: よく覚えてないんだ

dialogue_en: Yeah... I guess you wouldn't...
dialogue_jp: そうだよね

dialogue_en:
A lot's happened, but─now that we're here─
I know this was the right decision.
dialogue_jp:
色々あったけど
帰ってきて　正解だったな

dialogue_en: Because now I know they rebuilt everything─tried to sweep what they did under the rug and pretend it never even happened.
dialogue_jp:
昔に似せて作り直して
なにもなかったみたいにごまかして

dialogue_en: But I won't let them. I can't.
dialogue_jp: こんなの　許せない

dialogue_en:
Sephiroth and his cruelty...Shinra and their lies...
I'm sick of all of it.
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　神羅　ぜんぶ大キライ

dialogue_en: Hey, remember when we were kids? How you'd─you know─always be looking at me?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　ここにいた頃
クラウド　よく私のこと見てたよね

dialogue_en: I, uh... What?
dialogue_jp: そうだったか？

dialogue_en: Every time we made eye contact, you'd look away. And when I tried to talk to you, you'd ignore me.
dialogue_jp:
私が見たら　目をそらすの
声をかけると　無視する

dialogue_en: Not surprised... I was a pain in the ass as a kid.
dialogue_jp: 面倒くさいガキだった　自分でもそう思う

dialogue_en: I was the opposite. I needed everyone to like me, all the time. Part of me still does, I think. Kinda hate that about myself.
dialogue_jp:
私は　誰にも嫌われたくない子だった
いまでも自分のそういうところ　ちょっとキライ

dialogue_en: Gotta get it together.
dialogue_jp: しっかりしなくちゃ

dialogue_en: Well now...who might you be?
dialogue_jp: おや　おやおや

dialogue_en: Ah, that's right─you're the ones Nick was talkin' about. New in town, aren't you?
dialogue_jp:
ああ　さっきゾロゾロやってきた
フォーリーさんの紹介かい？

dialogue_en: No?
dialogue_jp: いや……

dialogue_en: In that case, you ought to know better than to interrupt a busy chef, hmm?
dialogue_jp: ったく　この忙しい時間にもう！

dialogue_en: I can leave.
dialogue_jp: 邪魔したな

dialogue_en:
No, no, I don't mind.
Could use someone to talk to anyway.
dialogue_jp:
べつにいいのよ
話し相手には飢えてるからね

dialogue_en: Then again, I sense you're not much of a chatterbox.
dialogue_jp: あんた　話し好きには見えないけどさ

dialogue_en:
La la la laaa laaa...
My cooking's like no other♪
dialogue_jp:
トントントント～ント～ン
私は料理の天才～♪

dialogue_en:
La la la laaa laaa...
Thanks to my dear old mother, god rest her soul♪
dialogue_jp:
トントントント～ント～ン
母さんゆずりなのよ～♪

dialogue_en:
They say I'm always gossiping
No secret's safe with me unless I sing♪
dialogue_jp:
私　ウワサ好き
歌わないと余計なこと～♪

dialogue_en: Blah de blah blah, blah de blah de blah!♪
dialogue_jp: ペラペラ～　ペララペラ～♪

dialogue_en: Oh, how I love to spill the tea!♪
dialogue_jp: 私は　ウワサ好き～♪

dialogue_en: Uhr...
dialogue_jp: うう……

dialogue_en: Now don't you go pickin' on 'em! Those poor folks have got it hard enough already.
dialogue_jp:
イジワルしないでね
かわいそうな人たちなんだから

dialogue_en: Mako poisoning?
dialogue_jp: 魔晄中毒だな

dialogue_en: Yep. I'm no expert, but seems to me that there's two types of it. Or, maybe...two types of patients?
dialogue_jp:
そう　でも私が見たところ２種類ね
種類っていうか型？　タイプ？

dialogue_en: We give 'em sponge baths sometimes─and that's when I first saw. Lots of 'em have these...number tattoos.
dialogue_jp:
時々　体を拭いてあげるんだけどね
数字のイレズミを入れている人が多いんだ

dialogue_en: That, and needle marks on their arms. Least I think they are.
dialogue_jp: そんで　その人たちには注射かなにかの痕がある

dialogue_en: Although...we do get the odd one that doesn't seem to have either.
dialogue_jp: まあ　イレズミも痕もない人もいるけどね

dialogue_en: Wait. That makes it three types, then. Or four?
dialogue_jp: あら……ってことは３種類？　４？

dialogue_en: What needle marks?
dialogue_jp: 注射の痕……

dialogue_en: From their treatments, if I had to guess.
dialogue_jp: 中毒の治療の痕じゃないのかい

dialogue_en: And the numbers? Got any idea what they mean?
dialogue_jp:
数字の意味は？
イレズミの数字だ

dialogue_en: Not a clue. Certainly gets the gears in your head turnin' though, doesn't it?
dialogue_jp:
さあねえ
でも　想像がふくらむよねえ

dialogue_en: As I said, there seem to be two types of those black-robed folks.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントの人たちは
私が見たところ　２種類ね

dialogue_en: Most have these numbers tattooed on 'em somewhere, but a few have what look like needle marks dotting their arms as well.
dialogue_jp:
数字の刺青を入れている人が多いんだ
そんで　その人たちには注射かなにかの痕がある

dialogue_en: Of course, there are those that don't have any such oddity on them at all.
dialogue_jp: まあ　刺青も注射の痕もない人もいるけどね

dialogue_en: Wait─did I say two types just now? Or three? Or four? Or...gah!
dialogue_jp:
あら……ってことは３種類　あら４？
あらら　あら～♪

dialogue_en: Something about that place doesn't sit right with me.
dialogue_jp: あっちのほう　なんだかイヤな感じがする

dialogue_en: You mean Shinra Manor?
dialogue_jp: 神羅屋敷か

dialogue_en: Oh! Sorry... No one wants to hear people badmouth their hometown.
dialogue_jp:
ごめん　故郷のこと
こんなふうに言われたら　ヤだよね

dialogue_en:
"No one wants to hear people
badmouth their hometown."
dialogue_jp: 故郷のこと悪く言われたらヤだよね？

dialogue_en: This isn't my hometown.
dialogue_jp: 気にするな

dialogue_en: I never liked that place either.
dialogue_jp: 俺も同じだ

dialogue_en: Yeah, does kinda make you feel like shit.
dialogue_jp: いい気はしない

dialogue_en:
This isn't my hometown.
Not the one I grew up in, anyway.
dialogue_jp:
気にするな
ここは俺が育った村とは別物だ

dialogue_en: Wonder why they'd go through the trouble of rebuilding it...
dialogue_jp: 神羅は　どうしてこんなことしたんだろう

dialogue_en: Hey, I'm with you. Never liked that place. Just looking at it gives me the creeps.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　俺も……
あの屋敷は　小さい頃から苦手だった

dialogue_en: Hopefully the company's not using it anymore...
dialogue_jp: いまはもう使われてないのかな

dialogue_en: Yeah, does kinda make you feel like shit.
dialogue_jp: 確かに　いい気はしないな

dialogue_en: I'm really sorry.
dialogue_jp: ごめんなさい

dialogue_en: I keep asking myself "What could Shinra want with all these robed guys?"
dialogue_jp:
黒マントの人を集めて
神羅はなにをする気なんだろう

dialogue_en: Ah, come to think of it, it's kinda rude we keep calling them "robed guys" and stuff. They've got names, right?
dialogue_jp:
黒マントって　まとめて呼んじゃうけど
あの人たちにも　ちゃんとした名前があるんだよね

dialogue_en: They're everywhere you look.
dialogue_jp: 見ろよ　この数

dialogue_en: You don't really think that all these guys decided to get up and shuffle over here of their own accord, do you?
dialogue_jp:
こいつら全員　自分たちの足で
こんなとこまでワラワラやってきたと思うか

dialogue_en: 'Course not─this is Shinra's doin'!
dialogue_jp: ぜーんぶ　神羅の仕業だ！

dialogue_en: First they raze a whole village 'cause it suits 'em, then they build a fake one right on top of it...
dialogue_jp:
自分たちの都合でブチ壊したり
かと思えば　ニセモノを作ったりよ

dialogue_en: We can't let those corporate bastards keep gettin' away with this shit! We gotta do something, right!?
dialogue_jp:
なんでも　神羅の思いどおりってか？
そうはさせるか！

dialogue_en: "We gotta do something, right!?"
dialogue_jp: なんでも神羅の思いどおりってか？

dialogue_en: Hell yeah you're right. Screw them.
dialogue_jp: ああ　許せない

dialogue_en: I wanna know why they put the robes here.
dialogue_jp: 黒マントを集める目的は？

dialogue_en: Not much we can do.
dialogue_jp: それが神羅だ

dialogue_en: Hell yeah you're right. Screw them.
dialogue_jp: ああ　許せない

dialogue_en: That's the spirit─screw 'em! We'll make 'em pay for what they did to y'all's home.
dialogue_jp:
おまえの故郷のぶんも
きっちり神羅に思い知らせてやろうぜ

dialogue_en: I just wanna know what they're rounding 'em up for.
dialogue_jp: 黒マントを集める目的はなんだ

dialogue_en: The hell if I know... Nothin' good, though.
dialogue_jp: 知るかよ　わかってたまるか！

dialogue_en: Not much we can do.
dialogue_jp: それが　神羅だ

dialogue_en: That shit right there is how they managed to take over the world.
dialogue_jp: いまだに　元神羅の呪縛か？

dialogue_en: They make you beat yourself! They keep tellin' you you're powerless, and eventually you start believin' it.
dialogue_jp:
そうやって　神羅だから仕方ねえって
思わせんのが　やつらのやりクチなんだよ

dialogue_en: These boys're lucky they got us lookin' out for 'em. If Shinra tries anything, I'll make sure they don't succeed.
dialogue_jp:
オレは　ここにいるからよ
神羅がこいつらに悪さしねえか　見張っとくぜ

dialogue_en: Listen, Cloud... I don't know what went down five years ago, but...I'm here for you and Tifa. Whatever you need.
dialogue_jp:
正直　５年前のことはよくわかんねえけどよ
おまえとティファのことは心配だ

dialogue_en: If it's too much, just say the word. We'll leave.
dialogue_jp: しんどいようなら　村を出ようぜ

dialogue_en:
So, any friends here you wanna see?
Maybe a girlfriend?
dialogue_jp:
幼なじみとか　いないのか？
かわいい女の子とかさ

dialogue_en: Speaking of which, I'll bet you're dying to hear about mine. Am I right?
dialogue_jp:
ってか　俺がいま
いっちばん好きな子の話　聞く？

dialogue_en: What? "Not interested"?
dialogue_jp: 興味ないってか？

dialogue_en: I'mma tell ya anyway!
dialogue_jp: いいから聞けって

dialogue_en: She's real pretty.
dialogue_jp: すっごく　かわいいんだ

dialogue_en: No─beautiful.
dialogue_jp: いや　美人かな

dialogue_en: Kinda depends on the angle...
dialogue_jp: 見る角度によるな　うん

dialogue_en: She's just great to be around!
dialogue_jp: っていうか　なにより性格！

dialogue_en: She from Midgar?
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルの子か？

dialogue_en: Yup, real city mouse.
dialogue_jp: ああ　都会の子

dialogue_en: Zack...
dialogue_jp: ザックス……

dialogue_en: Zack Fair.
dialogue_jp: ザックス・フェア

dialogue_en:
From Gongaga. Head over heels for Aerith.
We fought together as SOLDIERs...
dialogue_jp:
エアリスが好きだったソルジャー
ゴンガガ生まれの　俺の同僚

dialogue_en:
You were here with me five years ago.
You came with me on the mission.
dialogue_jp:
５年前　俺たちは
いっしょに　ここに来たのか

dialogue_en: Where are you? What happened to you?
dialogue_jp: ザックス　どこにいるんだ？

dialogue_en: Looks like the reactor's not too far... Hey, Cloud. Ever been up there before?
dialogue_jp:
この先が魔晄炉か～
ねえ　クラウドは行ったことあんの？

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: まあな

dialogue_en: Oho? Then gimme the skinny! What was it like? Was there buttloads of mako?
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉があるってことは
魔晄がいっぱいってことでしょ

dialogue_en: What about, say, oh...materia?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　貴重なマテリアとかあった？

dialogue_en: "What about, say, oh...materia?"
dialogue_jp: 貴重なマテリアとかあった？

dialogue_en: Yup.
dialogue_jp: とびきりのがある

dialogue_en: Dunno.
dialogue_jp: どうだったかな

dialogue_en: Come to think of it...nope.
dialogue_jp: そんなものはない

dialogue_en: Yup. Some of 'em even formed naturally.
dialogue_jp: ああ　天然のマテリアがあったな

dialogue_en:
No. Way. "Naturally"!?
Oh man, ya got my mouth waterin'!
dialogue_jp:
天然モノ～！　マジで？
うわ～　ヨダレ出そ～

dialogue_en: Dunno. Never thought to look.
dialogue_jp: どうだったかな

dialogue_en: Ugh, freakin' amateurs. Honestly!
dialogue_jp: もう　これだからシロートは

dialogue_en: Guess it's true what they say... If you want somethin' done right, you really do gotta do it yourself!
dialogue_jp:
やっぱり　マテリア専門家のアタシが
直接　見に行かないとね～

dialogue_en: Come to think of it...nope.
dialogue_jp: そんなものは　ない

dialogue_en:
Uh-huh, nice try, but you can't fool me.
I know what you're up to!
dialogue_jp: そうやってごまかして　独り占めする気？

dialogue_en: You want it all for yourself!
dialogue_jp: だまされるもんか！

dialogue_en: What are we waitin' for? That materia needs me!
dialogue_jp: はやく　マテリア探しに行こうよ～

dialogue_en: Terminal first.
dialogue_jp: 端末が先だな

dialogue_en: Should check on Cait Sith...
dialogue_jp: ケット・シーは役場か

dialogue_en: So, what's the story here, exactly?
dialogue_jp: あのネコ氏　何者なんですか？

dialogue_en: Because for a cat, he has an awfully high level of clearance. It's more than a little suspicious.
dialogue_jp:
端末を貸したら　コネだのツテだの
なんだかんだで　中枢のデータベースまで

dialogue_en: No "average employee" should be able to access what he can.
dialogue_jp: グループ会社のいち社員とは　とても思えません

dialogue_en: I understand this must be confusing for you, but I don't know anything either.
dialogue_jp:
この村のことを聞かれても
答えられることはありませんよ

dialogue_en: I just go where the company tells me. That's it.
dialogue_jp: 私も雇われて　ここにいるだけですから

dialogue_en: Gonna need a smidge more time.
dialogue_jp: ちょ～っと　待っててください

dialogue_en: Why not visit some of your old haunts while you have the chance?
dialogue_jp: いまのうちに村の様子　見てきたらいかがです？

dialogue_en: You never know, you might remember somethin' nice...
dialogue_jp: いろいろ思い出しちゃうかもしれませんけど

dialogue_en: I cannae believe this!
dialogue_jp: ウニャ～～～！

dialogue_en:
I shoulda known it was too good to be true...
I only have limited access from this console.
dialogue_jp:
この端末からじゃダメですわ
アクセスできる範囲が制限されとります

dialogue_en: Lemme guess. "Limited" doesn't cut it.
dialogue_jp: つまり　情報は手に入らない

dialogue_en: Nope...but all is not lost!
dialogue_jp: あきらめるんは　まだ早いですわ！

dialogue_en: Excuse me, good sir! Would you be so kind as to grant us entry into Shinra Manor?
dialogue_jp:
管理人はん　あのお屋敷に
入れてもらえませんやろか？

dialogue_en: Don't you have clearance for that?
dialogue_jp: あなたなら　入れるのでは？

dialogue_en: Oh, if only! I'm but a wee bottom-feeder.
dialogue_jp: にゃっは～　無理に決まってますやろ

dialogue_en: Barely have clearance to use the bathroom, me!
dialogue_jp: ボク　神羅リゾートの平社員でっせ

dialogue_en: Be that as it may, I can't let you in there myself. You'll have to ask my boss instead.
dialogue_jp:
私のカードでも　あそこには入れません
上司と交渉してください

dialogue_en:
Meaning the deputy commissioner?
Or...the commish himself?
dialogue_jp:
ジョーシ！
カチョーはん　ブチョーはん？

dialogue_en: Let's meet 'n' greet!
dialogue_jp: どこにおりますのやろ？

dialogue_en: Deputy Commissioner Murasaki's up at the reactor─conducting an inspection for corporate.
dialogue_jp:
ムラサキ課長は　本社からの点検依頼で
ニブル魔晄炉に滞在中です

dialogue_en: He's due back the day after tomorrow, but...he hasn't been in touch to confirm.
dialogue_jp:
明後日には戻る予定ですが
昨日から連絡ないんですよね

dialogue_en: Could be he needs more time.
dialogue_jp: 遅れるかもしれませんねえ

dialogue_en: Ach, we cannae afford to dillydally!
dialogue_jp: そんなに　待てませんわ～

dialogue_en: Then we'll just have to track him down.
dialogue_jp: 急ぎだ　こっちから行こう

dialogue_en: Agreed!
dialogue_jp: そうしましょ！

dialogue_en: Thanks for all the help, pal.
dialogue_jp: ほな　おおきに～

dialogue_en: Please, don't tell anyone I let you touch our terminal.
dialogue_jp: 端末をお貸ししたことは　どうぞ他言無用で

dialogue_en: ...Get me the hell out of this backwater.
dialogue_jp: はあ　早くジュノン支社に戻りたい

dialogue_en: So! You're headed to the reactor, huh?
dialogue_jp: 聞いたよ　魔晄炉行くんでしょ？

dialogue_en:
"Headed to the reactor"?
No luck at town hall, I take it?
dialogue_jp: 魔晄炉だあ？　端末の件は片付いたのか

dialogue_en: Gotta get a keycard. A guy named Murasaki has it, but he's inspecting the reactor.
dialogue_jp:
カードキーが必要になった
魔晄炉へ行って　ムラサキという男に会ってくる

dialogue_en:
Well then, you'll need a ninja to accompany you!
I'm comin' with.
dialogue_jp: はい　ハイハイハイ～！　アタシも行く

dialogue_en: Me too.
dialogue_jp: 私も

dialogue_en: Really? You sure...?
dialogue_jp: いや　ティファは……

dialogue_en: "Ask anyone around here. I'm the best there is."
dialogue_jp: この村で　いちばんのガイドといえば　私

dialogue_en: Alright.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: You sure you're gonna be okay?
dialogue_jp: おまえら　大丈夫か

dialogue_en:
We're going on a hike and getting a keycard.
How tough can it be?
dialogue_jp:
山に登ってカードキーを借りるだけだ
問題ない

dialogue_en:
You'll still be gone for a while.
Sure there's nothin' you need to take care of?
dialogue_jp:
しばらく　戻れないと思うけど
やり残したことはない？

dialogue_en:
I'm puttin' you in charge of provisions...
but make it snappy! My materia needs me!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　準備よろしく！
急がないと　マテリア逃げちゃうよ～？

dialogue_en: We goin' to the reactor or what?
dialogue_jp: シュシュッと出発する？

dialogue_en: Head to the mako reactor?
dialogue_jp: ニブル魔晄炉に向かいますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: 出発する

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: まだ準備する

dialogue_en: New bridge just went in, you know─might shave some time off the trip!
dialogue_jp: 最近できた橋を使えば　近道できるみたいでっせ

dialogue_en: Sounds like a plan to me! Alright, reactorward ho!
dialogue_jp: よ～し　いざ　しゅっぱーつ！

dialogue_en: Sir.
dialogue_jp: 社長

dialogue_en:
We've received word about the Nibelheim
survey team. It appears they were ambushed.
dialogue_jp:
ニブルヘイムへ向かわせた調査隊が
何者かに襲われたようです

dialogue_en: By Wutai?
dialogue_jp: ウータイか？

dialogue_en: Indeed. And so it begins!
dialogue_jp: いよいよ始まりますな　若！

dialogue_en: Hurry it up already!
dialogue_jp: はやく行こ～！

dialogue_en: That the new bridge I see up ahead?
dialogue_jp: 新しい橋は　あっちだね

dialogue_en: Hey! Keep your eyes on the prize, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: 寄り道してる場合じゃないって～

dialogue_en: Help!
dialogue_jp: 助けてくれ！

dialogue_en: Zack!
dialogue_jp: ザックス！

dialogue_en: He's in fate's hands now.
dialogue_jp: あいつの運に　期待しよう

dialogue_en: What is it?
dialogue_jp: どうしたの？

dialogue_en: I remember what happened here. And to Zack.
dialogue_jp: 思い出したんだ　ザックスのこと

dialogue_en: Oh...
dialogue_jp: うん……

dialogue_en: Bridge broke, he fell. Got swept away by the current. I think he's...
dialogue_jp:
吊り橋から落ちて　ここから流されていった
そして　おそらく

dialogue_en: dead.
dialogue_jp: 死んだ

dialogue_en:
You never forgot, did you?
That's why you've been acting weird.
dialogue_jp:
ティファは　覚えてたんじゃないか？
だから……

dialogue_en: Didn't wanna upset you. That's all.
dialogue_jp: 触れないほうがいいのかなって

dialogue_en:
Zack was my friend.
How could I just forget him like that?
dialogue_jp:
ザックスは友達だった
それなのに忘れるなんて

dialogue_en: Degradation.
dialogue_jp: 劣化か……

dialogue_en: It's hollowing me out. Bit by bit...
dialogue_jp: 俺もからっぽで　さまようのか

dialogue_en: You're wrong.
dialogue_jp: 違うよ

dialogue_en: You remembered, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: クラウドは　思い出したんだよ

dialogue_en: It'll be okay.
dialogue_jp: 良かったじゃない

dialogue_en: It will. I know it.
dialogue_jp: うん……良かった

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: そうだな

dialogue_en:
We gotta tell Aerith about this.
She deserves to know what happened.
dialogue_jp: ザックスのこと　エアリスにも伝えないとな

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: うん

dialogue_en: Yeah, she does...but lemme be the one to do it.
dialogue_jp: でも　私にまかせてくれる？

dialogue_en: Why?
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en: Because she and I are close...y'know?
dialogue_jp: 友達だから　ね？

dialogue_en: Hey─are you two done yet?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　ま～だ～？

dialogue_en: Yup. Be right there!
dialogue_jp: ごめん　すぐ行く

dialogue_en: Let's just keep this between the two of us. Promise?
dialogue_jp: この話はみんなにも内緒で

dialogue_en: Ugh, I'm dyin' here...
dialogue_jp: おえ　くるしい……

dialogue_en: Let's not waste any time. Mako this thick is dangerous.
dialogue_jp: 早めに抜けるぞ　濃すぎる魔晄は危険だ

dialogue_en: A mako spring.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄の泉だ

dialogue_en: Wait, so...this whole thing's materia?
dialogue_jp: これ　ぜ～んぶ　マテリアなの？

dialogue_en: Wow... It's so much bigger.
dialogue_jp: ５年前より　すごいね

dialogue_en: Naturally formed materia.
dialogue_jp: 天然のマテリアだ

dialogue_en: And look at the size of it. Astounding.
dialogue_jp: マテリアは　魔晄エネルギーが凝縮されたもの

dialogue_en:
For the mako energy to condense into something
like this, it must have taken an eternity.
dialogue_jp:
自然の状態で　ここまでになるには
いったい　どれほどの時間が掛かることか

dialogue_en: Hey─we should get outta here. All this mako's making me queasy.
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　先へ行こう？
このあたりも　濃いよね

dialogue_en: Yeah...me too.
dialogue_jp: さんせ～

dialogue_en: Are you sure...we're going the right way?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　魔晄炉まだ～？

dialogue_en: We're almost there. Once we get past this part... Then...
dialogue_jp: もうすぐだよ　ここを登っていけば

dialogue_en: C'mon, let's find another route.
dialogue_jp: 別の道を探すしかなさそうだ

dialogue_en: No need to worry. I've already found one!
dialogue_jp: アタシにまかせて

dialogue_en: More climbing, but hey.
dialogue_jp: これで登っちゃお！

dialogue_en: You know...I can't say I've ever taken this route before. You gonna be okay, Yuffie?
dialogue_jp:
このルートは　さすがにガイドしたことないな
ユフィ　大丈夫？

dialogue_en: Oh yeah, no problem! This is nothin' compared to what we got in Wutai.
dialogue_jp:
これぐらいラクショ～！
ウータイには　もっとすんごいのがあるよ

dialogue_en: Like the massive sculpture of Da-chao carved into the face of this one cliff. All us ninjas have to scale it─part of our training.
dialogue_jp:
断崖絶壁に　巨大なダチャオ様が彫ってあってね
シノビの修行で　そこを登らされんの

dialogue_en: Never liked the climb much, but I freakin' loved the reward!
dialogue_jp: つらかったけど　ごほーびがあったから

dialogue_en: Which was...?
dialogue_jp: ごほうび？

dialogue_en: Da-chao beans, of course!
dialogue_jp: ダチャオ豆！

dialogue_en: Got to eat up when we made it to the top. Ah! Tell you what. I'll give you some when we finish our climb!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールしたらもらえるの
ここ登りきったら　ふたりにもあげよっか？

dialogue_en: That's kind, but...you really don't have to.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　遠慮しとく

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud. I've been thinkin'... We're lookin' for a guy named "Murasaki," right?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　探してる人って
ムラサキって名前なんだよね

dialogue_en: What about him?
dialogue_jp: それがどうした？

dialogue_en: It's just...his name sounds Wutaian...
dialogue_jp: いや　ウータイっぽい名前だなと思って

dialogue_en: I'm sure plenty of your people immigrated to Midgar before the war. Some of their kids and grandkids probably work for Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
戦争の前は　移住者も少なくなかった
２世や３世が神羅にいても　おかしくはない

dialogue_en: Oh. Huh... I hadn't ever thought about that before.
dialogue_jp: そっか　神羅にもウータイ人がいるんだ

dialogue_en: Gotta be a way to get down...
dialogue_jp: どこから　降りよっか

dialogue_en: No goin' through...
dialogue_jp: おろ～？

dialogue_en: Well, shit.
dialogue_jp: 行き止まりだ

dialogue_en: There has to be something we can use to climb that fence...
dialogue_jp: どうにかできないかな　調べてみよう

dialogue_en: Hmm... I guess it's not that weird for people to move to different countries. And it's not like we don't welcome foreigners into Wutai either.
dialogue_jp:
でもよく考えたら　ウータイにも
元神羅の人がいるから　お互いさまか

dialogue_en: I mean, take Colonel Lodbrok.
dialogue_jp: ほら　前に話したでしょ？

dialogue_en: He and Viceroy Sarruf are the whole reason we have an interim government in the first place.
dialogue_jp:
暫定政府を作ってくれた
三羽ガラスとスフール総督のこと

dialogue_en: In fact, his whole team is made up of nothin' but ex-SOLDIERs. Buncha badasses who decided to give Shinra the finger.
dialogue_jp:
そういえば　三羽ガラスのグレン大佐も
神羅から抜けた元ソルジャーって言ってたから

dialogue_en: Kinda like you!
dialogue_jp: クラウドと　いっしょだね

dialogue_en: Nothing like me.
dialogue_jp: いっしょにするな

dialogue_en: Got so much in common you'd be best buds! Just sayin'─it's never too late to join the cause!
dialogue_jp:
ウータイに来たら　紹介してあげよっか
そのまま暫定政府に入っちゃう？

dialogue_en: So whaddya say? Wanna join up?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　いい考えじゃない？

dialogue_en: I'm dead serious, y'know. I really think you'd like it in Wutai. Could bring the whole gang even!
dialogue_jp:
ゴタゴタが　ぜ～んぶ片付いたらさ
みんなで　ウータイにくればいいじゃん

dialogue_en: We'll start our own spec ops unit! The "Yuffie Recon Patrol"!
dialogue_jp: で　暫定政府のユフィ部隊として神羅と戦うの

dialogue_en: Shinra will be afraid to even speak our name. They'll stand in awe of the fair ninja who leads her loyal minions, and tremble in fear when they see the YRPs comin' in hot!
dialogue_jp:
神羅軍を次々と壊滅していく最強のユフィ部隊
それを指揮するのは　美少女隊長のユフィ！

dialogue_en: People'll be bangin' down the door to buy our film rights!
dialogue_jp: ク～　映画化まちがいナシ　ね？

dialogue_en: Your stunned silence says more than words ever could! I knew you'd be on board!
dialogue_jp:
よし　そうと決まったら
さっさとゴタゴタを片付けちゃお～！

dialogue_en: Please shut up.
dialogue_jp: 勝手に決めるな

dialogue_en: They're ninjas! From Wutai!
dialogue_jp: シノビだよ　ウータイの！

dialogue_en: Which means...we're at war?
dialogue_jp: これ　戦争？

dialogue_en:
But...what about my mission?
Did command call it off?
dialogue_jp:
アタシの任務　どうなっちゃうの
方針変更……？

dialogue_en: Why didn't anyone tell me!?
dialogue_jp: 聞いてないよ……

dialogue_en: Aren't we in the middle of a cease-fire, though?
dialogue_jp: いまは休戦中だよね
