dialogue_en: That's what they say. Still─doesn't mean we are.
dialogue_jp:
そのはずだ
でも　どうだろうと

dialogue_en: And it makes no difference to them either way.
dialogue_jp: 死んだヤツらには　同じことだ

dialogue_en: C'mon. We gotta find Murasaki.
dialogue_jp: 行くぞ　ムラサキを探そう

dialogue_en: Right...
dialogue_jp: うん

dialogue_en: This is it... There's no turning back.
dialogue_jp: 始めたんだ……始まったんだ

dialogue_en: Who's there!? We're here to help!
dialogue_jp: 誰かいるの　ウータイの人？

dialogue_en: Ready?
dialogue_jp: やるぞ！

dialogue_en: We gotta find Murasaki.
dialogue_jp: ムラサキさんを　探そう

dialogue_en: Oh my god...
dialogue_jp: ひどい……

dialogue_en: That thing must've done this...
dialogue_jp: さっきのヤツだな

dialogue_en: I doubt it. They were shot.
dialogue_jp: いや　銃でやられてる

dialogue_en: Why'd they do this?
dialogue_jp: どうして　こんなこと……

dialogue_en: No one told you anything?
dialogue_jp: なにも　聞いてないの？

dialogue_en: No, nothing!
dialogue_jp: 知らないよ！

dialogue_en: I had no idea they were planning an operation. I should've been here─should've done something for them.
dialogue_jp:
なにが起きてるのか　ぜんぜんわかんない
アタシ　まだなんにも役に立ってない！

dialogue_en: You've done tons for us. Remember that.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちの役には立ってる　冷静にな

dialogue_en: Whatever.
dialogue_jp: わかってる

dialogue_en: Tifa.
dialogue_jp: ティファ……

dialogue_en: It's okay... I'm okay.
dialogue_jp: ごめん　大丈夫

dialogue_en: Hey.
dialogue_jp: 見て！

dialogue_en: I think we found our guy.
dialogue_jp: この人が　ムラサキみたい

dialogue_en:
We need to check the inside.
There might still be survivors.
dialogue_jp: 奥も確認しておこう　生存者がいるかもしれない

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: うん

dialogue_en: I don't see anyone...
dialogue_jp: 誰もいないね

dialogue_en: Sephiroth!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス！

dialogue_en: Soon, Cloud. Soon.
dialogue_jp: もうすぐだ　クラウド

dialogue_en: You okay?
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫？

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en: Huh!? Cait Sith?
dialogue_jp: おろ　ケット・シー？

dialogue_en: Ah, Yuffie! And where might you be?
dialogue_jp: ユフィはんでっか　いまどこにおります？

dialogue_en: Back room off mako storage.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄だまりの　奥の部屋だ

dialogue_en: You?
dialogue_jp: そっちは？

dialogue_en: Town hall still.
dialogue_jp: 役場ですわ

dialogue_en: Thought I might be able to do something from here, so I tried accessing the reactor terminal...
dialogue_jp:
なにか　お手伝いできるかと思って
魔晄炉の端末にアクセスしてみたんですが

dialogue_en: Anyway, did you find Murasaki?
dialogue_jp: ムラサキはんには会えましたか？

dialogue_en: Yeah, we did. He died in a skirmish with Wutai.
dialogue_jp: 死んでいた　ウータイと戦闘があったようだ

dialogue_en: He what!?
dialogue_jp: なんと！

dialogue_en: Then we don't have much time. We have to reach the terminal in Shinra Manor before word gets out.
dialogue_jp:
ややこしいことになる前に
神羅屋敷の端末　借りちゃいましょ

dialogue_en: You've got the keycard, right?
dialogue_jp: カードキーはあります？

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Good. Then slot it into the console.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　その端末に差し込んでください

dialogue_en: I'll work my magic from here. Should have that gate open before you know it.
dialogue_jp:
こっちで遠隔操作して
屋敷の門　開けてみますわ

dialogue_en: Yes! Get in there, my son!
dialogue_jp: バッチリですわ！

dialogue_en: I'll go ahead and look for the terminal. See ye there.
dialogue_jp: 先に屋敷へ向かって　端末探しときます

dialogue_en: Meet at the manor. Got it.
dialogue_jp: わかった　あとでな

dialogue_en: Seeya!
dialogue_jp: またね！

dialogue_en: Cheerio!
dialogue_jp: はいな！

dialogue_en: Let's go.
dialogue_jp: 戻ろう

dialogue_en: Well, you heard them. Time is of the essence.
dialogue_jp: 屋敷に行ったら　まず端末を探しましょ

dialogue_en:
We need to find that terminal─
ideally before they get back.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドはんたちが戻るまでに
ちゃちゃっと見つけまっせ～

dialogue_en: Yessir!
dialogue_jp: りょーかい

dialogue_en: You stay behind and wait for 'em. Once they arrive, you can put that nose of yours to work.
dialogue_jp:
おまえは　クラウドたちを待て
合流できたら　オレたちのところへ連れてこい

dialogue_en: Follow our scent right to us.
dialogue_jp: その鼻で辿れんだろ？

dialogue_en: Ya gotta admit, you're the best one for the job.
dialogue_jp: おまえにしかできねえから　頼んでるんだ

dialogue_en: I will concede you have a point.
dialogue_jp: ならば　仕方あるまい

dialogue_en: Then let's get a move on!
dialogue_jp: ほな　行きましょ！

dialogue_en: Um...the others aren't back yet.
dialogue_jp: クラウドたちは　まだ戻ってきてないよ

dialogue_en: We'll catch up with you at the manor later.
dialogue_jp: クラウドたちと合流したら　追いかけるよ

dialogue_en: They pulled out all the stops decoratin' this place. Definitely seen better days though.
dialogue_jp:
ずいぶん金のかかった内装じゃねえか
あちこち　ボロボロだけどよ

dialogue_en: Ah, what's a few cracks between friends? It's almost fifty years old.
dialogue_jp: かれこれ　築５０年ほどになりますやろか

dialogue_en: This can't just be a fancy house...
dialogue_jp: ここ　どんなお屋敷？

dialogue_en: I'm gonna go out on a limb and agree with you there.
dialogue_jp: ボクも　詳しくは知りません

dialogue_en: The village is practically drowning in a sea of black robes, after all.
dialogue_jp:
けど　村に黒マントの人たち
ぎょーさんおりましたやろ？

dialogue_en: So what if it is?
dialogue_jp: 関係あんのか

dialogue_en: Well...it would add weight to the rumor that Hojo used to conduct experiments here.
dialogue_jp:
ここは　宝条博士が
実験に使ってたと聞いたことがあります

dialogue_en: Doubt it's just a rumor.
dialogue_jp: ロクでもねえな

dialogue_en: Kinda creepy...
dialogue_jp: うわ　すごい

dialogue_en: This a kids' clubhouse?
dialogue_jp: ガキの秘密基地かよ

dialogue_en: Oh, I think it's a bit more dangerous than that.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　危険な罠かもしれません

dialogue_en: But nae bother! I'll protect ye!
dialogue_jp: ためしに　ボクが行ってみますわ

dialogue_en: Uh...
dialogue_jp: なんや？

dialogue_en: Hello, and welcome to Shinra Manor...trespassers.
dialogue_jp: 我が屋敷へようこそ　侵入者の諸君

dialogue_en: Hojo!
dialogue_jp: 宝条！

dialogue_en:
I don't know what it is you hoped to find here,
but I'm afraid this facility has been abandoned
for some time.
dialogue_jp:
君たちが　どこの誰かは知らんが
残念ながら　ここは放棄された施設でね

dialogue_en:
Everything of value is gone─but please feel free
to poke around.
dialogue_jp:
あさったところで
有益なものは残されていないと思うが

dialogue_en: Ah, it's not him─just an AI caretaker.
dialogue_jp: これ　ただの管理ＡＩです

dialogue_en: That said, this facility has always had a place in my heart. I must insist that you leave it in the condition in which you found it.
dialogue_jp:
ただ　少しばかり思い出深い場所でね
我がもの顔で踏み荒らすのは勘弁してもらいたい

dialogue_en: And with that in mind...
dialogue_jp: と　いうわけでだ

dialogue_en: I won't keep you any longer. Thanks for dropping in.
dialogue_jp: 不届き者は　お引き取り願おう

dialogue_en: Don't walk into the light, Barret!
dialogue_jp: お～い　お～い！

dialogue_en: Aw... That was a sore one.
dialogue_jp: いたたた……

dialogue_en: That shithead is gonna get it.
dialogue_jp: やってくれるぜ　あの野郎

dialogue_en: I think we're trapped in here.
dialogue_jp: 閉じ込められちゃったみたい

dialogue_en: Like rats in a cage. No squeezin' through those bars.
dialogue_jp:
エーアイかなんだか知んねえが
宝条は　宝条ってこった

dialogue_en: That duct, however, might just fit a cat.
dialogue_jp: あのダクト　ボクやったら通れるかも

dialogue_en: Sit tight. I'll have you out in a jiffy!
dialogue_jp: ボク　ちょっと行ってきますわ

dialogue_en: Argh... Gutted. Just out of reach.
dialogue_jp: これは届きませんな～

dialogue_en: Hey, cat! How's it lookin'!?
dialogue_jp: おい　どんな調子だ？

dialogue_en: Do you still think you can get us outta here?
dialogue_jp: そっちから　開けられない？

dialogue_en: The cat of the hour.
dialogue_jp: うまくいったね

dialogue_en: Just you leave the problem-solvin' to me, eh?
dialogue_jp: ここはぜ～んぶ　ボクにまかせてください！

dialogue_en: You're in safe paws now!
dialogue_jp: さあ　先へ進みましょ！

dialogue_en: Error detected. Service suspended.
dialogue_jp: エラー発生　リフトを停止します

dialogue_en: So near and yet so far.
dialogue_jp: あれが　ワルさしとるみたいやな～

dialogue_en: Insufficient power. Generator on standby.
dialogue_jp: 電力が足りません　発電機を起動してください

dialogue_en: Talk about a hard landin'.
dialogue_jp: あれま　どないしよ

dialogue_en: Something to catch it, maybe?
dialogue_jp: 下になんか置かんと

dialogue_en: Thank you.
dialogue_jp: ありがと

dialogue_en: Don't mention it. All in a day's work!
dialogue_jp: いえいえ　お安いご用です～

dialogue_en: Error detected in power generator. Lockdown protocol engaged.
dialogue_jp:
発電機の動作不良を確認
現在ゲートをロックしております

dialogue_en:
Insufficient mako.
Administer accelerant to red generator.
dialogue_jp:
赤く点灯している発電機に
魔晄促進剤を投入してください

dialogue_en: Mako levels increasing. Additional accelerants required to meet operational standard.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄濃度の上昇を確認
引き続き　魔晄促進剤を投入してください

dialogue_en: Sufficient mako levels confirmed.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄濃度が規定値に達しました

dialogue_en: Generator online. Lockdown protocol disengaged.
dialogue_jp: 発電機の稼働を確認　ロックを解除します

dialogue_en: Insufficient power. Generator on standby.
dialogue_jp: 電力が足りません　発電機を起動してください

dialogue_en: Sounds about right...
dialogue_jp: またかいな

dialogue_en:
Accordin' to this, that generator's
somewhere upstairs.
dialogue_jp: 発電機は　上の階にあるみたいですね

dialogue_en: Well, nothin' else for it. Back into the air ducts I go.
dialogue_jp:
なるほど　なるほど
ダクトを通れば　なんとか

dialogue_en: Sure you'll be okay?
dialogue_jp: これから　どうするの？

dialogue_en: Positive!
dialogue_jp: 問題ありません！

dialogue_en:
I'll be in and out before you know it.
Don't have too much fun without me!
dialogue_jp:
ボクにドーンとまかせて
おふたりは　ここで待っといてください

dialogue_en: Switching ventilation system to maintenance mode. Enabling duct access.
dialogue_jp:
メンテナンスモードへ移行
ダクト操作をマニュアルへと切り替えます

dialogue_en: Please commence on-site inspection.
dialogue_jp: 整備班は点検を開始してください

dialogue_en: Cycling duct.
dialogue_jp: ダクトを切り替えました

dialogue_en: Got to get the thing open first.
dialogue_jp: まずはダクトを切り替えんと

dialogue_en: ...Right then!
dialogue_jp: これは　どないしよ

dialogue_en: Elevator in service. Commence transfer of cargo onto loading bay to proceed.
dialogue_jp:
重量測定リフトを稼働します
作業員はリフトに荷物を運んでください

dialogue_en: A few boxes ought to do the trick. Now, let's see.
dialogue_jp:
こっから　あっちに箱を投げたら
いけるんとちゃう？

dialogue_en: Error: insufficient weight for elevator operation. Additional cargo required.
dialogue_jp:
重量が規定値に達していません
引き続き　リフトに荷物を運んでください

dialogue_en:
Weight insufficient for operation.
Additional cargo required.
dialogue_jp:
重量不足です
引き続き　荷物を運んでください

dialogue_en: Sufficient cargo weight confirmed. Commence transfer of cargo from loading bay to proceed.
dialogue_jp:
重量が規定値に達しました
作業員はリフトから荷物をおろしてください

dialogue_en: There─got it!
dialogue_jp: ケット・シー

dialogue_en: What now...?
dialogue_jp: なんや？

dialogue_en: Stay back, I'm warnin' you!
dialogue_jp: こっちこんとってーーー！

dialogue_en: Never again...
dialogue_jp: あ～　しんど！

dialogue_en: You okay!?
dialogue_jp: だいじょうぶ？

dialogue_en:
Och, all the better for a wee lie down!
So then, onwards and upwards?
dialogue_jp:
ちょっと休んどっただけです～
さあ　はやく上に行きましょ！

dialogue_en: Elevator operation suspended for safety inspection. Please wait.
dialogue_jp:
点検作業のためリフトを一時停止します
しばらくお待ちください

dialogue_en: Inspection complete. Resuming operation.
dialogue_jp: 点検終了　リフトの運転を再開します

dialogue_en: Oh, for cryin' out loud! What is it this time!?
dialogue_jp: あ～もう　次はなんや！

dialogue_en: You'll require the password to proceed.
dialogue_jp: その先は解除キーが必要でね

dialogue_en: You again!?
dialogue_jp: 出やがった！

dialogue_en: Now now, no need for violence.
dialogue_jp: おっと　勘違いしないでくれたまえ

dialogue_en: I come in peace─and to abet your escape as well.
dialogue_jp:
私は君たちが出られるように
手助けしにきたんだ

dialogue_en: Hmph, like hell you do!
dialogue_jp: 信じられっか！

dialogue_en:
Really, it's true!
You're far more resilient than anticipated.
dialogue_jp: 思いのほか　君たちがしぶとくてね

dialogue_en:
And I concluded that, rather than allow you to
run amok any longer, I ought to help you see yourselves out peacefully.
dialogue_jp:
これ以上　ここで暴れられるよりは
穏便に退出してもらう方が合理的と判断したまでさ

dialogue_en:
The password is comprised of four
two-digit numbers.
dialogue_jp: 解除キーは　４組の２桁の数字だったはずだ

dialogue_en: I wrote them down in this very room, but...where?
dialogue_jp:
たしか　この部屋のどこかに
書かれていたと思うが

dialogue_en: Well then, no time to waste!
dialogue_jp: ほうら　はやく探したまえ

dialogue_en: Better late than never, I suppose. Come in.
dialogue_jp: 待ちくたびれたよ　入りたまえ

dialogue_en: Zzz...
dialogue_jp: ぐう……ぐう……

dialogue_en: Zzz... Hngh!
dialogue_jp: ぐう……ぐう……

dialogue_en: Oh, how forgetful of me. This area is off-limits to any unauthorized personnel.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　そういえば
ここは立ち入り禁止区域だった

dialogue_en: It's where I've been keeping a rather unruly failure.
dialogue_jp: 手に負えなくなった失敗作を保管していてね

dialogue_en:
And so, I'm afraid you'll have to dispose of it.
Try not to die!
dialogue_jp: では失敗作の後始末　よろしく頼んだよ

dialogue_en: Ha ha! That deserves a wee round of applause!
dialogue_jp:
どんなもんや！
ネコなめたらあきませんで～

dialogue_en: I wasnae built for this kind of thing...
dialogue_jp: こんなん　聞いてませんわ

dialogue_en: That smug asshole. Next time I see him, I'm rammin' my fist right through his face!
dialogue_jp:
宝条の野郎　今度会ったら
あのメガネ　顔面に埋めてやる

dialogue_en: Agreed?
dialogue_jp: 手伝うだろ？

dialogue_en: Agreed!
dialogue_jp: よろこんで

dialogue_en: We'd best get going. The terminal's waiting.
dialogue_jp: 上に向かいましょか　はよ端末を探さんと

dialogue_en: Excellent work dispatching that fiend.
dialogue_jp: ご苦労　諸君

dialogue_en:
Thanks to you, the manor is a little more
neat and tidy.
dialogue_jp: おかげで屋敷がすこしだけ綺麗になったよ

dialogue_en: All well-earned praise aside, since that nettlesome test subject is finally out of my hair, I have no further reason to remain here.
dialogue_jp:
さて　保管していた失敗作も片付いたことだし
私もこれで　お役御免だな

dialogue_en:
It's been nothing if not entertaining.
Until we meet again, exterminators.
dialogue_jp:
楽しませてもらったよ
では　またどこかで

dialogue_en: Well, well, well! Look who the cat dragged in.
dialogue_jp: あれ～　なんかお疲れ気味？

dialogue_en: Hey there.
dialogue_jp: おかえり

dialogue_en: Hmm?
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: So!
dialogue_jp: ただいま

dialogue_en: Find that terminal?
dialogue_jp: 端末は見つかった？

dialogue_en: Let's just say we...got a little sidetracked.
dialogue_jp: まだだ　色々あってな

dialogue_en:
Well, we can but try again.
No sense stewin' on past mistakes!
dialogue_jp:
捜索を再開しましょ
モタモタしてられませんわ

dialogue_en: Uh...right.
dialogue_jp: そう……だな

dialogue_en: Pardon me.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　すんません

dialogue_en: Décor's a bit...grim, no?
dialogue_jp: 棺桶……ですやろか？

dialogue_en: Who dares disturb my slumber?
dialogue_jp: 私を悪夢から呼び起こすのは

dialogue_en: Well?
dialogue_jp: 誰だ？

dialogue_en: Doesn't matter. Who are you?
dialogue_jp: あんたこそ　何者だ？

dialogue_en: Vincent Valentine.
dialogue_jp: ヴィンセント・ヴァレンタイン
私は……

dialogue_en: security.
dialogue_jp: ここの警備員だ

dialogue_en: Why're you here?
dialogue_jp: 見ない顔だな

dialogue_en: Be brief.
dialogue_jp: なんのようだ？

dialogue_en: Your terminal.
dialogue_jp: 端末を借りたい

dialogue_en: Keycard.
dialogue_jp: カードキーを

dialogue_en: There.
dialogue_jp: どぞ

dialogue_en: Hmph.
dialogue_jp: なるほど

dialogue_en: You have the authorization, at least.
dialogue_jp: 端末の使用権限はあるようだ

dialogue_en: Great.
dialogue_jp: ほな

dialogue_en: Though you're clearly not Murasaki.
dialogue_jp:
しかし　困ったことに
おまえはムラサキではない

dialogue_en: Explain yourself.
dialogue_jp: ムラサキはどうした？

dialogue_en: Och, it's a bit of a long story, and we'd love to tell you all about it, but there's somethin' we really need to look up first.
dialogue_jp:
たしかに　カードキーは別の人のモンですけど
急ぎで調べなアカン情報があるんですわ

dialogue_en: Can't go lettin' our foe win the information war, eh?
dialogue_jp: 敵に先を越されるワケにはいかんのです！

dialogue_en:
Your "foe"?
And who might that be?
dialogue_jp: 敵……おまえの言う敵とは？

dialogue_en:
"Your 'foe'?
And who might that be?"
dialogue_jp: おまえの言う敵とは？

dialogue_en: Shinra.
dialogue_jp: 神羅

dialogue_en: Wutai.
dialogue_jp: ウータイ

dialogue_en: Sephiroth.
dialogue_jp: セフィロス

dialogue_en: Shinra.
dialogue_jp: 神羅

dialogue_en: "Foe-avorite," don't you mean!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん　ちゃいますやろ！

dialogue_en: Wutai.
dialogue_jp: ウータイ

dialogue_en: Excuse me? What's that supposed to mean?
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　ど～ゆ～つもり？

dialogue_en: Kidding.
dialogue_jp: 冗談だ

dialogue_en:
A man who many people─myself included─
once called a hero:
dialogue_jp: 俺たちの敵は　かつて英雄と呼ばれた男

dialogue_en: Sephiroth.
dialogue_jp: セフィロスだ

dialogue_en: He's insane. And he's after something so powerful, it could destroy the planet─unless we stop him.
dialogue_jp:
やつは　星を滅ぼすほどの
強大な力を手に入れようとしている

dialogue_en: I see.
dialogue_jp: なるほど

dialogue_en: Then I've one more sin to atone for.
dialogue_jp: どうやら　私の罪がまたひとつ増えたようだ

dialogue_en: The room is unlocked.
dialogue_jp: 部屋のロックは解除しておいた

dialogue_en: Use it as you see fit...Mr. Murasaki.
dialogue_jp: あとはご自由に　ムラサキ課長

dialogue_en: Don't mind if we do, I guess.
dialogue_jp: 行っていいってこと？

dialogue_en: Touch nothing but the terminal.
dialogue_jp: ほかのものにはさわるなよ

dialogue_en: Let me sleep.
dialogue_jp: 眠らせてくれ

dialogue_en: There she is!
dialogue_jp: ありましたわ！

dialogue_en: Cloud, my boy! Still got that keycard?
dialogue_jp: クラウドはん　カードキーありまっか？

dialogue_en:
Gonna need a bit of time with this.
Might I suggest a spot of recon?
dialogue_jp:
すぐ終わらせますさかい
ちょ～っと待っててくださいね

dialogue_en: This thing's an antique! But gimme a few more minutes and I'll find what we're after.
dialogue_jp:
この端末　えらい旧式です
難儀しますなあ

dialogue_en: You cannae rush a genius, after all!
dialogue_jp: あんま急かさんといてください

dialogue_en: Hng...!
dialogue_jp: あっ……！

dialogue_en: Urg...!
dialogue_jp: うっ……！

dialogue_en: Cloud? Hey, Cloud?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　大丈夫？

dialogue_en: What's wrong?
dialogue_jp: どうしたの？

dialogue_en: Nearly...there.
dialogue_jp: もうすこし……

dialogue_en: A small sample of S tissue...
dialogue_jp: Ｓ皮膚より採取……

dialogue_en: a single strand of S hair...
dialogue_jp: Ｓ頭髪より採取……

dialogue_en: and a few drops of S blood.
dialogue_jp: Ｓ血液より採取……

dialogue_en: Cloud, let's get out of here.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　もう出よう

dialogue_en: Oh no.
dialogue_jp: なに？

dialogue_en: I don't recall giving you permission to go in there.
dialogue_jp: その部屋への立ち入りを許可した覚えはない

dialogue_en: Och, it was an honest mistake!
dialogue_jp: ちょっとした手違いですわ！

dialogue_en: We didn't mean any h─
dialogue_jp: 堪忍して――

dialogue_en: Don't hurt me! Please! I can explain!
dialogue_jp: はなして　やめて　見逃して～！

dialogue_en: Drop him.
dialogue_jp: はなせ

dialogue_en: Why should I?
dialogue_jp: 道理はどちらにある

dialogue_en: He's trespassing. Like you.
dialogue_jp: 私か　おまえか

dialogue_en: Save it. I've had a pretty shit day.
dialogue_jp: 悪いが　色々あってイライラしている

dialogue_en: What a coincidence... So have I.
dialogue_jp: 奇遇だな　私もだ

dialogue_en: Ya damn freak!
dialogue_jp: バケモノめ！

dialogue_en: C'mon!
dialogue_jp: 来るぞ！

dialogue_en: I know your story.
dialogue_jp: ヴィンセントはん

dialogue_en: Vincent Valentine. Former Turk.
dialogue_jp: 元タークスの……ヴィンセント・ヴァレンタイン

dialogue_en: Stumbled on your file in the company database.
dialogue_jp: 端末で調べさせてもらいました

dialogue_en: There's a reason you're alone in the dark down here. And that reason has something to do with Sephiroth, am I right?
dialogue_jp:
こんなところで　くすぶっている理由
セフィロスと関係あるんとちゃいますか？

dialogue_en: That's none of your business.
dialogue_jp: 答える義理はない

dialogue_en: I only ask because you might want to come with us.
dialogue_jp: よかったら　いっしょに行きませんか

dialogue_en: I don't know whether Sephiroth is dead or alive or somethin' in between...
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスの生死に関しては
正直　ボクも半信半疑ですけど

dialogue_en:
but I do know that if I stick with this lot,
I'll find out one way or another.
dialogue_jp:
この人たちについていけば
なんや　わかるかもしれません

dialogue_en: Is this how you want your story to end?
dialogue_jp: このままで　いいんですか？

dialogue_en: Get out... Now.
dialogue_jp: 出ていけ　立ち去れ

dialogue_en: That'll be our way out, then.
dialogue_jp: ほな　行きましょか

dialogue_en:
Now we know where the temple is,
let's not bother the man.
dialogue_jp: 神殿の場所はわかりましたし　長居は無用ですわ

dialogue_en: Hey, space cadet. C'mon.
dialogue_jp: ぼーっとしてんな　行くぞ

dialogue_en: Think there might be top secret materia hidden somewhere here?
dialogue_jp: ここには秘密のマテリアとかないの～？

dialogue_en: That all you ever think about?
dialogue_jp: そればっかか　おまえは！

dialogue_en: Well, excuse me for tryin' to be helpful!
dialogue_jp: あったりまえじゃん　だいたいさ～

dialogue_en: Okay! Next stop: the temple!
dialogue_jp: さあ　いよいよ神殿だよ

dialogue_en: Hear that, black materia? I'm comin' for ya!
dialogue_jp:
なにがなんでも
黒マテリア　いただくからね

dialogue_en: Oh, man! My rep's gonna go through the roof!
dialogue_jp: このままじゃ　アタシのメンツまるつぶれ！

dialogue_en: Well, it ain't like it could go down.
dialogue_jp: おまえのメンツなんて知るか

dialogue_en: So...where is it?
dialogue_jp: 神殿　どこなの？

dialogue_en: Aye, about that...
dialogue_jp: あ～っと　それなんですが

dialogue_en:
What's the matter?
You ain't been bluffin' this whole time, have ya?
dialogue_jp:
まさか　この期に及んで
わからねえとか言い出すんじゃ

dialogue_en:
No, that's not it. We could go there right now
if you really wanted.
dialogue_jp: いやいや　場所はわかったんですが　その……

dialogue_en:
But before that, would you mind a quick trip
to the Saucer?
dialogue_jp: 先に　ゴールドソーサーに寄ってもらえまへんか？

dialogue_en: What!? Why would we wanna go there!?
dialogue_jp: はあ？　なんでよ！

dialogue_en: To even set foot inside the temple, we'll need to get our hands on a relic called the keystone.
dialogue_jp:
神殿に入るためには　『キーストーン』っちゅー
カギが必要なんですが

dialogue_en: Trouble is, it's been missin' for nigh on twenty years.
dialogue_jp: かれこれ２０年　行方知れずらしいんですわ

dialogue_en: So, any guesses as to where it was last seen?
dialogue_jp: ただ　最後にあった場所が……

dialogue_en: The Gold Saucer...
dialogue_jp: ゴールドソーサーなのか

dialogue_en:
I know... It's a stretch, no denying that...
but it's the only lead I've got.
dialogue_jp:
確率は半々です
でも　ほかに手がかりがありません

dialogue_en: Then let's follow it. We trust you.
dialogue_jp: 信じるぞ　ケット・シー

dialogue_en: You do? Thank you!
dialogue_jp: おおきに　ありがとうございます！

dialogue_en: Thank you, thank you!
dialogue_jp: おおきに　おおきに！

dialogue_en:
Well, if we gotta...
Once we're good, let's get a move on.
dialogue_jp: しゃあねえ　仕度ができたら出発だ！

dialogue_en: What's this?
dialogue_jp: なんだあ？

dialogue_en: Urnh...
dialogue_jp: うう……あ……

dialogue_en: Sorry I'm so late to the party, my friend!
dialogue_jp: 待たせたな　マーイフレンド！

dialogue_en: Our long-awaited reunion.
dialogue_jp: ようやく再会できた

dialogue_en: I'm not going with you, so back off!
dialogue_jp: わたし　捕まらないよ？

dialogue_en: You misunderstand.
dialogue_jp: ノー　ノー　ノー

dialogue_en: I'm defying my boss to be here─'cause I've got a hunger that cannot be denied!
dialogue_jp:
これは個人的な戦い
ボスにばれたら　ペナルティダ～イ！

dialogue_en: Cloud. Bring me the black materia.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　俺は黒マテリアが欲しい

dialogue_en: My desire to see you has driven me on.
dialogue_jp: キミに会いたい一心で　ここまで来たんだ

dialogue_en: That's what I get for redlining the old engine...
dialogue_jp: こんなことまでトップスピードとはね

dialogue_en:
Alright, my friend! It's the final lap, so let's gun it,
one last time!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　ラストダンスを楽しもう
マイフレンドー！

dialogue_en: He's mine!
dialogue_jp: ここは　まかせろ！

dialogue_en: You okay?
dialogue_jp: どうした？

dialogue_en: Uh-uh-uh... I won't have your pity. This is a race, remember?
dialogue_jp: これは真剣勝負　情けは無用だろ？

dialogue_en: Come on, Cloud. We're on the homestretch!
dialogue_jp: さあ　命を燃やそうか　クラウド！

dialogue_en: There's no escaping...the degradation...my...friend...
dialogue_jp: 厄介だなあ　劣化は……　マイ……フレ――

dialogue_en: Black...materia...
dialogue_jp: くろ……まてりあ……

dialogue_en: Dream on! That materia's mine!
dialogue_jp: 黒マテリアは　誰にも渡さないよ！

dialogue_en: There's no escaping...the degradation...
dialogue_jp: 厄介だなあ　劣化は……

dialogue_en: That won't happen to you. Don't worry.
dialogue_jp: だいじょうぶだよ　クラウドは

dialogue_en: Yeah, she's right.
dialogue_jp: うん　大丈夫

dialogue_en: You're gonna be just fine.
dialogue_jp: クラウドは大丈夫

dialogue_en: C'mon. The gilded saucer awaits. And the keystone.
dialogue_jp:
行こうぜ
キンピカの楽園　もういちどだ

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: Supporters of the Shinra Resistance Committee.
dialogue_jp: 反神羅連絡会の同志たちよ

dialogue_en:
The hour is upon us when we must rise up
to confront tyranny.
dialogue_jp:
変革の時が訪れた
我々は立ち上がらねばならない

dialogue_en: My name is Glenn Lodbrok, a representative of Wutai's interim government.
dialogue_jp:
私は　ウータイ暫定政府の
グレン・ロズブロークだ

dialogue_en: Mere days ago, Junon's cannon rang out...
dialogue_jp: 先日　ジュノンの大砲が火を噴いたとき

dialogue_en: A message─a declaration by Shinra's new president that he, like his father before him, would rule by fear.
dialogue_jp:
我々は　神羅カンパニーの若き後継者が
父親同様の凶暴な独裁者であることを知った

dialogue_en: What's more...
dialogue_jp: さらに！

dialogue_en: we recently learned that he had sanctioned the development of living weapons─grown within the mako reactors that provide power to your homes.
dialogue_jp:
神羅カンパニーが各地の魔晄炉を使い
モンスター兵器を開発中であるとの情報を入手した

dialogue_en: Alarmed, we decided to seek answers. And in accordance with the cease-fire treaty, our government sent officials to investigate.
dialogue_jp:
そこで　ウータイ暫定政府が停戦協定に基づき
魔晄炉への立ち入り調査を申し入れたところ

dialogue_en: Shinra promised their full cooperation...
dialogue_jp: 神羅カンパニーはこれに応じた

dialogue_en:
But when our inspectors duly arrived,
they were mercilessly slaughtered.
dialogue_jp: しかし　それは残虐で非道な罠だったのだ

dialogue_en: The footage you are about to see was taken from inside one of the reactors.
dialogue_jp: いまから　その様子を撮影した映像を流そう

dialogue_en: This is what Rufus Shinra calls a "cease-fire."
dialogue_jp: これが若き独裁者のやり方らしい

dialogue_en: Friends!
dialogue_jp: 諸君！

dialogue_en: We do not have our enemy's military might.
dialogue_jp: 我らには　神羅のような兵器はない

dialogue_en:
Nevertheless!
A righteous fury burns in each of our hearts!
dialogue_jp:
が　しかし！
心の内に燃える　反神羅の炎がある！

dialogue_en: A fire that we may carry to Midgar─and there...
dialogue_jp:
ひとつひとつの小さな炎を持ち寄れば
それはすぐに──

dialogue_en:
together, put the City of Mako and Misery
to the torch!
dialogue_jp:
すぐに　あの鋼鉄の都市をも溶かすほどの
力となるだろう！

dialogue_en:
This is our answer, Rufus Shinra;
we are ready to march.
dialogue_jp:
ついに　決起の時が来たのだ
準備は整っている

dialogue_en: And to lead us...
dialogue_jp: 諸君に紹介しよう

dialogue_en: Wutai's commander, Viceroy Sarruf.
dialogue_jp: ウータイ暫定政府　スフール総督だ

dialogue_en: Who exactly is this "Sarruf"? The invisible man?
dialogue_jp:
このスフールって何者？
出てこないじゃない

dialogue_en:
Regrettably, we have no intelligence to present
at this time.
dialogue_jp: スフール総督に関する情報は　まったくありません

dialogue_en:
Then you clearly aren't looking hard enough.
Look harder.
dialogue_jp: そんなことってある？　しっかりしなさいよ

dialogue_en: Ma'am.
dialogue_jp: ツォン

dialogue_en: What about that Glenn...what's-his-name?
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　さっきのグレンなんとかは？

dialogue_en: Glenn Lodbrok, ma'am.
dialogue_jp: グレン・ロズブローク

dialogue_en: Ex-SOLDIER, P0 Class─a prototype.
dialogue_jp: 元ソルジャー初期タイプ　クラスＰ０

dialogue_en:
Fifteen years ago, he was sent to Rhadore on a geological survey, which ended in failure and
led to his defection.
dialogue_jp:
１５年前　ラディオルにおける地質調査に参加
任務失敗ののち　軍より離脱

dialogue_en: Hmph! A spineless deserter nursing a grudge, then.
dialogue_jp: 脱走兵風情が　あることないこと言いやがって！

dialogue_en:
Subsequently, Lodbrok took to the road, seeking to forge connections with others who shared his
anti-Shinra sentiments.
dialogue_jp:
その後　各地に散る反神羅の思想を持つ者を
訪ね歩き　人脈を繋いで回ったようです

dialogue_en: If you mean Avalanche, they're dead and buried.
dialogue_jp: アバランチは　ぶっ潰しただろうが

dialogue_en:
I'm afraid I do not, sir.
The fall of the republic triggered a spate of uprisings in the surrounding regions.
dialogue_jp:
ジュノン共和国滅亡後　各地域の処遇を巡って
いくつもの深刻な紛争がありました

dialogue_en: We suspect the SRC is largely comprised of forces who were defeated during the unrest.
dialogue_jp:
反神羅連絡会の大部分は
それら紛争の敗軍の残党と思われます

dialogue_en: ...Well, who could blame them?
dialogue_jp: わかる　わかる

dialogue_en: They fought against the republic in the name of freedom...
dialogue_jp: 自由を求めて　共和国と戦ったのに

dialogue_en: but when the smoke finally cleared, they found themselves under the heel of a new oppressor.
dialogue_jp:
戦争が終わってみたら
支配者が　うちに交代しただけなんだから

dialogue_en: Why, I'd be more surprised if they didn't hate us!
dialogue_jp: アバランチ以外にも　敵はい～っぱい！

dialogue_en:
Pity about Sarruf.
Would be good to put a face to the name.
dialogue_jp: 現れませんね　スフール総督

dialogue_en: The Ancient is en route to the temple as we speak. Pursuing her is our top priority.
dialogue_jp:
泳がせていた古代種が神殿に向かう
こちらを　目下の最優先事項とする

dialogue_en: She will guide us to the promised land.
dialogue_jp: 神羅は約束の地を目指す

dialogue_en: One way─or another.
dialogue_jp: これは使命だ

dialogue_en: Regarding the speech, sir─many will interpret it as a declaration of war.
dialogue_jp:
放送は　多くの市民
各地域の住民たちが見たはずです

dialogue_en:
And given that it was a worldwide broadcast,
it would be prudent to issue a response.
dialogue_jp:
宣戦布告とも受け取れる内容ですから
なんらかの説明が必要かと

dialogue_en: I intend to make a statement.
dialogue_jp: 私が声明を出す

dialogue_en: Tseng, if you would.
dialogue_jp: ツォン　準備を

dialogue_en: Sir.
dialogue_jp: ツォン

dialogue_en:
So...
How exactly are we supposed to get back to the Saucer?
dialogue_jp: んで　こっからゴールドソーサーはどう行くんだ？

dialogue_en: With all the mountains and valleys in between, definitely not on foot. It's just way too far.
dialogue_jp:
歩いていくのは難しいよ
距離だけじゃなくて　山も川もあるし

dialogue_en: Thoughts, Cait Sith?
dialogue_jp: だよね　ケット・シー

dialogue_en: Hey, cat. Thoughts?
dialogue_jp: おい　なんか知らねえのか？

dialogue_en: Um... Well... Y'see...
dialogue_jp: え～っと　あ～っと　う～んと……

dialogue_en: Look. Smoke!
dialogue_jp: 見て　狼煙！

dialogue_en: Maybe someone's trying to call for Cid?
dialogue_jp: 誰かが　シド　呼んでる？

dialogue_en: If so, let's hitch a ride!
dialogue_jp: 行ってみよう　シドがいるかも

dialogue_en: Hey, Cait Sith. Did you hear anything about what went down at the Nibel reactor?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　ケット・シー
ニブル山の魔晄炉でなにがあったか知らないの？

dialogue_en: Not much, I'm afraid... Just that an unknown force had breached the perimeter.
dialogue_jp: ええ～っと　魔晄炉に何者かが忍び込んだので

dialogue_en: Shinra troops were dispatched in response, and a battle ensued.
dialogue_jp:
神羅の軍が急行して
交戦状態にってことらしいですわ

dialogue_en: Now I get it. That was their plan all along.
dialogue_jp: そっか……わざとか

dialogue_en: Eh? Come again?
dialogue_jp: どういう意味です？

dialogue_en: They wanted to be found... They lost on purpose...
dialogue_jp: わざと見つかるようにして　わざと負けたんだ

dialogue_en: That's the only explanation.
dialogue_jp: そうじゃなくちゃ　おかしいもん

dialogue_en: How else would ninjas lose to grunts?
dialogue_jp: だって　シノビの末裔だよ？

dialogue_en: They just threw their lives away? Who would do somethin' like that!?
dialogue_jp:
わざと負けるって　おまえ
わざと死ぬってことだろ？

dialogue_en: I mean, would you!?
dialogue_jp: んなこと　するか？

dialogue_en: Sure I would. In a heartbeat.
dialogue_jp: するよ　もう全然するよ

dialogue_en: So Wutaians really aren't afraid to die...
dialogue_jp: 死をも怖れぬ　ウータイ魂ですな

dialogue_en: Of course we are! It's scary, and it sucks!
dialogue_jp: 怖れるよ　こわいよ　悲しいよ

dialogue_en: But I'd still do it.
dialogue_jp: でも　やるんだよ

dialogue_en: That's how much I hate Shinra!
dialogue_jp: それくらい　神羅を憎んでるの！

dialogue_en: Huh...
dialogue_jp: おう……

dialogue_en: Hey, Yuffie?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　ユフィさん

dialogue_en: You said you thought your people had lost the battle on purpose...but you didnae mention why.
dialogue_jp:
ウータイの兵が　わざと負けたんやとしたら
なんのためでしょうねえ

dialogue_en: To make a point! What better way to prove how evil Shinra is than with a pile of dead bodies?
dialogue_jp:
そりゃ　神羅の陰謀と悪行を
世界中に知らせるためだよ

dialogue_en: My people sacrificed themselves for the greater good! To stoke the flames of rebellion!
dialogue_jp:
どうにかして　事件を世界中に知らせて
反神羅の仲間に奮起を促す！

dialogue_en: Yeah...that's it. It must be.
dialogue_jp: きっとそう　うん　そうだよ

dialogue_en: Aye...I'm starting to think you might be right.
dialogue_jp: なるほど～　そんな気ぃがしてきましたねえ

dialogue_en: Out of curiosity...do you know Viceroy Sarruf?
dialogue_jp: で　ユフィさん　スフール総督はご存知で？

dialogue_en: Duh! I mean, I don't know-know him.
dialogue_jp: そりゃあ知ってるけど　会ったことはないの

dialogue_en: Like, I've never met him or seen his face. But no one has!
dialogue_jp: それどころか　顔を知ってる人もほとんどいない

dialogue_en:
Which makes sense─he's Shinra's most wanted,
so he's gotta lie low─real low.
dialogue_jp:
神羅に命を狙われているから
用心して　身を隠しているんだよね

dialogue_en: Oh! But that's secret! Top secret!
dialogue_jp: あっ　ダメダメ　いまのナイショ！

dialogue_en: Me and my big mouth...
dialogue_jp: みんな　裏切るなよ～

dialogue_en: In response to last night's illegal broadcast by the SRC...
dialogue_jp:
一部地域で
違法に配信された映像について

dialogue_en: President Rufus Shinra held an emergency press conference this morning.
dialogue_jp:
神羅カンパニーのルーファウス社長が
声明を発表いたしました

dialogue_en: In it, the president denounced the SRC's claims as baseless propaganda, and dismissed their alleged mako reactor footage as a digital fabrication.
dialogue_jp:
映像の人物が語った内容に関しては
事実無根であり
魔晄炉内の映像については
捏造であるとのことです

dialogue_en: The company has launched an investigation into the individual who delivered the address, as well as the nature of the organization he claims to represent.
dialogue_jp:
また　人物が何者で
ウータイ暫定政府なる組織が
実在するのか否かも
現在　調査中とのことです

dialogue_en: Ain't never gettin' to space at this rate.
dialogue_jp: こりゃ　宇宙がまた遠のくなあ

dialogue_en: Breaking news at this hour...
dialogue_jp: 臨時ニュースをお伝えします

dialogue_en: Hey.
dialogue_jp: よう！

dialogue_en: Stood up?
dialogue_jp: 客待ちか？

dialogue_en:
Nope. Waitin' on you folks.
Somethin' I wanted to ask.
dialogue_jp:
いや　おまえらを待ってたんだ
ちょっくら　確認したいことがあってな

dialogue_en: About your mother... Her name's Ifalna, right?
dialogue_jp: あんたの母親は　イファルナって名前じゃねえか？

dialogue_en: Maybe. So what?
dialogue_jp: そう……だったら？

dialogue_en: That sounds like a yes to me!
dialogue_jp: って　そのとおりなんだろ？

dialogue_en: I called it the second I saw ya!
dialogue_jp: オレの思ったとおりだぜ

dialogue_en: Boy, am I ever glad I sent up smoke!
dialogue_jp: いや　狼煙あげて正解だったわ！

dialogue_en: Tell me, how she doin'? Good?
dialogue_jp: で　どうしてる　元気か？

dialogue_en: No. She's dead.
dialogue_jp: もう　いないの

dialogue_en:
Y'know, whole reason I joined Shinra was
to become a pilot.
dialogue_jp:
オレは　パイロットになりたくて
神羅に潜り込んでよ

dialogue_en:
But I wound up as a gofer for some
lazy grease monkeys.
dialogue_jp: でも最初は　技術屋のおっさんたちのパシリよ

dialogue_en: Had me runnin' around HQ, fixin' lights and whatnot.
dialogue_jp:
ビルを上へ下へ
メンテナンスでかけずりまわってた

dialogue_en: One time, though, I came across a pretty young thing─with a little girl in her arms.
dialogue_jp:
そんときに偶然　ちっこい女の子を連れた
あの人と出会ってよ

dialogue_en: That was you, wasn't it?
dialogue_jp: あんときの子　あんただよな

dialogue_en: Prob'ly.
dialogue_jp: たぶん

dialogue_en: You were knee-high to a tonberry.
dialogue_jp: あんたは　これっくらいで

dialogue_en: And I was, what─tall as a smogger, I'd wager.
dialogue_jp: んで　オレは　こんなもんか？

dialogue_en: But damn... No longer with us.
dialogue_jp: そっか　もういないか

dialogue_en: That's a cryin' shame. Truly.
dialogue_jp: そっかそっか……そうか

dialogue_en: Hey, missy.
dialogue_jp: なあ　あんた

dialogue_en: It's "Aerith."
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Aerith! Is there anything I can do for ya?
dialogue_jp:
エアリスよお
オレにできること　なんかねえか？

dialogue_en: I wanna help.
dialogue_jp: 力になりたいんだ

dialogue_en: What? Why?
dialogue_jp: えっ　とつぜん

dialogue_en: Just tryin' to do right by ya!
dialogue_jp: 下心なんてないぜ？

dialogue_en: Flying us around'll be more than plenty, thanks.
dialogue_jp: いままでどおり　飛んでくれたら　じゅうぶん

dialogue_en:
Then again, if you're just dyin' to help,
you could take us to the Saucer─for free.
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　ゴールドソーサーまで乗せてくれよ
力になりたいってんなら　タダでよ

dialogue_en: "Free"?
dialogue_jp: シド

dialogue_en: It's fine; we'll pay.
dialogue_jp: ちゃんと払います

dialogue_en: No, 's on me.
dialogue_jp: いや　オレのおごりだ

dialogue_en:
When you wanna head to the Saucer,
just gimme a holler!
dialogue_jp: そんじゃ　飛び立つ準備ができたら声をかけな

dialogue_en: Hey. Good to go?
dialogue_jp: 行けっか？

dialogue_en: Good to go to the Gold Saucer?
dialogue_jp: ゴールドソーサーへ出発しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Let's get a move on then.
dialogue_jp: さあ　乗った乗った

dialogue_en: Huh. An eighth?
dialogue_jp: うん？　増えたか？

dialogue_en: You said that Sephiroth is your foe.
dialogue_jp: おまえたちの敵はセフィロスだとか

dialogue_en: I have a history with him. Unfinished business.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスとは浅からぬ因縁がある
私も行く

dialogue_en: He botherin' you? Want me to give him the boot?
dialogue_jp: どうすんだ　オレが蹴落としてやろうか？

dialogue_en: Try to screw us over and you're a dead man.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちの邪魔をしたら　斬る

dialogue_en: Please, take a seat.
dialogue_jp: ほな　どーぞ

dialogue_en: Do you think you can manage eight?
dialogue_jp: 全員乗せて　飛べそう？

dialogue_en: Ain't gonna lie, that's a tall order for most pilots.
dialogue_jp: 並のパイロットじゃ　無理だろうな

dialogue_en: Lucky for you, I ain't "most pilots."
dialogue_jp: 安心しろ　オレ様は特上だからよ

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん

dialogue_en: I'm picking up protorelic energy signals from a group of robed individuals.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントの集団から　微弱ながら
エンシェントマターの反応を観測しました

dialogue_en: You are?
dialogue_jp: どういうことだ

dialogue_en: Indeed. Though I'm unable to ascertain why.
dialogue_jp: 詳細は不明です　というわけで――

dialogue_en: So...check it out?
dialogue_jp: 調べればいいのか

dialogue_en: How very astute of you!
dialogue_jp: 話が早くて　助かります！

dialogue_en: While they're not in any obvious hurry, they do appear to be heading toward a specific location.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントのみなさんは　休みをはさみつつ
ゆっくりと　どこかへ向かっているようです

dialogue_en: Should you find the time, I ask that you track their movements─see where it is they're going.
dialogue_jp:
お忙しいかと思いますが　手があきましたら
追跡調査をお願いします！

dialogue_en: We're just trailing 'em...?
dialogue_jp: ついていけばいいんだよね？

dialogue_en:
You heard Chadley. That's the plan.
Least till they get to wherever they're going.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　なにか目的があるはずだ
それを確かめる

dialogue_en: Haaawn...nmm...
dialogue_jp: ふわ～あ……

dialogue_en: Gettin' sleepy, are we?
dialogue_jp: 眠いの～？

dialogue_en: With how slow they walk? Who wouldn't?
dialogue_jp: 歩くのが遅すぎるよ

dialogue_en: Can run on ahead and play scout.
dialogue_jp: そのへんを走りまわってこい

dialogue_en: But stay where we can see you!
dialogue_jp: はぐれないよ～に！

dialogue_en: Ever since we left the vale... Never shoulda dropped the intellectual shtick.
dialogue_jp:
はあ　谷からこっち
オイラの扱いが雑だよね

dialogue_en: Urng... Argh...
dialogue_jp: うう……あ……

dialogue_en: Wait.
dialogue_jp: 待て

dialogue_en: Can these guys do anything?
dialogue_jp: 世話が焼けるね

dialogue_en: Hojo made 'em this way, remember?
dialogue_jp: ほとんどは　宝条の犠牲者だ

dialogue_en: Right... Sorry.
dialogue_jp: そうだね　ごめん

dialogue_en: Not to be a downer, but there's no way we can save 'em from everything.
dialogue_jp:
つきっきりってわけにはいかないよ
守りきれるかな？

dialogue_en: We'll do what we can.
dialogue_jp: やれるだけやるさ

dialogue_en: Hey, so...what kinda stuff you think they're thinking about?
dialogue_jp: あの人たち　なに考えてるんだろうね

dialogue_en: The black robes? I dunno... The protorelic maybe?
dialogue_jp:
黒マント？
いまは　エンシェントマターのことじゃないかな

dialogue_en: I doubt they're lucid enough to even know what they're doing. Probably better that way.
dialogue_jp:
黒マント自身は　なにも考えていないと思う
たぶん　そのほうがいい

dialogue_en: Sad, but true. I'll bet they've seen some things...
dialogue_jp: そうだね　ひどい目にあうもんね

dialogue_en: Reduced to their instincts...like animals.
dialogue_jp: 本能で動く動物に近いのかな

dialogue_en: Man... Screw Shinra.
dialogue_jp: 神羅　ヒトデナシだよね

dialogue_en: Damn right.
dialogue_jp: 間違いないな

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん

dialogue_en: Our robed friends are on the move again. If time allows, I would like you to resume your pursuit.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントさんたちが　また動きはじめました
引き続き　追跡をお願いします

dialogue_en: They seem to become more active when you and the others approach them, for reasons I have yet to ascertain...
dialogue_jp:
しかし　クラウドさんたちが戻ってくると
黒マントさんたちが活発化するようなのですが

dialogue_en: One of their many mysteries indeed...
dialogue_jp: なにか関係があるのでしょうか

dialogue_en: The robed individuals have resumed their travels. I'd like you to track them if you have the time.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントさんたちが再び動きはじめました
クラウドさん　追跡調査をお願いします！

dialogue_en: What's that?
dialogue_jp: あれは……

dialogue_en: A Shinra testing facility. They were looking into mako-extraction's effects on the region's water supply.
dialogue_jp:
神羅カンパニーの水質試験場ですね
魔晄採掘による水への影響を調べていたようです

dialogue_en: And?
dialogue_jp: 結果は？

dialogue_en: And they found that there were none. Or so the official statement claimed.
dialogue_jp:
『水質への影響は見られない』
これが公式発表です

dialogue_en: Oh, no need to worry then!
dialogue_jp: 信じられな～い！

dialogue_en: If I may put your minds at ease...
dialogue_jp: いちおう　お知らせしておきますと

dialogue_en: both Nibelheim's water tower and pipe network utilized filtration devices that were state-of-the-art for the time.
dialogue_jp:
ニブルヘイム村の給水塔と水道管には
当初から最新式の浄水装置が内蔵されています

dialogue_en: Furthermore, there was no evidence that water quality was impacted by the reactor.
dialogue_jp:
悪影響の証拠となるデータは見つかりませんから
なんとも言えませんけど

dialogue_en: The filters likely mitigated any deleterious effects.
dialogue_jp:
浄水装置のおかげで
影響が出なかったとも考えられますね

dialogue_en: Well, I grew up drinking that water...
dialogue_jp: 俺は　その水を飲んで育った

dialogue_en: That certainly explains a lot.
dialogue_jp: だから　性格がそんななんだ！

dialogue_en: Sure those filters worked?
dialogue_jp: 証拠が出ちゃったね

dialogue_en: You tell me.
dialogue_jp: 消されるかもな

dialogue_en: Yeesh... What a mess.
dialogue_jp: えっ　廃墟？

dialogue_en: Urgh... Ungh...
dialogue_jp: うう……う……

dialogue_en: Seems like they wanna go inside...
dialogue_jp: 中に入りたいんだね

dialogue_en: Urg...!
dialogue_jp: ぐぅ……！

dialogue_en: Stop running off on your own already!
dialogue_jp: もう　勝手に進むから～

dialogue_en: Heads up!
dialogue_jp: 来るぞ！

dialogue_en: So, is that our proto-majig?
dialogue_jp: それって　エンシェントマター？

dialogue_en: Part of one, looks like.
dialogue_jp: ああ　カケラだな

dialogue_en: A fiend must have ingested the fragment by mistake.
dialogue_jp:
どうやら　先ほどのモンスターの
体内にあったようです

dialogue_en: Little wonder I was unable to locate it.
dialogue_jp: どうりで　反応が観測できないわけです

dialogue_en:
I suspect other creatures are in possession
of the remainder.
dialogue_jp:
ほかのカケラも
モンスターが所持している可能性があります

dialogue_en: So what now?
dialogue_jp: どうやって探す？

dialogue_en:
Your hooded friends may well lead us
to other fragments.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントさんに案内してもらうというのは
どうでしょう？

dialogue_en: Whoa there.
dialogue_jp: おっと！

dialogue_en: Hey, you notice? Only some of 'em have number tats.
dialogue_jp: 腕の数字　ある人とない人がいるね

dialogue_en: Huh...
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Based on what I've seen in Nibelheim...
dialogue_jp: ニブルヘイムで療養されている方には

dialogue_en: victims of mako poisoning─and subjects of Shinra experiments─make up the majority of their number.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄中毒者や　神羅による実験の参加者など
様々な出自の方がいらっしゃいます

dialogue_en: The presence─or lack─of tattoos could be a clue.
dialogue_jp: ナンバーのありなしは　それに関係するのかと

dialogue_en: No one should be marked like cattle─no one.
dialogue_jp: 数字で識別なんて　暴力だよ

dialogue_en: For real.
dialogue_jp: だね

dialogue_en:
Cloud─I've located another group
not far from your location.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドさん　この近くで
新たな黒マントさんたちを発見しました

dialogue_en: I ask that you accompany them to their objective. They may lead us to yet another fragment!
dialogue_jp:
集団で行動しているようです
引き続き　追跡調査をお願いします！

dialogue_en: Uh, I think we got fans.
dialogue_jp: 見て　ついてきてる

dialogue_en: They're after the protorelic too.
dialogue_jp: エンシェントマター狙いだよ

dialogue_en: Ignore 'em.
dialogue_jp: 放っておこう

dialogue_en: Found 'em!
dialogue_jp: 見つけた！

dialogue_en: Where d'ya think these ones're off to?
dialogue_jp: 今度は　どこに行くんだろ？

dialogue_en: My guess? The protorelic.
dialogue_jp: エンシェントマターのところだね

dialogue_en: I gotta say, this is really bumming me out.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　切ないなあ

dialogue_en: What is?
dialogue_jp: なにが？

dialogue_en: These black robes─they all smell the same, more or less...
dialogue_jp:
黒マントの人たちは
みんな　似たようなニオイがするんだ

dialogue_en: 'Cause of the mako, you think?
dialogue_jp: 魔晄の影響かもな

dialogue_en: Could be, but I doubt it. Their scent is...I dunno─heavier?
dialogue_jp:
そうかも　でも
それよりも　もっと悲しいニオイだよ

dialogue_en: To me, a person's scent is one of their most defining features.
dialogue_jp:
オイラにとって
ニオイは　そのひとの大事な個性だよ

dialogue_en: But all these guys smell almost identical.
dialogue_jp: それがいっしょになっちゃうのは　悲しいな

dialogue_en: Hey... What do I smell like?
dialogue_jp: ナナキ　俺のニオイはどうだ？

dialogue_en: You smell like you. Simple as that.
dialogue_jp: クラウドは　クラウドのニオイだね

dialogue_en: And me?
dialogue_jp: アタシは？

dialogue_en: What...? What!? Do I smell like rotten eggs or something!?
dialogue_jp: えっ　なに　なんで黙るの！

dialogue_en: Following those guys to wherever they lead♪
dialogue_jp: 黒マント～　追いかけ～るアタシ～

dialogue_en: Oh, robed guys, you must be cooking underneath those robes♪
dialogue_jp: アタシ追いかける～　黒～マント～

dialogue_en: Yeah... All that black's gotta be stifling.
dialogue_jp:
うわ～……
黒マント　暑そうだよね

dialogue_en: Oh, it is─trust and believe. Hotter than a friggin' oven.
dialogue_jp:
うん　着たことあるけど
けっこー暑いよ

dialogue_en: I still can't believe they managed to cross the desert in those getups. Pretty crazy.
dialogue_jp:
そんな格好で
砂漠も歩いてきたんだよね　すごいね

dialogue_en: Some did. Not all.
dialogue_jp: 脱落した者も多いはずだ

dialogue_en: We ran into a bunch before you joined, Yuffie.
dialogue_jp: ユフィに会う前も　かなり見かけたよね

dialogue_en: In Midgar? I saw my fair share when I was there too.
dialogue_jp: そういえば　アタシもミッドガルで見たよ

dialogue_en: Never came across 'em before that though, now that I think about it...
dialogue_jp: というか　最初に会ったのがそうだったな

dialogue_en: Lived next to one for a bit.
dialogue_jp: 俺の隣人もそうだったな

dialogue_en: Huh? Whaddya think they're pointin' at?
dialogue_jp: えっ　なに　どういうこと？

dialogue_en:
There's a submarine dock beneath the harbor.
Maybe that.
dialogue_jp: 港の下に潜水艦用のドックがある

dialogue_en: I betcha that's where we'll find the protorelic.
dialogue_jp: そこにエンシェントマターがあるのかな

dialogue_en: Oh, I see. Make us go and fish it out...
dialogue_jp: なに　アタシたちに命令してんの？

dialogue_en: Simplest way inside would be by sea...
dialogue_jp: 海側からドックの中に入れるはずだ

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん！

dialogue_en: If you intend to cross the water, you'll need the help of a unique chocobo living in the region.
dialogue_jp:
海を渡るなら　この地域に生息する
海チョコボの力が必要です

dialogue_en: And it just so happens a reclusive chocobo master is said to reside somewhere nearby...
dialogue_jp:
このあたりの人里離れた場所に
伝説のチョコボ仙人が住んでると言います

dialogue_en: They're sure to know the bird's whereabouts.
dialogue_jp: いちど　訪ねてみてはいかがでしょう

dialogue_en: Then Selena's got us covered!
dialogue_jp: シレナに乗れば行けそうだね

dialogue_en: Dang! They're in here too?
dialogue_jp: うわ　ここにもいる！

dialogue_en: Arg... Ah...!
Arg... Ah...!
Arg... Ah...!
Arg... Ah...!
Stop!
dialogue_jp: ダメ！

dialogue_en: Hey...Cloud?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　クラウド

dialogue_en: Yeah?
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: These guys and Sephiroth are related somehow...
dialogue_jp: 黒マントとセフィロスは無関係じゃない

dialogue_en: Like, connected on some really weird, deep level...right?
dialogue_jp:
それどころか　すっごく関係が深い
そうだよね？

dialogue_en: Seems so.
dialogue_jp: だろうな

dialogue_en: "Seems so"?
dialogue_jp: そうなの？

dialogue_en: I don't have proof─just a hunch. But the more I see the more I know I'm right.
dialogue_jp:
証拠とまでは言わないが
そう信じるべき理由がいくつかある

dialogue_en: Just one more reason why we gotta put a stop to that crazy bastard.
dialogue_jp: はやく終わらせてあげないとね　彼らのために

dialogue_en: Oh! I didn't mean to startle you.
dialogue_jp: あっ　失礼しました

dialogue_en: I simply wanted to inform you that I have located more robed individuals.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントさんたちが動きはじめましたので
いちはやくお伝えしようかと

dialogue_en: Copy. Send us the coordinates.
dialogue_jp: わかった　どこへ行けばいい？

dialogue_en: Of course, right away!
dialogue_jp: はい　こちらです！

dialogue_en: There they are!
dialogue_jp: いたいた！

dialogue_en: Urgh... Arrrgh!
dialogue_jp: う……ああああ……！

dialogue_en: Wait. Something's not right.
dialogue_jp: 待って　なにか変だよ

dialogue_en: Those monsters─they're Hojo's!
dialogue_jp: あいつら　宝条の！

dialogue_en: Shit!
dialogue_jp: 来るぞ！

dialogue_en: What could his experiments be doing in a place like this? Unless... No!
dialogue_jp:
宝条博士のモンスターが
どうして……まさか

dialogue_en:
Well now... This I did not expect.
My precious specimens...
dialogue_jp:
これはこれは　またおそろいで
我が愛しの実験体よ

dialogue_en: and you─
dialogue_jp: それと――

dialogue_en: Chadley.
dialogue_jp: チャドリー

dialogue_en:
Model number CDA-6, was it?
Or...seven, perhaps?
dialogue_jp:
ああ　型式番号はＣＤＡ－６
いや……７だったかな？

dialogue_en: One, two, three, four, five, six... Aha.
dialogue_jp: いち　に　さん　し　ご　ろく……と

dialogue_en: Yes, lucky number seven.
dialogue_jp: ふむ　やはり７だ

dialogue_en: You and your brothers are just full of surprises, aren't you?
dialogue_jp:
見ないと思ったら
管理プログラムを解いたのか

dialogue_en: Don't be shy now. Open up and let me see what makes you tick. There's a good boy...
dialogue_jp:
いいぞ　頭の中を見せておくれ
チャドリー？

dialogue_en: What is it?
dialogue_jp: どうした？

dialogue_en: Nothing... I'm fine.
dialogue_jp: いえ……問題ありません

dialogue_en: Look!
dialogue_jp: ねえ！

dialogue_en: It seems our robed friends are on the move again. You'd best follow closely behind.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントさんたちが動きはじめました
引き続き　追跡をお願いします

dialogue_en: I would hate for any of them to run afoul of one of Hojo's experiments.
dialogue_jp:
ほかにも　宝条博士のモンスターがいる
可能性が高いです

dialogue_en: Please... Keep them from harm.
dialogue_jp: みなさん　くれぐれも気をつけてください

dialogue_en: Hey...
dialogue_jp: あれ……？

dialogue_en: That group from before. Where'd they go?
dialogue_jp: 黒マントたち　いなくなったね

dialogue_en: Killed by fiends, maybe... Or forced to fuse with 'em.
dialogue_jp: モンスターに襲われたか　融合したか

dialogue_en: Hojo's dead.
dialogue_jp: 許せないよ

dialogue_en: So, you got any idea what's up here?
dialogue_jp: この上は　なんだろうね

dialogue_en: Old lighthouse, among other things. Never checked it out myself though.
dialogue_jp:
行ったことはないが
灯台と関連する施設があるはずだ

dialogue_en: I wonder if there's a tearoom!
dialogue_jp: 茶屋　あるかな？

dialogue_en: A what?
dialogue_jp: 茶屋？

dialogue_en: A tearoom! In Wutai, ya can't throw a ninja star without hitting at least a couple, ya know.
dialogue_jp:
えっ　なに　変？
ウータイじゃあたりまえにあるよ

dialogue_en: Tea's always free! The food on the other hand... That's how they getcha.
dialogue_jp: お茶は飲み放題だけど　お菓子が高いの

dialogue_en: That so? Well...I don't think we're gonna find one here...or anywhere else nearby.
dialogue_jp:
そうか　でも残念だな
たぶん……ないだろう

dialogue_en: Boo!
dialogue_jp: ないか～

dialogue_en: We should go on ahead─make sure it's safe.
dialogue_jp: 先に入って　安全を確認しておこう

dialogue_en: Beastie─twelve o'clock!
dialogue_jp: うわ　出た！

dialogue_en: Uhrrr...
dialogue_jp: ううう……

dialogue_en: Did they multiply?
dialogue_jp: なんか　増えてない？

dialogue_en: Ragh... Urg...
dialogue_jp: ああ……あ……

dialogue_en: Broden?
dialogue_jp: ブロード？

dialogue_en: Broden! Hey! Snap out of it!
dialogue_jp: おい……しっかりしろ　おい！

dialogue_en: Wait... The guy from Kalm!?
dialogue_jp: カームで助けてくれた人だよね

dialogue_en: Is he mako poisoned?
dialogue_jp: 魔晄中毒？

dialogue_en: I don't know.
dialogue_jp: わからない

dialogue_en: No...he's a former SOLDIER.
dialogue_jp: いや　元ソルジャーだ

dialogue_en: It calls...to me.
dialogue_jp: 呼んで……いる

dialogue_en: I...must answer.
dialogue_jp: 行かない　と……

dialogue_en: The...the reunion...
dialogue_jp: リ……ユニ……オン……

dialogue_en: It's time...
dialogue_jp: 行こう

dialogue_en: Re...u...nion...
dialogue_jp: リ……ユニ……オン……

dialogue_en:
Do you think he was gettin' treatment
in Nibelheim too?
dialogue_jp: あの人も　ニブルヘイムにいたのかな

dialogue_en: You good?
dialogue_jp: クラウド？

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん！

dialogue_en:
I've found another gathering of these individuals─
the largest yet.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントのみなさんが
これまでにない大規模な移動を開始しました

dialogue_en: It would appear that they're headed for the coastline. Do you think you could investigate for me?
dialogue_jp:
どうやら　海岸へと向かっているようです
至急　調査をお願いします

dialogue_en: Will do.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: It's time... Time we checked it out.
dialogue_jp: 行こう……行かないと

dialogue_en: What in the─ What're they doing!?
dialogue_jp: ちょっ……あれ　なにしてんの？

dialogue_en: Trying to cross the water.
dialogue_jp: 海を渡る気だ

dialogue_en: C'mon.
dialogue_jp: 急ごう

dialogue_en: Why...?
dialogue_jp: ああ……！

dialogue_en: I mean, they might make it.
dialogue_jp: あの人たちなら行けるのかも

dialogue_en: Maybe... Guys're nothing if not tenacious.
dialogue_jp: ああ　もう人間ではないのかもな

dialogue_en: Where are they even trying to go?
dialogue_jp: でも　助けるんでしょ？

dialogue_en: That island. That's where they're being called.
dialogue_jp: あの島だ　あそこにいる

dialogue_en: What? How d'you know that?
dialogue_jp: えっ　なんでわかんの？

dialogue_en: I, uh...
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: Got a feeling...is all.
dialogue_jp: 勘としか言えない

dialogue_en: That's good enough for me. Let's check it out.
dialogue_jp: いいよ　あの島へ行ってみよう

dialogue_en: Whoa... There's so many of 'em!
dialogue_jp: うわ　集まってる

dialogue_en: You want us to go that way?
dialogue_jp: あっちに行けってこと？

dialogue_en: What're they─
dialogue_jp: なにして――

dialogue_en: Ahhhr...
dialogue_jp: おおおお……！

dialogue_en: Whoa...uh...hey...!?
dialogue_jp: おっとっとっと！

dialogue_en: What is this?
dialogue_jp: どうなってんの？

dialogue_en: A wayward soul?
dialogue_jp: 異界の迷い人か

dialogue_en: He's all yours.
dialogue_jp: おまえにまかせよう

dialogue_en: Summoned by churls? How dare you!
dialogue_jp: 我を引きずり出すとは　この無礼者！

dialogue_en: For this outrage, I demand satisfaction!
dialogue_jp:
その首　叩き斬ってやるから
そこにひざまずけ！

dialogue_en: Rousing─inspiring even! I must fight in earnest!
dialogue_jp: 良きかな良きかな　興が乗ってきたわ！

dialogue_en: ...Hm? Wait.
dialogue_jp: って……あら？

dialogue_en: The curtain has fallen...and I depart the stage.
dialogue_jp: 残念無念　これまでか

dialogue_en: Find me the black materia, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: 黒マテリアを探せ　クラウド

dialogue_en: Huh? Cloud!?
dialogue_jp: えっ　クラウド？

dialogue_en: Billy? What are you doing out here?
dialogue_jp: グリングリン　ここでなにをしている？

dialogue_en: Um...
dialogue_jp: うん……

dialogue_en:
I haven't had much luck at the racetrack lately...
Not the good kind, that's for sure.
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーでレースに挑戦してたんだけど
ちょっと　スランプみたいで

dialogue_en: So I came here to train.
dialogue_jp: チョコボ修行にきたんだ

dialogue_en: Train? Here?
dialogue_jp: 修行？　ここで？

dialogue_en: You don't know where you are?
dialogue_jp: 知らないの？

dialogue_en:
This is the home of the chocobo sage!
A living legend! Surely you've heard of the man?
dialogue_jp:
ここは　チョコボ界で知らない者はいない
伝説の人物　チョコボ仙人の家だよ

dialogue_en: Ahahaha! Did someone say "livin' legend"?
dialogue_jp: ほ～ほほ　ワシを呼んだかの

dialogue_en: You okay, sir!?
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫ですか　仙人！

dialogue_en: ...I am now. Thought I was a goner.
dialogue_jp: ふう　死ぬかと思ったぞい

dialogue_en: Mind tellin' me who you are? Don't get many visitors out here in the boonies.
dialogue_jp:
こんなヘンピなところにやってくる
モノ好きは　だれかいの？

dialogue_en: Uh...this is Cloud. He's a jockey for Gramps's ranch.
dialogue_jp:
彼は　クラウド
グリン牧場の騎手をしてもらってます

dialogue_en: Oh, he is, huh?
dialogue_jp: ほ～ん

dialogue_en: Perfect. Billy here needs some help─you can pick up the poor boy's slack.
dialogue_jp:
ふむ　ならちょーどええ
おまえさんも　手伝っていけ

dialogue_en: There's this big race at the Saucer, the Gold Cup, and it's coming up soon.
dialogue_jp:
今度　『ゴールドカップ』っていう
特別なチョコボレースがあって

dialogue_en: See?
dialogue_jp: ほら！

dialogue_en: We gotta get in on that, so I came here to bone up. I'm learnin' all sortsa stuff!
dialogue_jp:
それに出場するために　仙人から
チョコボ育成の極意を教えてもらってるんだ

dialogue_en: Hey─tell me you're not buyin' this chocodung.
dialogue_jp: ねえ　だまされてるんじゃないの？

dialogue_en: Picking garbage out of a pool isn't training─it's manual labor!
dialogue_jp:
修行とか言いながら
身のまわりの世話を押しつけるつもりだよ

dialogue_en: You see it too, right?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　どう思う？

dialogue_en: What do you make of the situation?
dialogue_jp: チョコボ仙人を　どう思う？

dialogue_en: It is pretty weird.
dialogue_jp: どう見ても怪しい

dialogue_en: The man's not a sage.
dialogue_jp: ただのじいさんだ

dialogue_en: This sage is the real deal.
dialogue_jp: タダモノではない

dialogue_en: So weird!
dialogue_jp: だよね～

dialogue_en: C'mon─he's just jerkin' you around!
dialogue_jp: あんた　やめたほうがいいよ

dialogue_en: I suppose I haven't done much 'cept pick up after him...
dialogue_jp: う～ん　たしかに毎日掃除ばかりだけど

dialogue_en: Well, doi, he's not a "sage." This guy's like the king of the crazy old coots!
dialogue_jp:
ただのっていうか
ものすご～く　ジジイだよね

dialogue_en: Dunno about "coot," but Gramps did say he was already old when he was young.
dialogue_jp:
グリンじいちゃんが子供のときには
すでに　じいさんだったって言ってた

dialogue_en: What!?
dialogue_jp: ええ～？

dialogue_en: If anyone was gonna get it, figures it'd be you!
dialogue_jp: さすがクラウド　わかってるね

dialogue_en: This man right here wrote the book on chocobo rearin'!
dialogue_jp: 仙人は　チョコボ育成理論の基礎を作った人で

dialogue_en: In fact, pretty much all the major breeds maintained these days are products of his techniques!
dialogue_jp:
現在　一般的に広まっているチョコボは
仙人によって品種改良されたものなんだよ

dialogue_en: If you can flap your gums, you can move your gams. Now get on back to your trainin'.
dialogue_jp:
な～にを　コソコソと話しちょる
すっかり手が止まっとるの～

dialogue_en: Sorry!
dialogue_jp: すいません！

dialogue_en: As for you...
dialogue_jp: さて……

dialogue_en: I know just the thing. One of my chocobos ran off when we put her out to pasture.
dialogue_jp:
おまえさんには
ワシのチョコボを迎えにいってもらおうかの

dialogue_en: Need you to find her─bring her back.
dialogue_jp: 遊びにいったまま　帰ってこんのじゃ

dialogue_en: You're asking me?
dialogue_jp: なぜ　俺が？

dialogue_en: Her name is Selena. Ain't your normal chocobo neither─loves the ocean more'n home.
dialogue_jp:
名前は　シレナ
波の上を駆け　水を操る海チョコボじゃ

dialogue_en: The way she makes rollin' waves look like solid ground... No wonder she thinks she's the bee's knees.
dialogue_jp:
ワシでも手を焼くほど気難しいヤツだからな
せえぜえ　ご機嫌をとるこっちゃ

dialogue_en:
Please, Cloud. Would you mind?
Just...think of it as a favor for me.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　ごめん
ぼくのためだと思って　力を貸して

dialogue_en: You've got a gift for wranglin' the wild ones!
dialogue_jp: クラウドにとっては簡単なことだよね？

dialogue_en: A bird that runs on water? Already found 'em.
dialogue_jp: 海チョコボなら　もう捕まえた

dialogue_en: Haven't had this many visitors in ages. Honestly, I almost forgot what it was like.
dialogue_jp:
いやはや　にぎやかじゃの～
こんなに人がおるのは　いつぶりじゃ？

dialogue_en: Last ones were my disciples. Went by... Huh... What were those boys' names again?
dialogue_jp:
まえにも若者が住みついとったが
はて　なんて名だったかの？

dialogue_en: That's strange... Coulda sworn I asked you to bring me back a certain water-lovin' chocobo.
dialogue_jp:
はて　おまえさんには
海チョコボの捕獲を頼んだはずじゃが？

dialogue_en: Guess we're both "bonin' up" now, huh?
dialogue_jp: なんか　巻き込んじゃってごめんね

dialogue_en: Hey, you find the bird the chocobo sage was talkin' about? If you're havin' trouble, just start by lookin' for tracks.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　仙人の海チョコボは見つかった？
チョコボ探しは　まず足跡からだよ

dialogue_en: That "sage" is a hack. And trust me, I should know.
dialogue_jp:
アタシ　えらそうな師匠って
大キライなんだよね

dialogue_en: His kind're nothin' but hot air, never practicin' what they preach.
dialogue_jp:
くちばっかりで
自分では動かないっしょ　あいつらって

dialogue_en: You shoulda seen this one loser. The jerk couldn't hear any of us over the sound of his own stupid voice.
dialogue_jp:
それに　アタシたちの声はぜんぜん聞かないの
そんなんだから――

dialogue_en: Who exactly?
dialogue_jp: 誰のことだ

dialogue_en: My old man...
dialogue_jp: アタシのオヤジ！

dialogue_en: Heh.
dialogue_jp: ふん

dialogue_en: Excuse you! It's not funny.
dialogue_jp: 笑い事じゃないんだよ～

dialogue_en: That chocobo over there. It's just gotta be the sage's.
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　仙人のチョコボ
あれじゃない？

dialogue_en: That's Selena.
dialogue_jp: シレナだったな

dialogue_en: Bird sounded kind of, uh, temperamental, so let's not rush this!
dialogue_jp: 気難しい性格だって言ってたし　慎重にね

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエッ！

dialogue_en: Wow! Not even the feisty Selena was a challenge for our star wrangler, Cloud!
dialogue_jp:
いま　クラウド選手が
気難しいと言われるチョコボを難なく捕獲！

dialogue_en: How does he do it, folks!?
dialogue_jp: すごいね～　いよっ！

dialogue_en: Impressive work by Cloud today! Though it wasn't easy, he finally brought the feisty Selena to heel!
dialogue_jp:
いま　クラウド選手が
気難しいと言われるチョコボをやっとのことで捕獲

dialogue_en: Lucky for him, because more attempts would have been humiliating!
dialogue_jp: なんとか　メンツを保ちました～！

dialogue_en: Let's get her back to ol' sageykins, shall we?
dialogue_jp: ほんじゃ　報告に戻りますか

dialogue_en: Hey! Nice goin', catchin' Selena.
dialogue_jp: よかった　シレナを捕まえたんだね

dialogue_en: Sage is gonna be real pleased.
dialogue_jp: 仙人が待ちわびてるよ

dialogue_en: There you are, Selena!
dialogue_jp: おお　シレナ！

dialogue_en:
Well, I underestimated ya.
Takes real skill to tame this girl.
dialogue_jp:
おまえさん　こいつを連れ帰るとは
なかなか見どころがある

dialogue_en: Skills like those of... Hold on... I know this... I do.
dialogue_jp:
ひょっとすると　ええと
あれじゃ……なんだ？

dialogue_en: Why can't I remember!?
dialogue_jp: あいつらの名前が出てこんわい！

dialogue_en: Dammit! This is gonna bother me all day!
dialogue_jp: ぐう～　くやしい！

dialogue_en: Aha! There we go! It was Sam and Will!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　思い出した
サムとリングリン！

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: えっ？

dialogue_en: They were far and away my best disciples.
dialogue_jp: ワシの　最高の弟子たちじゃ

dialogue_en: As I was sayin'. You, Cloud? You may well become as talented a trainer as them one day.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドよ　おまえさんは
ふたりと肩を並べるほどの逸材かもしれんぞ

dialogue_en: Did I hear you right!? "Sam"? You gotta tell me everything you know about him!
dialogue_jp:
仙人　教えてください
そのサムのこと　教えてください！

dialogue_en: You're gonna give me whiplash, son!
dialogue_jp: やや　やめんか！

dialogue_en:
The "Sam" guy you taught...
You mean "Chocobo Sam" out of Midgar?
dialogue_jp:
仙人の弟子だったサムは
ミッドガルの　チョコボ・サムですよね

dialogue_en: I do, but...why d'you wanna know?
dialogue_jp: そのはずだが　それがどうした

dialogue_en:
Because me and him, we got history.
Y'see...I'm Will's son.
dialogue_jp:
リングリンは　ぼくの父です
ぼくは　リングリンの息子なんです

dialogue_en: Well, don't that beat all...
dialogue_jp: ほお……

dialogue_en: I'll never forget those two.
dialogue_jp: サムとリングリンは

dialogue_en: They had such a powerful passion─and an eagerness to learn too.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボ愛と情熱にあふれる
すばらしい青年たちじゃったの

dialogue_en: Everything they did was for the birds.
dialogue_jp: 毎日　熱心に勉強しておったわい

dialogue_en: That's not the Sam I know!
dialogue_jp: そんなはずはありません！

dialogue_en: Sam's a demon. He led my parents to an early grave.
dialogue_jp:
父さんと母さんは
サムにはめられて死んだんだ

dialogue_en: Got them hooked on gambling, pushed 'em to rack up tons of debt...and then...
dialogue_jp:
ギャンブル漬けにされて
借金を背負わされて　それで――

dialogue_en: Hmm, that don't sound like him to me.
dialogue_jp: ふ～む　信じられんのう

dialogue_en:
You sure you ain't got your Sams mixed up?
It's a common name, y'know.
dialogue_jp:
サムはサムでも
サム違いということはないのかの？

dialogue_en: Only one "Sam" in this business!
dialogue_jp: チョコボ業界にサムはひとりです！

dialogue_en: I swore that I'd humiliate him by winning the Gold Cup─destroy his reputation.
dialogue_jp:
だからぼくは　ゴールドカップに出て
サムのチョコボをコテンパンに打ち負かして

dialogue_en: Then I'd at least have some kind of revenge for what that bastard did to my parents!
dialogue_jp:
父さんと母さんの
カタキを取らなきゃダメなんだ　絶対に！

dialogue_en: Now that that's outta your system...back to it.
dialogue_jp: まあ……それはそれとして　じゃな

dialogue_en: Excuse me!?
dialogue_jp: 仙人！

dialogue_en: You heard me. Thought you came out here to learn about chocobos, not to "get revenge."
dialogue_jp:
おまえさんは　チョコボのことを
学びに来たのではなかったのかのう

dialogue_en: Cloud...
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: For your next task, I'll need you to take Selena and gather chocograss─which so happens to grow above bodies of water.
dialogue_jp:
シレナに乗って　海や湖の上にふわふわ浮かんどる
『チョコボ草』をとってきてくれんかの？

dialogue_en: You kiddin' me!? This fossil's trying to get us to do his dirty work again!?
dialogue_jp:
あっ　このジジイ
またコキ使おうとしてる！

dialogue_en: Chocograss is a genuine panacea. I kid you not─it'll cure whatever ails ya, and then some.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボ草は万能薬
あれを飲めば　ワシの朽ちかけた体も元気になろう

dialogue_en: And once I am cured...maybe I'll be inclined to share more stories about the good old days.
dialogue_jp:
気分も良くなって
昔話も気持ちよくできるというもの

dialogue_en: Ugh. He's obviously full of it.
dialogue_jp: あ～　完全にだましにきてる

dialogue_en: If not for him, then please─do it for me!
dialogue_jp:
たとえそうでも
クラウド　お願い！

dialogue_en: I need to know what happened to my dad!
dialogue_jp: どうしても　父さんのことが知りたいんだ

dialogue_en: Okay.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: When I said it grows above water, I meant above.
dialogue_jp: チョコボ草　またの名を浮遊草

dialogue_en: It's called the "floatin' flower" 'cause it grows in the air...
dialogue_jp:
その名のとおり
空中に浮かんでいる不思議な草じゃが

dialogue_en: but with an ocean chocobo, you can harvest the stuff with ease.
dialogue_jp: 海チョコボの力を使えば　スイスイのスイよ

dialogue_en: Thirty tufts oughta do.
dialogue_jp: ３０は欲しいの

dialogue_en: Best hop to it, Cloud. You don't want my death on your hands, do ya?
dialogue_jp:
急げよ　クラウド
ワシの残り時間は少ないぞ

dialogue_en: Can't believe my dad and uncle trained here back in the day.
dialogue_jp: 父さんとサムが　ここで修行してたなんて

dialogue_en: I bet he was schemin' against my dad ever since they were both apprentices...
dialogue_jp:
もしかして　サムは弟子の時から
父さんをだましていたのかも

dialogue_en: Y'find any chocograss?
dialogue_jp: チョコボ草は集まった？

dialogue_en: Y'all should have no trouble snaggin' some if you've got a bird that can walk on water.
dialogue_jp:
海チョコボの力を使えば
浮かんでるチョコボ草をとれるはずだよ

dialogue_en: Hey, since you seem to be in the know, gimme the skinny. Who's this Sam guy?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　サムって誰？
クラウドも知ってるっぽかったけど

dialogue_en: Big shot in Wall Market.
dialogue_jp: ウォール・マーケットの住人だ

dialogue_en: Aha. So he must be pretty scummy.
dialogue_jp: ああ　じゃあ悪党だね

dialogue_en: I dunno... Corneo business aside, he didn't strike me as a total asshole.
dialogue_jp:
いや　どうかな
そこまでの悪いやつという印象はない

dialogue_en: Interesting...
dialogue_jp: へえ～

dialogue_en: Or maybe your powers of perception weren't honed enough to see through his facade.
dialogue_jp:
でもさ　それって
クラウドがだまされたんじゃない？

dialogue_en: That's gotta be it...
dialogue_jp: 適当なことを言うな

dialogue_en: Oh, if only I had found you sooner. I could have saved you from your own gullibility!
dialogue_jp:
だって　クラウドだもん
本気でやられたら　ころっとだまされそうだよね

dialogue_en: That's a decent amount of chocograss, I suppose. Well, whaddya think? Should we take it back to the sage?
dialogue_jp:
チョコボ草　じゅうぶん集まったね
どうする　じいさんに届ける？

dialogue_en: Holy crap, that's─that's all of it! Old sageykins is gonna owe us big time!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボ草　ぜ～んぶゲット～！
あとは届けるだけだね

dialogue_en: Oh, welcome back. Get any chocograss?
dialogue_jp:
おかえり
チョコボ草　手に入った？

dialogue_en: Sage's gonna be real pleased.
dialogue_jp: 仙人が待ちわびてるよ

dialogue_en: Oh! You get your hands on that chocograss?
dialogue_jp: おお　チョコボ草は手に入ったかの？

dialogue_en: What will you do?
dialogue_jp: 集めたチョコボ草を渡しますか？

dialogue_en: Hand over all the chocograss you have.
dialogue_jp: 持ってるだけ渡す

dialogue_en: Ask for info about the chocograss.
dialogue_jp: チョコボ草について聞く

dialogue_en: Nothing.
dialogue_jp: 渡さない

dialogue_en: Huh? Is this a joke? Ya ain't got nothin'.
dialogue_jp:
うん？
おまえさん　なんも持っとらんぞ

dialogue_en: Huh? This all ya got? It ain't nowhere near enough.
dialogue_jp: うん　こんだけか？　もっと必要じゃの

dialogue_en: Some folks also call it the "floatin' flower."
dialogue_jp: チョコボ草　またの名を浮遊草

dialogue_en: They don't mean it metaphorically─it really floats above water.
dialogue_jp:
水がある場所の上空に
ふわふわ浮いとる　不思議な草じゃ

dialogue_en: Makes it hard to get to. With Selena though, you'll glide over that water with the greatest of ease.
dialogue_jp:
採取するには　シレナの力を
うま～く使いこなす必要があるの

dialogue_en: ...Hurry. I don't have long to live.
dialogue_jp:
ゲホゲホ……
急ぐのだ　クラウドよ

dialogue_en: Well, well. If it ain't my beloved chocograss!
dialogue_jp: おお　チョコボ草じゃチョコボ草じゃ

dialogue_en: This stuff can be one hell of a hassle to gather. Thank goodness I had you to get it for me!
dialogue_jp:
うれしいの～　ありがたいの～
おまえさんに頼んでよかったわい！

dialogue_en: Okay, so what're you gonna do with it?
dialogue_jp: んで　これをどうすんの？

dialogue_en: I suppose you've earned the right to know.
dialogue_jp: ふっふっふ　特別に教えてやろうかの～

dialogue_en: First, I take this fluff, mix it with some chocobo feathers, and let it ferment. Once it's dry, I boil it all down.
dialogue_jp:
この草をの　チョコボの羽根といっしょに
発酵乾燥させての　コトコトじっくり煮出すんじゃ

dialogue_en: Then I squeeze it all out and─voila! My patented chocotincture!
dialogue_jp:
そいつを　ぎゅ～っとしぼりとったのが
このチョコボエキスじゃ！

dialogue_en: That some kinda magic medicine?
dialogue_jp: それが万能薬なの？

dialogue_en: Oh, no. Just a little fun.
dialogue_jp: いんや　ただの嗜好品じゃ

dialogue_en: Hih, chih, chih, chih!
dialogue_jp: シュシュシュ！

dialogue_en: This wrinkly, cheeky old...
dialogue_jp: このジジイ～！

dialogue_en: Speakin' of grass, if you've got some extra tufts on hand, would you mind sharin' 'em with my assistant at the shop?
dialogue_jp:
そうじゃ　チョコボ草がまだあるなら
あとは　店番をやっとる助手に渡してくれ

dialogue_en: I promise I'll make it worth your while.
dialogue_jp: それなりの礼はするんでな

dialogue_en: Please, tell me about my father.
dialogue_jp: 仙人　どうか父さんの話を！

dialogue_en: Hold your chocobos, son. There's still one thing you need to do for me first.
dialogue_jp:
まだじゃ　あとひとつ
やらねばならないことがある

dialogue_en: What a surprise... This geezer isn't gonna tell you jack. Face it, kid!
dialogue_jp:
やっぱり！
ジジイ　なんにも教える気ないんじゃん

dialogue_en: You got a lotta nerve!
dialogue_jp: ひどいこと言うの～

dialogue_en: Castin' aspersions─after all the wisdom I've shared!
dialogue_jp:
しっかり学んでおいて
なんじゃ　その言い草は

dialogue_en: All the what now?
dialogue_jp: どういうことだ

dialogue_en: So you haven't realized you've been trainin' this whole time?
dialogue_jp: 騎手能力を鍛えてやったことに　気づかんか？

dialogue_en: Trackin' down Selena forced you to get in touch with a chocobo's feelings.
dialogue_jp:
シレナの捕獲を通じて
チョコボの気持ちを読む力を

dialogue_en: And all that runnin' across the water you did helped hone your sense of balance and your bird handlin'─key skills for any aspirin' jockey.
dialogue_jp:
シレナに乗って海を走ることで　バランス感覚と
操縦技術を向上させたというワケじゃ

dialogue_en: Whaddya say, Cloud? Betcha feel like a real choco-pro by now.
dialogue_jp:
どうじゃ　クラウド
ひと皮むけた気がするじゃろ？

dialogue_en: Can't say I do.
dialogue_jp: 実感がない

dialogue_en: Sounds to me like you need more trainin'. Reckon we oughta add one more item to your regimen.
dialogue_jp:
それは困った問題じゃの
やはり　もうひと課題やらねばな

dialogue_en: Think of it as a "final trial" of sorts.
dialogue_jp: 言わば　最終試験じゃ

dialogue_en: Oh, give me a break. Don't go changin' the subject here, Gramps! We're not doing your stupid "trial"!
dialogue_jp:
また～？　っていうか
試験ってなに　話変わってない？

dialogue_en: No, it's fine. I'll do it.
dialogue_jp: いやいい　やる

dialogue_en: Then it's settled! I'll be your opponent.
dialogue_jp: よ～し　ワシと競争じゃ！

dialogue_en: And dear Selena'll be your steed.
dialogue_jp: おまえさんには　シレナを貸してやろう

dialogue_en: If Cloud wins...does that mean you'll finally tell me about my dad?
dialogue_jp:
クラウドが勝ったら
父さんの話　聞かせてくれますね？

dialogue_en: You've got a deal─but know that I won't be pullin' any punches out there.
dialogue_jp:
よかろう
せえぜえシレナの調整に励むがいい

dialogue_en: When you're ready, gimme a holler and we can hit the track.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　準備ができたら声をかけてくれい

dialogue_en: You prepared to undertake the final trial?
dialogue_jp: 最終試験の準備はできたかの？

dialogue_en: Undertake Zoom de Chocobo?
dialogue_jp: 『ジェット・デ・チョコボ』に挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Make sure you're good an' ready.
dialogue_jp: 準備はしっかりね

dialogue_en: What're ya thinkin'?
dialogue_jp: どのパーツにする？

dialogue_en: The sage's bird is somethin' else.
dialogue_jp: さすが　仙人のチョコボだね

dialogue_en: Let's try some different gear!
dialogue_jp: 調整すれば　望みはあるよ

dialogue_en: I'm countin' on ya, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: 絶対に勝ってね

dialogue_en: Hmm... You know what I've taught you, but you haven't applied it.
dialogue_jp:
ふ～む　まだ教えが
体に染みついておらんようじゃの

dialogue_en: Meh... "If at first you don't succeed," et cetera.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　あと何度か競争すれば
なじんでくるわ

dialogue_en: Now hop to─prove you've got what it takes.
dialogue_jp: というわけで　試験は続行じゃ

dialogue_en: Learn from your mistakes. Only then will ya be able to improve.
dialogue_jp: しっかり反省し　次につなげるんじゃな

dialogue_en: Don't just ride the bird, ride with the bird!
dialogue_jp: もっとチョコボと一体になるよう　心掛けよ

dialogue_en: Remember, your gear's as important as your bird.
dialogue_jp: レースパーツを見直してみるのも手じゃよ

dialogue_en: Hahaha. Took ya a couple tries, I see.
dialogue_jp: ふひひ　かなり苦労したようじゃな

dialogue_en: But hey, don't let a rough run or two make ya question if you're cut out for this life.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　うまく操縦できんからといって
落ち込まんでええぞ

dialogue_en: Bird handlin' is an art─one that requires hours of practice to perfect.
dialogue_jp:
それだけ　チョコボは
奥が深い生き物ということじゃ

dialogue_en: So keep on keepin' on. You'll get there someday.
dialogue_jp: これからも　敬意を持って鍛錬するがよい

dialogue_en: Looks like all that trainin' I made ya do paid off.
dialogue_jp: 鍛錬の成果が　うまく出たようじゃな

dialogue_en: Thanks to my regimen, I'd say you're head and shoulders above your average amateur.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボとの一体感が
グングンとあがっていくのが　よ～くわかったわい

dialogue_en: Wouldn't you agree?
dialogue_jp: のう　お嬢さん？

dialogue_en: ...As much as I'd love to tell you you're wrong 'cause I think you're the worst, you do have a point.
dialogue_jp:
ぐぬぬ……　うさんくさいのに
結果が出たから文句が言えない～

dialogue_en: Even "the worst" can teach you a thing or two─if you let him.
dialogue_jp:
おほほ　これからは
雑用をあなどらんことじゃの～

dialogue_en: Pluck my ever-lovin' feathers! That was one hell of a performance! If I didn't know better, I'd say this wasn't your first rodeo.
dialogue_jp:
これはこれは　予想以上の結果じゃわい
おまえさん　元々やり手だったようじゃな

dialogue_en: Surprise.
dialogue_jp: いまさらだな

dialogue_en: Well, shoot. Ya got me good.
dialogue_jp: いやはや　この歳になって

dialogue_en: And once ya start tearin' up the track out there, the racing world'll blame me for lettin' ya loose.
dialogue_jp:
とんでもない怪物レーサーを
生み出してしまったやもしれんの

dialogue_en: A promise is a promise, sir. Please tell me more about my dad and Uncle Sam.
dialogue_jp:
仙人　約束どおり
父さんとサムについて教えてください！

dialogue_en: Hmm... Alright then. Whaddya want to know?
dialogue_jp:
ふむ　よかろう
なにが知りたい？

dialogue_en: What would you like to know?
dialogue_jp: なにが知りたい？

dialogue_en: When were they here?
dialogue_jp: ふたりがいつ来たのか

dialogue_en: What were they doing here?
dialogue_jp: ふたりがなにをしていたのか

dialogue_en: What were the two of them like?
dialogue_jp: ふたりの関係について

dialogue_en: Nothing.
dialogue_jp: 聞くことはない

dialogue_en: Let's see... They couldna been much older than you are now. The two of 'em came and asked me to take 'em under my wing.
dialogue_jp:
ちょうど　おまえさんぐらいの歳じゃったかの
ふたりで『弟子にしろ』と　押しかけてきよった

dialogue_en: Turned 'em down─seein' as I had already retired─but they hung around the grounds anyway.
dialogue_jp:
ワシは隠居しとったから相手にせなんだが
勝手に居座りよってな

dialogue_en: Since they had nothin' better to do, I put 'em to work─and that's how it all began.
dialogue_jp:
しかたがないので
適当に雑用を押しつけたのが始まりじゃわ

dialogue_en: Oh, wasn't nothing outta the ordinary, I'd say.
dialogue_jp: べつに　普通の暮らしをしていただけじゃよ

dialogue_en: Ran some errands, did some repairs, helped around the house... You know, your standard trainin' regimen.
dialogue_jp:
掃除やら買い出しやら屋敷の修繕やら
いろいろと修行してもらったの～

dialogue_en: And in their downtime, they took it upon themselves to dig through my library─learnin' about chocobos and how to handle 'em.
dialogue_jp:
その合間に　勝手にチョコボの生態を調べたり
書物をあさったりしておったようじゃが

dialogue_en: Came to differing conclusions. They used to argue somethin' fierce.
dialogue_jp: チョコボ育成について　よく言い争っておったわ

dialogue_en: I can't say the two of 'em got on terribly well.
dialogue_jp: 決して　仲は良くなかったの

dialogue_en: I figured.
dialogue_jp: やっぱり

dialogue_en: Will and Sam had mighty strong opinions about how to best raise chocobos, and it drove 'em to fight─with their words, and with their fists.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボ育成についての思想が根本的に違うんじゃ
よく討論が殴り合いのケンカになっておったわ

dialogue_en: That said, only reason those two fought as hard as they did is 'cause they both cared deeply about the cause.
dialogue_jp:
ただ　チョコボにかける情熱だけは
お互いに認め合っていたようじゃった

dialogue_en: As far as passion is concerned, the two of 'em were birds of a feather.
dialogue_jp: 心の底では繋がっていたと　ワシは思っておる

dialogue_en: Now then. Ya got any other burnin' questions?
dialogue_jp: さて　ほかに聞きたいことはあるかの？

dialogue_en: Hmm... How ya feel now? Manage to sort out the mess inside?
dialogue_jp: ふむ　すこしは心の整理ができたかいの

dialogue_en: ...What do you mean?
dialogue_jp: どういうことですか？

dialogue_en: When we first met, I saw the way your eyes were brimmin' with anger.
dialogue_jp:
おまえさんの
怒りに満ちた瞳をはじめて見たとき

dialogue_en: I knew right then and there that what you needed wasn't teachin' or trainin'.
dialogue_jp:
こやつに必要なのは
知識や技術じゃないと思っての

dialogue_en: What you needed was time─time to look deep inside yourself and clear out all the wickedness and spite that have been hauntin' your heart.
dialogue_jp:
まずは邪念を取り払い　いまいちど
己を見つめ直す時間を与えようと考えたわけじゃ

dialogue_en: Which is why you had him clean out the pool?
dialogue_jp: だから　掃除をさせていたのか

dialogue_en: Exactly.
dialogue_jp: いかにも

dialogue_en: I don't know what happened to your father after he left this place.
dialogue_jp:
リングリンになにがあったのか
ワシにはわからん

dialogue_en: And I can understand why you'd wanna beat old Sam in a race. Few things feel better than stickin' it to someone who did you wrong.
dialogue_jp:
おまえさんがサムを憎む気持ちは　よ～くわかる
復讐のために　レースに勝ちたいというのもわかる

dialogue_en: But that bein' said, you should never use your birds as tools for revenge.
dialogue_jp:
しかし　その気持ちを
チョコボにぶつけてはいかん

dialogue_en: Ask yourself "Why did I decide to start raisin' chocobos?"
dialogue_jp: おまえさんは　なんのためにチョコボを育てておる

dialogue_en: I guess...
dialogue_jp: ぼくは……

dialogue_en: I guess it's 'cause I saw how happy those birds made my mom and dad─how they'd smile...
dialogue_jp:
父さんや母さんが　チョコボのことを
嬉しそうに話しているのが好きで

dialogue_en: The chocobos brought us a lotta fun, and brought us together as a family... I guess that's why.
dialogue_jp:
家族みんなで　チョコボに乗って出かけるのが
楽しくて　だからぼくは……

dialogue_en: Good enough.
dialogue_jp: それでよい

dialogue_en: The "why" is important─so don't forget yours.
dialogue_jp: その記憶を　決して忘れぬようにな

dialogue_en: I reckon Sam's got his eyes on the Gold Cup. Keep yours unclouded by hatred, and you'll do fine.
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドカップには　サムも出るじゃろう
憎しみにとらわれてはならんぞ

dialogue_en: Thank you, sir.
dialogue_jp: はい　仙人

dialogue_en: Thanks for everything.
dialogue_jp: いろいろ　ありがとう

dialogue_en: I'm gonna head back to the Saucer─make sure our birds're ready for the big race.
dialogue_jp:
これから　ゴールドソーサーに戻って
チョコボの最終調整をするよ

dialogue_en: Don't worry about puttin' your name in. I'll take care of it. All you need to do is show up and win.
dialogue_jp:
騎手はクラウドでエントリーしておくからさ
ゴールドカップが始まったら　よろしくね

dialogue_en: There's still lots I'd like to know about my parents. Lots more I'd like to know about my uncle Sam too.
dialogue_jp:
父さんや母さんのことだけじゃなくて
サムのこと　もっと知らないと

dialogue_en: Maybe winnin' that race'll give me a chance to ask him myself.
dialogue_jp: サムと話すためにも　レースに勝たなくちゃ

dialogue_en: No losin' to anyone else, y'hear? Can't have ya draggin' my good name through the mud.
dialogue_jp:
このワシに勝ったんじゃから
そこらへんのチョコボに負けるでないぞ

dialogue_en: Now that I have that chocograss... Should start makin' some of that tincture.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボ草も手に入ったし
エキスの仕込みを始めようかの

dialogue_en: Hey there. Whaddya say? Wanna smoke some of this tincture?
dialogue_jp:
どうじゃ　おまえさんも
チョコボエキスを吸ってみんか？

dialogue_en: So, how's it feel ridin' Selena? Elegance incarnate, ain't she?
dialogue_jp:
どうじゃ　シレナの乗り心地は
優雅なもんじゃろ

dialogue_en: Hey, I heard the news! Congratulations on winnin' the Cup!
dialogue_jp:
おお　聞いたぞ
ゴールドカップで勝ったらしいの

dialogue_en: I knew you were good, but to dismantle Sam and Joe's dynasty...that's quite a feat.
dialogue_jp:
絶対王者のサムと
伝説のジョーを破った新星現る　とな

dialogue_en: Your victory's got the whole industry in an uproar.
dialogue_jp:
ほほほ　チョコボ業界が
にぎやかになってきたの～

dialogue_en: And I, for one, am glad. A breath of fresh air'll at least do the chocobos good.
dialogue_jp:
新たな風が吹くのは
チョコボにとってもいいことじゃからな

dialogue_en: Are you here to learn from the sage as well?
dialogue_jp: キミも　仙人に弟子入りしにきたの？

dialogue_en: I know the sage is a bit of a handful, but stick with it, okay? It'll all pay off in the end─I promise.
dialogue_jp:
仙人の相手は　ものすご～く大変だと思うけど
根気よくがんばってね

dialogue_en: Running this shop is an extension of my training.
dialogue_jp: ここの店番もチョコボ修行なんだ

dialogue_en: Hi there. Everything going okay?
dialogue_jp:
いらっしゃい
チョコボの調子　どう？

dialogue_en: Good luck out there.
dialogue_jp: お互い　がんばろう

dialogue_en: I'll see you around.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　またね

dialogue_en: You got any chocograss for me?
dialogue_jp: チョコボ草があったら　引き取るよ

dialogue_en: Thanks! If you find any more, I'll be here.
dialogue_jp:
ありがとう
また集まったら　持ってきてよ

dialogue_en: Thanks so much! I think that about does it.
dialogue_jp:
ありがとう
これだけあればじゅうぶん！

dialogue_en: Pretty sure you've picked all there is to find around here.
dialogue_jp:
このあたりのチョコボ草は
とりつくしちゃったみたいだね

dialogue_en: You're a true ocean chocobo tamer.
dialogue_jp: キミはもう　海チョコボマスターだよ

dialogue_en: Now, how about plumes?
dialogue_jp: 羽根も交換していくかい？

dialogue_en: Don't worry, I'll put the chocograss you gave me to good use.
dialogue_jp:
集めてくれたチョコボ草は
大切に使わせてもらうよ

dialogue_en:
Meow, meow meow meow, meow!
My dearest white-haired angel♪
dialogue_jp:
ニャン　ニャンニャンニャ～ニャ～ン
白い毛の　天使ちゃん♪

dialogue_en:
Meow, meow meow meow, meow!
Where have you wandered off to now, my love?♪
dialogue_jp:
ニャン　ニャンニャンニャ～ニャ～ン
どこに行っちゃったのか～し～ら～♪

dialogue_en:
All your favorite foods are waiting...
So please come home to me, darling!♪
dialogue_jp:
ごはん用意して～
待っているのにネコちゃんは～♪

dialogue_en:
You've been gone for days...
So worried I can't help but sing!♪
dialogue_jp:
やってこない～
しんしんしん心配ね～♪

dialogue_en: First time in your house since I was what─seven? Eight?
dialogue_jp:
クラウドのうち
７歳か　８歳以来かな

dialogue_en: Isn't really mine though...
dialogue_jp: いまは調理場らしい

dialogue_en: Hello, dear. May I help you?♪
dialogue_jp: おやお～や　な～にか用かい？

dialogue_en: Just listening. You've got a great voice.
dialogue_jp: いえ　すてきな歌だと思って

dialogue_en: Oh, you flatter me!
dialogue_jp: あら　恥ずかしい

dialogue_en: Hey.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと

dialogue_en: I didn't even know I was doing it. You see, this cat I feed sometimes has gone missing─and when I worry...
dialogue_jp:
実はね　時々ごはんをあげてるネコちゃんが
行方不明で　心配で心配で

dialogue_en: I cannot heeelp but siiing♪
dialogue_jp: 歌っちゃう～の～♪

dialogue_en: Sounds like a job for a merc, doesn't it?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　なんでも屋の出番

dialogue_en: What will you say?
dialogue_jp: なんと声をかけますか？

dialogue_en: You sing often?
dialogue_jp: なぜ歌う？

dialogue_en: We'll find your cat.
dialogue_jp: ネコ探しなら　まかせろ

dialogue_en: She'll come back.
dialogue_jp: そのうち帰ってくる

dialogue_en:
Why, I sing whenever the mood strikes, really.
Haven't you ever felt like bursting into song?♪
dialogue_jp:
あら　感情が高まったら
つい歌ってしまわな～～～い♪

dialogue_en: No, I...can't say I have.
dialogue_jp: いいえ　私は

dialogue_en: You've got an ear for music, though.
dialogue_jp: 音楽はしないの？

dialogue_en:
I played piano a little when I was younger.
My mom taught me.
dialogue_jp:
子供の頃に　ピアノをやってました
ママに教えてもらって

dialogue_en:
My, that's lovely!
You ought to accompany me sometime.
dialogue_jp:
あら　いいわね
いつか伴奏してちょうだい

dialogue_en: Sure. I bet it'd be a lotta fun.
dialogue_jp: はい　機会があれば　ぜひ

dialogue_en: C'mon.
dialogue_jp: ねえ

dialogue_en: If you like...we can go look for your cat.
dialogue_jp: そのネコ　俺たちが探そう

dialogue_en: Really!? Oh, what a relief!
dialogue_jp: ホントかい　助かるよ
