dialogue_en: Well, aren't you the picture of confidence! You wouldn't happen to be a professional feline finder, would you?
dialogue_jp:
あら　自信満々ね
あなた　もしかしてプロのネコ探し屋さん？

dialogue_en: Not officially, but I've got a good cat-catching record.
dialogue_jp: なんでも屋だ　ネコ探しの実績もある

dialogue_en: Been doing it since I was a kid.
dialogue_jp: 子供の頃から　やってるからな

dialogue_en: I certainly hope so...
dialogue_jp: そうだねえ

dialogue_en: But I can't help but worry with all those fiends lurking about.
dialogue_jp: ただ　モンスターが増えてるって言うでしょ？

dialogue_en:
Oh, dearest kitty, my darling kitty
Where could you be?♪
dialogue_jp:
ネコちゃんが～
襲われて～　いないか～♪

dialogue_en:
I'm filled with worry
Oh, won't you please hurry to me?♪
dialogue_jp: 考えれ～ば　考える～ほど～♪

dialogue_en: I mean it Cloud─she needs help.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　探してあげない？

dialogue_en: Alright.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: Really!? Oh, what a relief!
dialogue_jp: ホントかい　助かるよ

dialogue_en: I'm Christine by the way. Chef and chanteuse.
dialogue_jp:
ふふん　私はダーエ
ここの料理長よ

dialogue_en: You might want to start by looking around the foot of Mt. Nibel.
dialogue_jp:
ネコちゃんは
ニブル山のふもとに住んでるみたい

dialogue_en:
She's got the most beautiful snow-white coat.
Petite little thing too.
dialogue_jp: 野良なのに真っ白で　すらりとしたキレイな子よ

dialogue_en:
Speaking of, she must be starving out there!
Here─be sure to feed her.
dialogue_jp:
そうだ　お腹を空かせてるだろうから
これを持っていって

dialogue_en:
I'll leave you to find my darling cat
While I cook up a mighty feast!♪
dialogue_jp:
ネコちゃんはまかせて～
私は　料理に集中よ♪

dialogue_en:
Dum dum dum dadada dada dada
Dum dum dum, da da da dum♪
dialogue_jp:
トントトントン　ト～ントント～ン～
トントトントン　ト～ントント～ン～♪

dialogue_en: Be a dear and find my darling cat!♪
dialogue_jp: ネコちゃんのこと　お願いね～♪

dialogue_en: All this talk of cats makes me think of Fluffy.
dialogue_jp: うちのマルのこと　思い出しちゃった

dialogue_en:
Yeah─the one and only.
...What happened to her anyway?
dialogue_jp:
ああ　俺もだ
結局あいつはどうなったんだ？

dialogue_en: No idea. Haven't seen her since the fire five years ago.
dialogue_jp: ５年前　村が燃えている時に別れたきり

dialogue_en: Damn...
dialogue_jp: そうか……

dialogue_en: I can't shake the feeling that I just...left her to die.
dialogue_jp: 私が捨てたみたいな　そんな感じかな

dialogue_en: I really hope she's okay, but...if she's not...
dialogue_jp:
生きていてほしいって思う
資格もないような気がするんだ

dialogue_en: Hey, there's...something I've been meaning to ask you.
dialogue_jp:
なあ　ティファ
気になっていたことがあるんだ

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: なに？

dialogue_en: How come you named your cat "Fluffy"? It's not like her fur was long or super soft or anything.
dialogue_jp:
あのティファのネコ　どうしてマルって言うんだ
べつに丸くなかったよな

dialogue_en: Well, to be fair, I wasn't the one who named her. The mayor gave her to me as a gift for my twelfth birthday.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　あれ
マルはね　１２歳の誕生日に村長がくれたんだよね

dialogue_en: When he put her in my arms he said, "this little lady's name is Fluffy," but he never explained why.
dialogue_jp:
その時に村長が『この子はマルだ』って言ったの
だから　理由はわからない

dialogue_en: Don't get me wrong─I was dead set on giving her a better name.
dialogue_jp: もちろん　新しい名前をつけるつもりでいたけど

dialogue_en: But before I could, everyone had already started calling her "Fluffy."
dialogue_jp:
それより先に　マルっていう名前が
村中に広まっちゃった

dialogue_en: And the more I heard it, the more I thought "Well, maybe it's not that bad..."
dialogue_jp:
いい名前って思うようになるまで
そんなにかからなかったけど

dialogue_en: So I let it stick. I wasn't much of a fighter back in those days.
dialogue_jp: あの頃は　私も面倒な年頃だったからなあ

dialogue_en: Heh...
dialogue_jp: ふん……

dialogue_en: Hard to believe lookin' at me now.
dialogue_jp: クラウドほどじゃないけどね

dialogue_en: What's up?
dialogue_jp: どうしたの？

dialogue_en: Heard something.
dialogue_jp: 声がする

dialogue_en: Over there.
dialogue_jp: あそこだ

dialogue_en: Let's go.
dialogue_jp: 追いかけよう

dialogue_en: Hey, do you remember that red bandana Fluffy always had around her neck?
dialogue_jp:
マル　いつも首に赤い布を巻いていたの
覚えてるかな

dialogue_en: Now that you mention it...
dialogue_jp: ああ　そうだったな

dialogue_en: Believe it or not, my dad made it. With cloth from one of his old shirts.
dialogue_jp:
あれね　パパが巻いたの
自分の古いシャツを切って

dialogue_en: Even though she was my cat, I think he took better care of her.
dialogue_jp:
私がもらってきたネコなのに
パパのほうがかわいがってたかも

dialogue_en: That right?
dialogue_jp: そうか

dialogue_en: Sorry. Didn't mean to bring him up.
dialogue_jp: ごめん　こんな話

dialogue_en: No need to apologize.
dialogue_jp: いや　いいんだ

dialogue_en: Hey, it's starting to sound like a cat chorus.
dialogue_jp: ねえ　声の主　増えてない？

dialogue_en: Look.
dialogue_jp: あそこ！

dialogue_en: Kittens?
dialogue_jp: 子猫？

dialogue_en: Hsss!
dialogue_jp: シャーッ！

dialogue_en: I can't believe it... Fluffy?
dialogue_jp: もしかして　マル？

dialogue_en: Hey, girl. How you doin'?
dialogue_jp: マル　覚えてない？

dialogue_en: It's me─Tifa! Remember?
dialogue_jp: ほら　私　ティファだよ

dialogue_en: You're okay. Thank god.
dialogue_jp: よかった　無事だったんだ

dialogue_en: Meow!
dialogue_jp: にゃー

dialogue_en: Aw!
dialogue_jp: マル！

dialogue_en: Fluffy!? What's wrong?
dialogue_jp: マル　大丈夫？

dialogue_en: She doesn't look so good.
dialogue_jp: 衰弱してる

dialogue_en: Let's try giving her the cat food!
dialogue_jp: そうだ　キャットフード

dialogue_en: There's plenty more where this came from, so dig in.
dialogue_jp: たくさんあるから　ゆっくり食べて

dialogue_en: Leave 'em alone!
dialogue_jp: 守らなくちゃ！

dialogue_en: Mrow.
dialogue_jp: ニャ～

dialogue_en: Mrow.
dialogue_jp: ニャ～！

dialogue_en: C'mon.
dialogue_jp: 追いかけよう

dialogue_en: Hsss!
dialogue_jp: シャーッ！

dialogue_en: Mrowr.
dialogue_jp: ニャ～

dialogue_en: Let's move.
dialogue_jp: 追いかけよう

dialogue_en: Hsss!
dialogue_jp: シャーッ！

dialogue_en: Hsss!
dialogue_jp: シャーッ！

dialogue_en: Meow...
dialogue_jp: ニャー……

dialogue_en: I'm a little worried Fluffy and the kittens might've been hurt. Do you mind if we head back to the village?
dialogue_jp:
マルたちのケガの具合も確認したいし
いったん　村に戻ろっか

dialogue_en: You know, if we asked her nicely, I bet that head chef would take care of the kittens.
dialogue_jp:
連れて帰ったら　ダーエさん
世話してくれそうな感じだったよね

dialogue_en: I mean, can't say no to both of us, right?
dialogue_jp: クラウドも　いっしょに頼んでくれる？

dialogue_en: Guess we'll see. C'mon.
dialogue_jp: ああ　帰ろう

dialogue_en: Mew...
dialogue_jp: ウウ～……

dialogue_en: Huh... Guess even she can tell this place is nothing like it used to be.
dialogue_jp:
そっか　私たちが住んでいた村とは
違うもんね

dialogue_en: That's probably why she never came back here.
dialogue_jp: だから　村に戻らなかったんだろうな

dialogue_en: What is it?
dialogue_jp: どうしたの？

dialogue_en: Fluffy?
dialogue_jp: マル？

dialogue_en: After 'em.
dialogue_jp: 追いかけよう

dialogue_en: Why, look who it is!
dialogue_jp: おや　あんたたち

dialogue_en: Oh, my little baby! I'm so glad you're okay!
dialogue_jp:
あら　ネコちゃん！
無事だったのね

dialogue_en: And just look at all these yummy muffins you brought back with you!
dialogue_jp: しかも　こんなカワイコちゃんたちまで

dialogue_en: She gave birth to her litter on the mountain.
dialogue_jp: ニブル山で産んだみたいです

dialogue_en: Oh, sweetling! You're going to be a great mommy.
dialogue_jp: おやおや　ご苦労だったねえ

dialogue_en: I hope this is alright.
dialogue_jp: それで　その……

dialogue_en:
It wasn't exactly safe for a bunch of kittens.
Couldn't just leave them, so...
dialogue_jp:
山での子育ては　難しいと思って
連れてきてしまったんですけど

dialogue_en: Don't be silly, dear! You did the right thing. I'll take excellent care of this family. They'll want for nothing.
dialogue_jp:
あ～はいはい　心配しないで
これからは　私が責任を持って面倒を見るから

dialogue_en:
Long I've dreamed of opening my home
To little ones to play and roam and love!♪
dialogue_jp:
ネコちゃんに囲まれ～
料理するのが　夢だったの～♪

dialogue_en: La la, la la, lalalalalalalala!♪
dialogue_jp: ララララ～♪

dialogue_en:
If I'm to take these cats in,
they're going to need names.
dialogue_jp: うちの子になるなら　名前が必要だね

dialogue_en:
You've got such beautiful white fur─"Blanca"!
Yes, that fits perfectly, don't you think?
dialogue_jp:
あんたは真っ白でキレイだから　シロだ
間違いのない　いい名前だろ

dialogue_en: As for the kittens─we'll decide later.
dialogue_jp: 子供たちは　あとで考えよう

dialogue_en: Actually, the cat's already got a na...
dialogue_jp: いや　そのネコの名前は──

dialogue_en: What─you weren't hoping to hear me play, were you? I'm terribly sorry, Blanca, but I'm a bit worn out after all that excitement.
dialogue_jp:
おや　ピアノが聴きたいのかい？
でもごめんね　私はさっきのが精一杯なんだよ

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: えっ？

dialogue_en: Tifa can play.
dialogue_jp: ティファが弾けばいい

dialogue_en: Meow.
dialogue_jp: ニャ～

dialogue_en:
What a wonderful idea!
You'll humor us dear, won't you?
dialogue_jp: いいわね　私もぜひ聴きたいわ

dialogue_en: Okay─just a bit.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　ちょっとだけ

dialogue_en:
Hold that thought!
This occasion calls for an accompaniment!
dialogue_jp: そうだ　せっかくだから伴奏もつけようか

dialogue_en: I know some folks who would just love the chance to perform. Don't go anywhere!
dialogue_jp:
演奏をたしなむ連中を呼んでくるから
ちょっと待ってて！

dialogue_en:
That escalated quickly...
I wasn't expecting an audience.
dialogue_jp:
どうしよう　クラウド
なんだか　大変なことになってる

dialogue_en:
I haven't practiced since I was a kid.
What should I do?
dialogue_jp: ピアノの練習してたのって　子供の頃だけだよ

dialogue_en: Back out?
dialogue_jp: 逃げるか？

dialogue_en: Well, that's not an option.
dialogue_jp: それは　できない

dialogue_en: Then I think you better get warmed up.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　練習だな

dialogue_en: What a melodious sound!
dialogue_jp: 心地よい音色だわ

dialogue_en: A captivating performance.
dialogue_jp: うっとりしちゃう

dialogue_en: I'm tempted to burst into song!
dialogue_jp: 歌いたくなってきちゃった

dialogue_en: Your playing spoke to my soul.
dialogue_jp: 音が染みこんでくるわ

dialogue_en: Such remarkable skill!
dialogue_jp: なんて指さばきなの

dialogue_en: Oh, dear...
dialogue_jp: あらら～

dialogue_en: That was a bit pitchy...
dialogue_jp: すこしズレてるわね

dialogue_en: Keep it in key.
dialogue_jp: まわりの音を聴いて

dialogue_en: I know you can do better.
dialogue_jp: 持ち直せるわよ

dialogue_en: Easy, now...
dialogue_jp: 落ち着いて

dialogue_en: Well, that was...
dialogue_jp: あらあらあらあら……

dialogue_en: Sorry about that. Definitely rusty.
dialogue_jp: ごめんなさい　調子に乗っちゃった

dialogue_en: No! You were...great.
dialogue_jp: ……よかった

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: ありがと

dialogue_en: That was lovely.
dialogue_jp: よかったわよ

dialogue_en: Meow...!
dialogue_jp: ニャ～

dialogue_en: How was it?
dialogue_jp: どうだった？

dialogue_en: Much better than I remember, that's for sure.
dialogue_jp: 子供の頃より　ずっといい

dialogue_en: Talk about a backhanded compliment.
dialogue_jp: ぜんぜん　ほめられてる気がしないけど

dialogue_en: But I'll take it. Thanks.
dialogue_jp: うれしい　ありがとう

dialogue_en: Marvelous! Simply marvelous!
dialogue_jp: アンビリーバボー！

dialogue_en: Mrowr!
dialogue_jp: ニャ～！

dialogue_en: How was it?
dialogue_jp: どうだった？

dialogue_en: Honestly? I'm impressed. You sure you haven't played since you were a kid?
dialogue_jp:
正直驚いた
本当に　ずっと弾いていないのか

dialogue_en: Wow, a genuine compliment.
dialogue_jp: クラウドがいるから　はりきっちゃった

dialogue_en:
Glad that you could help.
Take care of the cats for me.
dialogue_jp: この子たちのこと　よろしくお願いします

dialogue_en: I certainly will!
dialogue_jp: まかせなさ～い！

dialogue_en: Rest assured I'll keep them very well fed!
dialogue_jp:
うふふ　美味しいものを
たらふく食べさせてあげるからね

dialogue_en: So bring your appetites!
dialogue_jp: 覚悟しときなさいよ

dialogue_en: Mrow!
dialogue_jp: ニャ～

dialogue_en: Alright! Come along then!
dialogue_jp: さあ　ついてきな

dialogue_en: Playing that piano again brought back a lot of memories.
dialogue_jp:
ピアノを弾きながら
いろいろ　思い出しちゃった

dialogue_en: How Mom used to teach me while Dad was downstairs in the kitchen, doing his best─which was pretty good.
dialogue_jp:
ママにピアノを教えてもらったこと
パパの雑な　でも美味しい料理

dialogue_en: Hang-outs with Emilio and the gang.
dialogue_jp: エミリオたちとのお茶会

dialogue_en: Which we kept inviting you to, but you never came.
dialogue_jp: クラウドは　何度誘ってもこなかったよね

dialogue_en: "Never"? Really?
dialogue_jp: そうだったか？

dialogue_en: Really. But you seemed fine on your own.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　ひとりぼっちでも平気だったよね

dialogue_en: That what it looked like? That I enjoyed being alone?
dialogue_jp: 俺のこと　そんな風に思ってたのか？

dialogue_en: You didn't?
dialogue_jp: 違うの？

dialogue_en: Of course not.
dialogue_jp: 平気なわけない

dialogue_en: Huh... Guess we still don't know each other that well.
dialogue_jp: もっと知りたいな　クラウドのこと

dialogue_en: Well, never too late to make up for lost time.
dialogue_jp: ああ　ときどき話そう

dialogue_en: Yeah. That's true.
dialogue_jp: うん　きっとだよ

dialogue_en: I'm glad we came.
dialogue_jp: 来てよかったね

dialogue_en: Yeah. Glad we found Fluffy too.
dialogue_jp: ああ　マルも戻ったしな

dialogue_en: I think you mean "Blanca." But yeah... I hope she and the kittens are happy here.
dialogue_jp:
今日からシロだよ
新しい家族といっしょに　幸せになってほしいな

dialogue_en: It would be lovely if you could accompany me on the piano sometime!
dialogue_jp: 今度はピアノと歌で　セッションしましょうね

dialogue_en: I think I might have to try writing a song for my little kittens.
dialogue_jp: さ～て　ネコちゃんの歌を作らないと

dialogue_en: Back again, are we? What is it this time?
dialogue_jp: また来たんですか　今度はなんですか？

dialogue_en: What is it this time?
dialogue_jp: 今度はなんですか？

dialogue_en: Wanna know about Wutaian fighters.
dialogue_jp: ウータイ兵について

dialogue_en: Need info on the black robes.
dialogue_jp: 黒マントについて

dialogue_en: Would like to learn about Shinra Manor.
dialogue_jp: 神羅屋敷について

dialogue_en: Nothing.
dialogue_jp: 質問はない

dialogue_en: Well, they're gone now, or what was left of them. Some Shinra troopers helped dispose of their remains.
dialogue_jp:
ニブル魔晄炉にあったウータイ兵の遺体は
神羅軍の調査隊が運び出してくれましたよ

dialogue_en: How they got in, however, remains unclear.
dialogue_jp: 侵入経路などは　これから調査していくようです

dialogue_en: But that's for someone else to figure out. We're still struggling with the loss of Mr. Murasaki.
dialogue_jp:
まさか　ムラサキ課長が犠牲になるなんて
まだ信じられませんよ

dialogue_en: Shinra's created a refuge for those suffering from mako poisoning.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄中毒者のみなさんには
神羅カンパニーの管理のもと

dialogue_en: Here, they can relax and recover in their own time.
dialogue_jp:
この村で　なに不自由なく
療養していただいております

dialogue_en: Though recently some have up and left without a word, which is, frankly, beyond me.
dialogue_jp:
ただ最近　無断で村から出てしまう方が多くて
困ってるんですよね

dialogue_en: I'm the manager of the manor only on paper─I know next to nothing about it.
dialogue_jp:
いちおう　私が管理人なんですが
詳しいことはわかりません

dialogue_en: Records indicate it was built as a research facility on land borrowed from the village back in Shinra's early days.
dialogue_jp:
記録によると　神羅製作所時代に
村から土地を借り上げて建てた研究施設らしいです

dialogue_en: The work carried out at the facility, however, was apparently quite sensitive. Pretty much all the details have been redacted.
dialogue_jp:
屋敷で行われていた研究は機密事項だったようで
残っている資料も　黒塗りだらけなんです

dialogue_en: Really makes you wonder what they're trying to conceal.
dialogue_jp: いったい　どんな研究をしていたんでしょうね

dialogue_en: By the way, you spent an awful long time inside Shinra Manor. What were you doing in there?
dialogue_jp:
そうだ　みなさん
神羅屋敷に入った時　中でなにをしたんですか？

dialogue_en: We...
dialogue_jp: あの時は……

dialogue_en: needed to use the terminal.
dialogue_jp: 端末を借りただけだ

dialogue_en: That's all, was it?
dialogue_jp: そうですか

dialogue_en: Why do you ask?
dialogue_jp: なにかあるのか？

dialogue_en: Well y'see, ever since your visit, I've been hearing this strange voice─a woman's─coming from inside.
dialogue_jp:
いえね　あれ以来
屋敷から女性の声が聞こえることがあるんです

dialogue_en: I know this sounds crazy, but...you don't think it's haunted, do you?
dialogue_jp:
これって　なんかこう
怖～い話じゃないですかね

dialogue_en: Hardly.
dialogue_jp: くだらねえ

dialogue_en:
'Sides, you're the manager.
Ain't it your job to investigate?
dialogue_jp:
てか　管理人だろ？
自分で見にいけよ

dialogue_en: No. I don't have the clearance to set even one foot inside. Regardless, I know what I heard.
dialogue_jp:
私のＩＤじゃ　屋敷には入れないんですよ
でも　ウソじゃありません

dialogue_en: It wasn't just the wind rustling through the trees at night. Someone was...weeping─almost musically.
dialogue_jp:
風の音や木々のざわめきにまぎれて
まるで　泣いているような　歌っているような

dialogue_en: It sounded like a woman wailing: "Ooo, waaah..."
dialogue_jp:
女の悲痛な声が
『うああ　うあああ～』……って

dialogue_en: For real?
dialogue_jp: マジかよ

dialogue_en: I'm afraid so.
dialogue_jp: マジです

dialogue_en: And given that I didn't hear a thing until you went inside, it's clear there's a connection.
dialogue_jp:
あなたたちが屋敷に入る前はなかったことですから
因果関係は明白です

dialogue_en:
Why not take some responsibility
and go investigate for me?
dialogue_jp:
すこしは責任を感じてもらって
調べてくださいよ

dialogue_en: Think I'm gonna sit this one out.
dialogue_jp: 私は……行きません

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: もう！

dialogue_en: C'mon. I'm sure it's nothing serious.
dialogue_jp: 誰でもいい　つきあってくれ

dialogue_en: The company's had us burning the midnight oil since the Wutaians left that mess at the reactor.
dialogue_jp:
ウータイ人の侵入からこっち
本社からの指示が　次から次へと来ましてね

dialogue_en: It's been a constant string of orders.
dialogue_jp: ぜんぜん　対処しきれてないんですよ

dialogue_en: You mentioned growing up here, didn't you? Bet you're as sick of all this trouble as I am─probably more so.
dialogue_jp:
ここ　あなたの故郷でしたよね
はやく落ち着いてほしいですねえ

dialogue_en: Well, I don't hear a damn thing.
dialogue_jp: はん　女の声なんて聞こえねえぞ

dialogue_en:
So─case closed!
No need for us to overstay our welcome.
dialogue_jp:
よし　調査終了！
さっさと帰ろうぜ

dialogue_en: What are you doin'?
dialogue_jp: おい……

dialogue_en: Be quiet.
dialogue_jp: 静かに

dialogue_en: Listen...
dialogue_jp: 騒がしいな

dialogue_en: Uh, you hear somethin' I don't?
dialogue_jp: 適当なことを言ってんじゃねえぞ

dialogue_en: I feel it below us.
dialogue_jp: 地下だ　わかるか

dialogue_en: Well, I don't feel anything...
dialogue_jp: いや　わからない

dialogue_en:
But you know this place better than we do.
If you're willing to lead, we'll follow.
dialogue_jp:
でも　あんたが言うなら
調べてみよう

dialogue_en: Whaddya mean "we"!?
dialogue_jp: おいおいおい！

dialogue_en: Hmph... Scared?
dialogue_jp: ふっ　弱虫か

dialogue_en: Me? Scared? I ain't been scared a day in my life!
dialogue_jp: 弱虫？　んなのウン十年ぶりに聞いたぜ

dialogue_en: I was even voted "Bravest Buddy" back in the day!
dialogue_jp: もちろん　オレは言う側だったけどな

dialogue_en: Of course you were.
dialogue_jp: それは頼もしい

dialogue_en: Had enough, then?
dialogue_jp: もう飽きたのか

dialogue_en: We can take a break. Give you time to calm your nerves.
dialogue_jp: いったん引くか　それもいいだろう

dialogue_en: Hmph... Fear's natural.
dialogue_jp: ふん　怖気づいたか

dialogue_en: That voice still haunts me.
dialogue_jp: 声の正体が気になってな

dialogue_en: This place is my responsibility. Even now.
dialogue_jp: 私の職場だ　荒らしてもらっては困る

dialogue_en: Gotta do my job sometime.
dialogue_jp: たまには　警備員らしくしないとな

dialogue_en: Vincent, what's the deal with you and Sephiroth? How do you know him?
dialogue_jp:
ヴィンセント
セフィロスとは　どういう関係なんだ？

dialogue_en: Our bond is unique. I'm to blame in part for the evils he's unleashed.
dialogue_jp:
あいつが悪を為すとき
その責任の一端は　私にある

dialogue_en: I've had many opportunities to purge him from this world. Unfortunately...I couldn't pull the trigger.
dialogue_jp:
私にはセフィロスを亡き者にする機会があった
幾度か　その機会はあった

dialogue_en: Don't beat yourself up.
dialogue_jp: 気にしないほうがいい

dialogue_en: Oh?
dialogue_jp: ほう？

dialogue_en: I dunno if you can kill him. And even if you could...I think he'd stick with you. Somehow.
dialogue_jp:
あいつは……きっと死なない
死んでも　消えないんだ

dialogue_en: Hmph... Quite the rosy outlook.
dialogue_jp: ふん　気が滅入る話だ

dialogue_en: Man, this is ridiculous.
dialogue_jp: ったく　バカらしい

dialogue_en: That guy was convinced there's some kinda ghost in here, but I'm not buyin' it. I say we just turn around.
dialogue_jp:
管理人が言うのは　アレだろ
幽霊がいるんじゃねえかって話だろ？

dialogue_en: Getting cold feet?
dialogue_jp: そうだろうな

dialogue_en: 'Course not. 'Sides, it wouldn't be our first paranormal encounter. Like the Gi─they were ghosts...I think.
dialogue_jp:
ギ族みてえな　訳アリか
あれも幽霊っちゃあ幽霊だ

dialogue_en: Aaah... Wah... Aaah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……ああ……

dialogue_en: What was that? Y'all heard it, right!?
dialogue_jp: 聞いたか　いまの聞いたか？

dialogue_en: Loud and clear.
dialogue_jp: ああ　聞こえた

dialogue_en: Aaah... Wah... Aaah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……ああ……

dialogue_en: Sounds nothing like the Gi we know.
dialogue_jp: ギ族とは　別物だな

dialogue_en: Then what is it!?
dialogue_jp: じゃ　なんだよ！

dialogue_en: We'll soon find out.
dialogue_jp: それを調べている

dialogue_en: Aaah... Wah... Aaah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……ああ……

dialogue_en: Hey, Vincent. You got any idea whose voice that is? Like, seen any women wandering the manor?
dialogue_jp:
ヴィンセント
心当たりはねえのか　この声の主

dialogue_en: Maybe some gal got stuck in a coffin...
dialogue_jp: 実は　女が住んでるとかよ

dialogue_en: Unlikely. A female staffer once lived here, but she's long gone.
dialogue_jp:
以前は　女性スタッフも滞在していたが
いまはありえない

dialogue_en: Then...who else could it be?
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　あの声はなんだよ

dialogue_en: Do I have to keep repeating myself? As I said, we'll soon find out.
dialogue_jp:
何度も同じ事を言わせるな
私たちは　それを調べているところだ

dialogue_en: Aaah... Wah... Aaah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……ああ……

dialogue_en: Lalalala, not listening!
dialogue_jp: うわあああ！

dialogue_en: Wait.
dialogue_jp: 待て

dialogue_en: You're going to need my keycard. It'll grant you access to the lower levels.
dialogue_jp:
警備用セキュリティカードだ
これで　さらに地下へ行ける

dialogue_en: This floor is where he conducted his combat trials.
dialogue_jp: ここは　実戦的な試験が繰り返されていたフロアだ

dialogue_en: Countless subjects were slaughtered here. Disposed of, never to be mourned...
dialogue_jp:
多くの実験体が命を落とし
弔われることなく　廃棄された

dialogue_en: Hmph! Now I know you're just screwin' with me! Well, I ain't fallin' for it, no sir!
dialogue_jp:
はん　ビビらせようって魂胆だろ
オレはだまされねえからな

dialogue_en: Aaah... Wah... Aaah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……ああ……

dialogue_en: Uh... Er...
dialogue_jp: う……ぐぬぬ……

dialogue_en: Keep moving.
dialogue_jp: 行くぞ

dialogue_en: The simulator is up ahead.
dialogue_jp: この先に　バトルシミュレーターがある

dialogue_en: Can't proceed further until we complete the trial.
dialogue_jp: 試験にパスしないと　奥へは進めない

dialogue_en: Best of luck.
dialogue_jp: おまえにまかせる

dialogue_en: Just resting my eyes.
dialogue_jp: 私はすこし眠る

dialogue_en: You having trouble?
dialogue_jp: 苦戦しているようだな

dialogue_en: He's not known for mercy.
dialogue_jp: 宝条のＡＩとはな……

dialogue_en: Greetings and welcome, my lovely specimens!
dialogue_jp: ようこそ　実験体の諸君！

dialogue_en: This asshole again?
dialogue_jp: また　こいつかよ

dialogue_en: Today is your lucky day. You'll be participating in a series of combat simulations.
dialogue_jp:
いまから　君たちには
実戦を想定した試験に挑戦してもらう

dialogue_en:
Few are permitted to take part in mine.
Be grateful for this honor.
dialogue_jp:
私が作成したミッションだ
光栄に思いたまえ

dialogue_en: Well, without further ado, let us begin. I look forward to analyzing the data gleaned from your deaths. Messy as they'll be.
dialogue_jp:
では　さっそく始めるとしよう
頼むから有益なデータを残してから死んでくれよ

dialogue_en: Greetings and welcome, my lovely specimens!
dialogue_jp: ようこそ　実験体の諸君！

dialogue_en: Excellent! That performance bodes well for the next trial!
dialogue_jp: いいぞ　その調子で次も頑張ってくれよ

dialogue_en: What a fascinating outcome! Now then, on to the next.
dialogue_jp:
ふむ　面白い
次の検証へ移ろう

dialogue_en: That is an intriguing result indeed. But let's see how you perform in the final trial.
dialogue_jp:
ほう　興味深い
そのまま最後の検証といこうか

dialogue_en: Hrm...a most disappointing conclusion. Well, will you give up? Or will you try again?
dialogue_jp:
ふむ　まあこんなものか
どうする　再戦するかね？

dialogue_en: Marvelous─you've cleared every trial! I've created masterpieces yet again, I see.
dialogue_jp:
まさか　すべてクリアするとは！
また新たな傑作を生み出してしまったようだ

dialogue_en: Without further ado, my dear specimens, let's proceed to act two.
dialogue_jp:
それでは　実験体の諸君
奥へと進みたまえ

dialogue_en: Aaah... Ooooooh!
dialogue_jp: ああ……ああ……

dialogue_en: Let's go.
dialogue_jp: 行くぞ

dialogue_en: You mentioned some gal used to work here, but...what exactly did she do?
dialogue_jp:
そういや　女も働いてたって言ったよな
なにやってたんだ？

dialogue_en: Whatever the "good professor" bade her.
dialogue_jp: 宝条博士とそのスタッフが滞在していた

dialogue_en: As their bodyguard, I was never made privy to the details of their research.
dialogue_jp:
私は　その護衛だ
研究の詳細までは知らない

dialogue_en: Well, knowin' that sick freak, I doubt he was up to anything good.
dialogue_jp:
宝条のこった
ろくでもない研究だろうよ

dialogue_en: And I bet that gal wasn't much better than him either.
dialogue_jp: そのスタッフも　とんでもねえ連中だな

dialogue_en: That's not true.
dialogue_jp: そんなことはない

dialogue_en: Oof. Did I touch a nerve?
dialogue_jp: なんだよ　怒ったのか？

dialogue_en: Just stay quiet. I have to concentrate.
dialogue_jp: もう話しかけるな　集中させてくれ

dialogue_en: You know, deep down, I knew you'd make it this far.
dialogue_jp: 待っていたぞ　実験体の諸君

dialogue_en: Of course, not every participant does. Only the finest─the elite among you─survive.
dialogue_jp:
この特殊実験ルームに入れるのは
ほんのひと握りの　優秀な個体だけだ

dialogue_en: You should be very proud! I, for one, am delighted by your success.
dialogue_jp:
おめでとう！
研究者として　本当に誇らしいよ

dialogue_en: Where you off to?
dialogue_jp: どこ行くんだよ

dialogue_en: To shut him up.
dialogue_jp: こいつを黙らせる

dialogue_en: As a token of my appreciation, I've prepared for you a gift.
dialogue_jp: そんな素晴らしい諸君に　私からプレゼントだ

dialogue_en: Aaah... Wah... Aaah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……ああ……

dialogue_en: That's what we've all been hearing?
dialogue_jp: これが　声の正体か

dialogue_en: You gotta be kiddin' me!
dialogue_jp: どういうことだよ？

dialogue_en: Here it is, your final trial! You must face this fiend in combat and emerge triumphant or die tr─
dialogue_jp:
さあ　最後の試験だ！
彼女に打ち勝って　自らの有用性を示したま――

dialogue_en: Guess this means we busted our "ghost."
dialogue_jp: 幽霊じゃ……ねえよな

dialogue_en: A monster. Tainted by Hojo's touch, no doubt.
dialogue_jp:
モンスターだ
おそらく　宝条の手が入っている

dialogue_en: Why the singing though?
dialogue_jp: なぜ　声を出した？

dialogue_en: An outlet for stress, perhaps─an expression of displeasure.
dialogue_jp: モンスターも成長するし　精神活動もある

dialogue_en: Despite their appearance, some fiends are capable of complex thinking─and experiencing emotions.
dialogue_jp:
境遇が耐え難ければ　悲痛な声で歌いもする
そういうことかもしれない

dialogue_en: Right, monsters got feelings.
dialogue_jp: へっ　モンスターのくせに生意気だ

dialogue_en: I know we oughta have mercy for all life, but you gotta draw the line somewhere.
dialogue_jp:
モンスターは　モンスターだ
そうじゃねえと撃てねえ

dialogue_en: In any case, thanks for your help with the investigation.
dialogue_jp:
調査は終了だ
これは掃除の礼だ

dialogue_en: Don't stay too long.
dialogue_jp: 私は先に行く

dialogue_en: I heard your investigation was a success!
dialogue_jp: ああ　みなさん　聞きましたよ

dialogue_en: Turns out it wasn't a woman, but some kind of wild beast, right?
dialogue_jp:
女の声の正体は
モンスターの鳴き声だったんでしょ？

dialogue_en: I'm relieved, if a bit disappointed.
dialogue_jp: ガッカリしたような　ホッとしたような

dialogue_en: Scary though they may be, I can appreciate a good ghost story.
dialogue_jp:
実は幽霊とか　そういう話
嫌いじゃないんです

dialogue_en: Speaking of, I've heard talk of some sort of haunted train graveyard in Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルに　列車墓場っていう
なにかと噂の多い場所があって

dialogue_en: I'd love to see it for myself...
dialogue_jp: いつか　行ってみたいんですよね

dialogue_en: I wonder how the reactor is faring these days.
dialogue_jp: ニブル山の魔晄炉　どうなってるんですかね

dialogue_en: Given the Wutaians came and went as they did, I doubt it's all that safe.
dialogue_jp:
ウータイ人が出入りしたのかと思うと
怖くて近づけませんよ

dialogue_en: Such a shame about Deputy Commissioner Murasaki's passing... One of the most dependable men I knew.
dialogue_jp:
ムラサキ課長がいなくなって　寂しいですよ
私　頼り切っていたんですよね

dialogue_en: It thinks we're after materia.
dialogue_jp: マテリアの守り手か

dialogue_en: Someone should tell it we're not.
dialogue_jp: 盗む気なんてないけど？

dialogue_en: Be my guest.
dialogue_jp: 説得してみろ

dialogue_en: Crazy creatures on this mountain.
dialogue_jp: ニブル山に　こんなヤツがいたなんて

dialogue_en: Thanks to all the mako, no doubt.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄に適応した結果だろう

dialogue_en: It's a good thing they dispatched us.
dialogue_jp: 一般兵では対処できなかったな

dialogue_en: Finally, something worthy of a SOLDIER!
dialogue_jp: ああ　ソルジャーが来たかいがある

dialogue_en: Cloud! We fight as a team.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　ひとりで戦おうとするな

dialogue_en: Work with me, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　連携していくぞ

dialogue_en: Gotta keep your guard up.
dialogue_jp: しっかりガードしていかないと

dialogue_en: Stop leavin' yourself open.
dialogue_jp: ガードしないと厳しいか

dialogue_en: Try to keep your guard up.
dialogue_jp: 守りがおろそかだぞ

dialogue_en: Defense, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: 守備をおこたるな

dialogue_en: Maybe try mixin' it up more?
dialogue_jp: 違う技も試してみるか

dialogue_en: Time to kick it up a notch!
dialogue_jp: そろそろ　本気出してくか！

dialogue_en: Try to mix it up a little.
dialogue_jp: 技をうまく使え

dialogue_en: You need to vary your attacks.
dialogue_jp: 攻撃が単調になっているぞ

dialogue_en: Pretty mobile.
dialogue_jp: 器用なヤツ

dialogue_en: Till we knock it down.
dialogue_jp: 撃ち落とすまでだ

dialogue_en: Good thing I don't just fight with a sword!
dialogue_jp: 剣だけじゃないってとこ　見せてやる

dialogue_en: Go for the legs!
dialogue_jp: まず　脚をやろう！

dialogue_en: Take out its legs! Now!
dialogue_jp: 脚だ　ヤツを落とす

dialogue_en: Got him!
dialogue_jp: やった！

dialogue_en: Move in!
dialogue_jp: たたみかけるぞ

dialogue_en: Copy!
dialogue_jp: りょーかい！

dialogue_en: Now's our chance!
dialogue_jp: いまならやれる！

dialogue_en: Goin' in!
dialogue_jp: 攻めよう！

dialogue_en: Time to shine!
dialogue_jp: たたみかけるぞ

dialogue_en: Here goes!
dialogue_jp: 見せ場だな

dialogue_en: Don't like the looks of this.
dialogue_jp: なんか　ヤバい気がする

dialogue_en: Stay alert.
dialogue_jp: 準備しておけ

dialogue_en: Follow my lead.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　合わせろ

dialogue_en: Copy!
dialogue_jp: りょーかい！

dialogue_en: Ngah!
dialogue_jp: いって！

dialogue_en: Sephiroth! Little help!?
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　協力しないと

dialogue_en: You're gonna need my help.
dialogue_jp: ひとりでは耐えられんな

dialogue_en: We need to work together.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　連携していくぞ

dialogue_en: Whoa... That was insane!
dialogue_jp: うわ　さすが英雄！

dialogue_en: Don't get distracted─strike.
dialogue_jp: 気を抜くな　いくぞ

dialogue_en: I know, I know!
dialogue_jp: わかってるって！

dialogue_en: Might wanna steer clear of the gas.
dialogue_jp: あの魔晄　なんかヤバそう

dialogue_en: Watch the gas!
dialogue_jp: 魔晄ガスに注意！

dialogue_en: Can't go near the mako...
dialogue_jp: 魔晄が帯電している……？

dialogue_en: Watch the gas.
dialogue_jp: 魔晄ガスに気をつけろ

dialogue_en: Not doin' so great.
dialogue_jp: まずい……かも

dialogue_en: Rookies.
dialogue_jp: 世話が焼ける

dialogue_en: Dammit! Not again.
dialogue_jp: くそ　またかよ

dialogue_en: Get it together.
dialogue_jp: なにをしている

dialogue_en: Get me outta here!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　頼む！

dialogue_en: Shouldn't be too hard.
dialogue_jp: 脚を落とすか

dialogue_en: Sephiroth! Legs! ASAP!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　脚　はやく！

dialogue_en: Just hold on.
dialogue_jp: じっとしてろ

dialogue_en: I owe you one.
dialogue_jp: 助かった

dialogue_en: When we're done.
dialogue_jp: 挽回しろ

dialogue_en: Of course!
dialogue_jp: とーぜん！

dialogue_en: What the hell just happened?
dialogue_jp: なにが起きやがった？

dialogue_en: Did it just...change?
dialogue_jp: 様子　変わった？

dialogue_en: Something's different about it!
dialogue_jp: さっきまでと　ちゃいまっせ！

dialogue_en: Not again!
dialogue_jp: またかよ！

dialogue_en: Come on!
dialogue_jp: もうっ！

dialogue_en: This doesnae look good...
dialogue_jp: これは　難儀やわ……

dialogue_en: Didn't make a dent!
dialogue_jp: くそ　効いてねえか

dialogue_en: This is gettin' us nowhere!
dialogue_jp: なあっ　通らねえ！

dialogue_en: I don't think that did much.
dialogue_jp: これじゃあ　ダメ？

dialogue_en: Huh!?
dialogue_jp: あれっ？

dialogue_en: ...Well that didnae work.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　イマイチですなあ

dialogue_en: Whoops...
dialogue_jp: あっちゃ～……

dialogue_en: Can't keep up, can ya?
dialogue_jp: このまま続けんぞ！

dialogue_en: Too much?
dialogue_jp: よろけてる？

dialogue_en: A bit run down, eh?
dialogue_jp: 息　あがってるんとちゃう？

dialogue_en: Let's finish it off!
dialogue_jp: 終わらせてやらあ！

dialogue_en: You're goin' down!
dialogue_jp: やってやらあ！

dialogue_en: Wish it hadn't come to this...
dialogue_jp: ごめん　行くよ！

dialogue_en: We'll make it quick!
dialogue_jp: 苦しませない！

dialogue_en: We've got him on the ropes!
dialogue_jp: これはもろたで！

dialogue_en: Now! Get in there!
dialogue_jp: ツッコミどころや！

dialogue_en: It's in pain...
dialogue_jp: 苦しんでる……？

dialogue_en: Ach, this isnae right!
dialogue_jp: こんなん　めちゃくちゃですわ！

dialogue_en: I swear, when I get my hands on Hojo...
dialogue_jp: 宝条の野郎　許さねえ！

dialogue_en: Gettin' careless.
dialogue_jp: 油断したか……

dialogue_en: Ach!
dialogue_jp: ありゃ～！

dialogue_en: Ugh, this guy's a real pain in the ass!
dialogue_jp: チッ　面倒くせえ！

dialogue_en: Are you serious!?
dialogue_jp: 攻撃を止めなきゃ！

dialogue_en: Ugh... How do we stop him?
dialogue_jp: もう　手加減なし？

dialogue_en: Stop gettin' hit!
dialogue_jp: やったな！

dialogue_en: Just you try that again!
dialogue_jp: こんニャロ～！

dialogue_en: Don't just take it!
dialogue_jp: 確実に防ぐぞ

dialogue_en: Keep that guard up, eh!?
dialogue_jp: きっちり守ってきましょ！

dialogue_en: We have to look for an opening!
dialogue_jp: どーにか　隙を見つけんと！

dialogue_en: Wait till he stops moving!
dialogue_jp: 動きが止まるときを狙う！

dialogue_en: Dammit!
dialogue_jp: しまった！

dialogue_en: I'll feel that tomorrow!
dialogue_jp: やりすぎや～！

dialogue_en: Bastard sure packs a punch!
dialogue_jp: なんつー威力だ！

dialogue_en: Whadda we do?
dialogue_jp: どうしよう……

dialogue_en: There has to be a way...
dialogue_jp: もう　どうして……！

dialogue_en: Gotta get outta the way...
dialogue_jp: どうにかしないと……

dialogue_en: Can't keep takin' these kind of hits!
dialogue_jp: 何度もくらってらんないよ！

dialogue_en: Stay out of his way!
dialogue_jp: 回避に集中しろ！

dialogue_en: There's no shame in runnin'!
dialogue_jp: 逃げるが勝ちですわ！

dialogue_en: Heads up!
dialogue_jp: 来るぞ！

dialogue_en: Look out!
dialogue_jp: なっ　なんか来まっせ！

dialogue_en: What a relief!
dialogue_jp: 待ってたよ

dialogue_en: Must've been quite the trek.
dialogue_jp: 遠くから　ありがとうな

dialogue_en: Is he like Sephiroth too!?
dialogue_jp: セフィロスによろしくな！

dialogue_en: Man, I wish I could be a SOLDIER too!
dialogue_jp: ソルジャーってのはカッコイイな

dialogue_en: Counting on you to get rid of those fiends!
dialogue_jp: 山のモンスターを片付けてくれよ

dialogue_en: You guys need anything, just say the word!
dialogue_jp:
困ったことがあったら
なんでも言ってくれよ

dialogue_en: Now that Sephiroth's here, those beasts are toast!
dialogue_jp:
英雄セフィロスがいれば
怖いものなしだ

dialogue_en: Well, I'll be─Cloud! Look at you─a man grown!
dialogue_jp:
あれ　クラウド君じゃない？
立派になって

dialogue_en: We're gonna whip you up the best meals you've ever had! You'll see!
dialogue_jp:
おいしい食事を用意するから
楽しみにしててね

dialogue_en: Be sure to rest up tonight! Got a long day tomorrow!
dialogue_jp:
今日はしっかり休んで
任務に備えてね

dialogue_en: He's not just a hero, but a gorgeous one at that, with his flowing silver hair and perfect face.
dialogue_jp:
英雄セフィロス
きれいな銀髪に美しい顔立ちね

dialogue_en: So like, how do SOLDIERs know who's First and who's Second?
dialogue_jp:
ソルジャーには
１ｓｔとか２ｎｄとかいるんでしょ？

dialogue_en: Oh my gosh! Cloud!? Have you gone to see your mother yet?
dialogue_jp:
あら　クラウド君
お母さんには会ったの？

dialogue_en: Hey, bro, lemme get a good look at that sword!
dialogue_jp: その剣　よく見せてくれよ

dialogue_en: Are you super strong!?
dialogue_jp: 兄ちゃん　つよいの？

dialogue_en: Gonna be here awhile? Then come play with us!
dialogue_jp:
しばらくいるの？
いっしょにあそぼう

dialogue_en: Did you come from Midgar too?
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルから来たの？

dialogue_en: You're gonna save Nibelheim, right!?
dialogue_jp: 村を助けてくれるんでしょ？

dialogue_en: Hey, are you, like, a famous person?
dialogue_jp:
ねえねえ
あなたもゆーめーじん？

dialogue_en: Wow, you look so big and strong!
dialogue_jp:
うわ～　きたえてて
つよそうだね

dialogue_en: To think I'd get to see Sephiroth with my own eyes.
dialogue_jp:
英雄セフィロスを
この目で見られるなんて

dialogue_en: In all my years I've never felt so alive!
dialogue_jp: 長生きはするもんだねえ

dialogue_en: He's taller than I expected. Stronger too, I'll wager.
dialogue_jp: ああ　本当に大きくて強そうな人だ

dialogue_en: I heard during the war he fought a hundred men─at the same time!
dialogue_jp:
先の戦争じゃ　１００人とか相手に
ひとりで戦ったんだろ？

dialogue_en: These SOLDIERs are really something.
dialogue_jp: ソルジャーってのはすごいねえ

dialogue_en: Whole lotta monsters been poppin' up on Mt. Nibel lately. Way more than we can handle.
dialogue_jp:
ニブル山のモンスターが
急に増えてしまって
困り果てておったんだが

dialogue_en: But you bein' here, why─it's a real weight off our shoulders. On behalf of the whole town, let me just say thank you.
dialogue_jp:
神羅のみなさんに来ていただいたんなら
もう安心ですな　ありがたいことです

dialogue_en: Between you and me, once all this trouble's behind us, first thing I'm gonna do is go huntin', just like we used to.
dialogue_jp:
この騒動が無事解決したら
また昔のように猟に出たいですねえ

dialogue_en: How's it goin' over there? You done yet?
dialogue_jp: おう　そっちの補強は終わったか？

dialogue_en: Good. We need to get this finished ASAP.
dialogue_jp:
モンスターが
どっから襲ってくるかわかんねえ

dialogue_en: Never know when they're gonna attack us next.
dialogue_jp:
いまのうちに
やれるだけやっとかねえと

dialogue_en: She's trying to help me round up food for dinner, but at this rate we'll be out here all night.
dialogue_jp:
あはは　食材調達を手伝わせてみたけど
この調子じゃ日が暮れちまうね

dialogue_en: I'd prob'ly have had better luck if I got Tifa's old cat to lend a paw!
dialogue_jp:
ティファちゃんとこのネコのほうが
よっぽど上手に捕まえるよ

dialogue_en:
Bow-wow-wow, bow-wow-wow, he's a good boy who never stops!
Keeping our city safe for each and everyone!♪
dialogue_jp:
走れ～　走れスタンプ～
進め～　進めスタンプ～

dialogue_en:
Go all out, go all out, little Stamp!
You've got so much courage and everybody thinks you're swell!♪
dialogue_jp:
走れ～　走れスタンプ～
進め～　進めスタンプ～

dialogue_en:
Stamp's real popular in Midgar, right!?
I bet everybody there loves him!
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　忠犬スタンプ知ってる？
ミッドガルで流行ってるんでしょ

dialogue_en: I bet they got all kindsa toys there too!
dialogue_jp:
スタンプのぬいぐるみとかも
あるんでしょ？

dialogue_en: Aw, man, now I really wanna go to Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
いいなあ
ミッドガル行ってみたいな～

dialogue_en: Y'know, I'm gonna move to Midgar when I grow up. Gonna become a super famous singer!
dialogue_jp:
はは　ボクはいつかミッドガルに行くぞ
ミッドガルで歌手になるんだ！

dialogue_en: Not this again.
dialogue_jp: また言ってる

dialogue_en: But...if you do make it big there, you gotta promise I can come visit!
dialogue_jp:
でも　もし成功したら
ちゃんとあたしをむかえに来てね

dialogue_en: You're with the survey team, aren't you?
dialogue_jp: あんた　調査隊の人？

dialogue_en: Can I ask─does the reactor situation have anything to do with all the monster sightings?
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉の異常と
モンスターが増えてることって
なんか　関係があるのか？

dialogue_en: I mean, something's gotta be goin' on up there.
dialogue_jp: なあ　ニブル山でなにが起きてるんだ？

dialogue_en: We asked before, but Shinra told us the thing's on standby or something?
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉って
本格的には稼働してないはずだよな

dialogue_en: Oh, hey there.
dialogue_jp: ごくろうさまです

dialogue_en: You boys're gonna be well stocked for your trip up the mountain, believe you me.
dialogue_jp:
調査隊のお弁当には
こだわり野菜をモリモリつめこむから

dialogue_en: It'll be a right feast.
dialogue_jp: 楽しみにしていてね

dialogue_en: All you need to do is get a good night's rest. This country's not kind to folks who brave it without a clear head.
dialogue_jp:
長旅の疲れがあるかもですけど
明日の調査　がんばってくださいよ

dialogue_en: What's wrong, my little dears? It isn't like you to be making such a fuss.
dialogue_jp:
あらあら　どうしちゃったの？
めずらしくずいぶん暴れて

dialogue_en: Is something making you upset? There, there, you don't have to worry, the Shinra folks are here to help.
dialogue_jp:
なにか良くないことを感じてるのかしら
神羅の人たちが来てくれたから大丈夫よ

dialogue_en: The Shinra shoulders are super cool.
dialogue_jp:
しんらのそるざ
かっこよかったね

dialogue_en: Don't you worry─we'll make sure you guys're ready for your hike up the mountain tomorrow.
dialogue_jp:
よく来てくれた
調査隊を迎える準備も進んでるよ

dialogue_en: How you still got energy after the trip here, I'll never know!
dialogue_jp:
長旅だったのに元気だね
頼もしいな

dialogue_en: Just crazy to think that Sephiroth is here─in our town!
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスが気になって
仕事が手につかないよ

dialogue_en: You take it easy─rest up for tomorrow.
dialogue_jp: 任務に備えて　ゆっくりしてくれよ

dialogue_en: So, whaddya think of our village? Pretty nice, right?
dialogue_jp:
調査隊のみなさんは
この村を気に入ってくれたかね？

dialogue_en: I'd wager SOLDIERs eat more than your average Joe.
dialogue_jp:
ソルジャーは　食べる量も
普通より多いのかな？

dialogue_en: Well, as I live and breathe... Cloud!
dialogue_jp:
おっ　クラウドじゃねえか！
久しぶりだな

dialogue_en: We'll make sure the survey team gets a heaping helping of our best produce!
dialogue_jp:
新鮮な食材は
ぜんぶ　調査隊にまわすからね

dialogue_en: Excuse me, but you're friends with Sephiroth, right!?
dialogue_jp: わあ　セフィロスさんのお仲間の人ね！

dialogue_en: Oh, you're off duty? Isn't that nice.
dialogue_jp: へえ　いまは自由時間なのかい？

dialogue_en: Ever since we heard a survey team was coming, we've been working our fingers to the bone.
dialogue_jp:
調査隊がくるって決まってから
働きづめなのよ

dialogue_en: Finally. Soon these troubles'll be a thing of the past.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　これでまた
平和な村に戻るわね

dialogue_en: Hold on a second. Is that Cloud?
dialogue_jp: あれ　もしかしてクラウド君かな？

dialogue_en: I'm Sephiroth!
dialogue_jp: おれがセフィロスだ！

dialogue_en: I get to be Sephiroth now!
dialogue_jp: ぼくがセフィロスね

dialogue_en: Sephiroth's here to save the day!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス参上！

dialogue_en: I'm Sephiroth this time!
dialogue_jp: あたし　セフィロスやる

dialogue_en: The 1-C SOLDIER wins again!
dialogue_jp: ソルジャー１ｓｔの勝利！

dialogue_en: And that is the power of a true hero!
dialogue_jp: 見たか　英雄のちから！

dialogue_en: For justice!
dialogue_jp: 決まった～！

dialogue_en: Duh-duh-duh duuun duuun duuun dun duh-duuun!♪
dialogue_jp: たたたた～ら　ら～たったた～ん！

dialogue_en: Everyone keeps their eyes out for fiends in the underbrush...
dialogue_jp:
モンスターには
空を飛ぶやつもいてさ

dialogue_en: But I've seen some that'll swoop down from above. That's why I make sure to watch the skies like a hawk.
dialogue_jp:
どこから襲ってくるかわからないから
あらゆる方面を
警戒しなくちゃならないんだ

dialogue_en: Problem is, staring up all the time gives me terrible neck cramps. Small price to pay though.
dialogue_jp:
空　見あげてると肩こるし
首も痛くて　まいっちゃうよ

dialogue_en: This is my third load of laundry today!
dialogue_jp: 今日　３度目のお洗濯よ

dialogue_en: The mako pipeline's a lifesaver. I'd never be able to get all this done without it.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄パイプのおかげでよく乾くの
助かるわ～

dialogue_en: I don't know what we'd do without Shinra.
dialogue_jp: 神羅のみなさんに感謝しなきゃ

dialogue_en: Do you know the legends about Mt. Nibel? They say that, just beyond it, lies the land of the dead.
dialogue_jp:
ニブル山の向こうには死者の国がある
という言い伝えがあるんだ

dialogue_en: So it could well be that what's got the fiends riled up is restless spirits.
dialogue_jp:
最近のモンスター騒ぎは
死者がよみがえってるのかもな

dialogue_en: Indeed, maybe the land of the dead really does exist. Right in our backyard.
dialogue_jp:
ふふふ　山の向こうに
死者の国が本当にあるのかどうか

dialogue_en: Y'all think you could find out for us?
dialogue_jp: 調査隊で調べてきてくれよ

dialogue_en: The survey team brought medical supplies too. What a relief.
dialogue_jp:
調査隊が医療品も持ってきてくれて
助かったよ

dialogue_en: With everyone doing extra shifts, we've got more people coming back wounded. It's a real drain on our resources.
dialogue_jp:
自警団がみんなの当番制になってから
ケガ人続出で
薬の在庫が尽きかけてたからね

dialogue_en: Even if I've got to join the watch 'cause I'm "young and fit"...
dialogue_jp:
若いってだけで
自警団に参加させられても

dialogue_en: without any real training, the first monster I fight is gonna eat me alive!
dialogue_jp:
ろくな訓練もしてないんだから
モンスターにやられるしかないわよね

dialogue_en: Nothing to report here, sir!
dialogue_jp: こちら　異状な～し！

dialogue_en: Hello, sir─uh, SOLDIER!
dialogue_jp: ソルジャーさん　お疲れさまです

dialogue_en: All clear here, SOLDIER sir!
dialogue_jp: モンスターの気配は　ありません！

dialogue_en: The Nibelheim watch is standing guard, sir.
dialogue_jp: ニブルヘイム自警団　警備中です

dialogue_en: Nothing to report here.
dialogue_jp: 異状なしでありますよ

dialogue_en: I wonder if I can knock off for lunch yet.
dialogue_jp: お弁当の時間はまだかいの？

dialogue_en: Back in the old days, I saw my fair share of fightin'.
dialogue_jp: 昔はわしも　戦ったもんだが

dialogue_en: Keep your wits about you, people! Beware of fiends!
dialogue_jp: 気を抜くな　モンスター注意！

dialogue_en: Fiends in the area! All children, return to your homes!
dialogue_jp:
モンスター注意！
子供たちは家に帰りなさ～い

dialogue_en: Fiends are out and about! Keep your eyes peeled, people!
dialogue_jp:
モンスター注意！
みんな　気をつけて

dialogue_en: Please remain in town! Monsters have been sighted!
dialogue_jp:
村の外には出ないでね
モンスター注意！

dialogue_en: I thought you'd never come!
dialogue_jp: ようやく来てくれたか

dialogue_en: Nothin' like that cool mountain breeze, am I right?
dialogue_jp:
ニブル山から吹きおろす風が
心地いいだろ？

dialogue_en: If you're feeling tense, you could always join one of the group stretching sessions in the square.
dialogue_jp:
疲れをほぐすなら
広場の体操に参加するといいよ

dialogue_en: We're all thrilled to have you.
dialogue_jp: あはは　今日はみんな浮かれてるよ

dialogue_en: Make sure you're prepared for a tough hike tomorrow!
dialogue_jp:
ニブル山は険しいから
気をつけてな

dialogue_en: Sephiroth! In our town!
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスさんは
役場で打ち合わせだってよ

dialogue_en: It's a miracle we held out this long. Glad Shinra's finally showed up.
dialogue_jp:
いやあ　待ちわびたよ
これまで大変だったんだ

dialogue_en: Come on! Sephiroth's at the town hall!
dialogue_jp:
お～い
セフィロス見るなら役場だぞ！

dialogue_en: Thank you so, so much for coming all the way out here.
dialogue_jp: よく来てくれたわね　ありがとう

dialogue_en: Wow, real SOLDIERs!
dialogue_jp: 本物のソルジャーがいるなんて

dialogue_en: Goodness! Is that you, Cloud?
dialogue_jp: やだ　クラウド君じゃないの！

dialogue_en: It's been a long time since we had this much excitement.
dialogue_jp:
みなさんが来てくれて
村も明るくなったわ

dialogue_en: Oh, hello there, Cloud. When did you get back in town?
dialogue_jp:
あれ　クラウド君
いつ帰ったの？

dialogue_en: I gotta catch a glimpse of Sephiroth!
dialogue_jp:
役場にセフィロスさんを
見に行かなきゃ！

dialogue_en: I'd like to see how SOLDIERs keep in shape.
dialogue_jp: ソルジャーさんの体操を見てみたいわ

dialogue_en: Want to join us for some Zanga-cise?
dialogue_jp: あなたも長生き体操やってみない？

dialogue_en: City folk are so sophisticated! Can only imagine what their lives must be like.
dialogue_jp:
都会の人たちってステキね
村の人たちとは大違い

dialogue_en: That sword's huge! Can I touch it?
dialogue_jp:
うわ～　でっかい剣
さわらせて！

dialogue_en: Hey, are you that hero guy's friend?
dialogue_jp: 兄ちゃん　英雄のトモダチなの？

dialogue_en: Hey, what's Midgar like?
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルのお話きかせて

dialogue_en: Whoa! Are you really a Shinra shoulder, mister?
dialogue_jp:
すげえ～！
そるざだ　そるざだ～

dialogue_en: Heroes comin' through! Heroes!
dialogue_jp: えいゆーえいゆー　ひゅ～！

dialogue_en: Is it fun being a SOLDIER?
dialogue_jp: ソルジャーって　たのしい？

dialogue_en: Is Sephiroth a friend of yours?
dialogue_jp: セフィロスさんのともだち？

dialogue_en: That sword looks really heavy.
dialogue_jp: その剣　重くないの？

dialogue_en: I wanna grow my hair long like Sephiroth!
dialogue_jp: セフィロスみたいな髪になりた～い

dialogue_en: We're all counting on you, Sephiroth!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　がんばってくれよ！

dialogue_en: I'd be honored to give you a tour of the village, if ya like!
dialogue_jp:
セフィロス
村の見どころを案内するぞ

dialogue_en: Sorry about the mayor! He's a chatterbox, we know!
dialogue_jp: お～い　村長の長話すまんな

dialogue_en: Se-phi-roth! Se-phi-roth!
dialogue_jp:
セフィロス　セフィロス
セフィローーース！

dialogue_en: Over here! C'mon... Look over here!
dialogue_jp: セフィロスさ～ん　お顔見せて～！

dialogue_en: Se-phi-roth! Se-phi-roth!
dialogue_jp:
セフィロス　セフィロス
セフィローーース！

dialogue_en: The mayor's so lucky─getting one-on-one time with a hero.
dialogue_jp:
英雄と話せるなんて
村長がうらやましい！

dialogue_en: Hey, Sephiroth! We believe in you!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　応援してるわ～！

dialogue_en: Sephiroth! Save our village from those nasty fiends!
dialogue_jp: セフィロスさ～ん　村を守ってね

dialogue_en: Se-phi-roth! Se-phi-roth!
dialogue_jp:
セフィロス　セフィロス
セフィローーース！

dialogue_en: Hey, Shinra shoulders!
dialogue_jp: そるざ　出てきて～

dialogue_en: Sephiroth's really here!? Wow!
dialogue_jp: セフィロスがいる　すっげ～！

dialogue_en: Se-phi-roth! Se-phi-roth! Se-phi-roth!
dialogue_jp:
せふぃろす　せふぃろす
せふぃろす～～～！

dialogue_en: Thanks so much for coming, Mr. SOLDIER!
dialogue_jp:
ソルジャー
来てくれてありがと～

dialogue_en: Oh, taking a breather?
dialogue_jp: おっ　休むのかい？

dialogue_en: Go get 'em!
dialogue_jp: がんばってくれ！

dialogue_en: You're with Sephiroth, aren't you?
dialogue_jp: セフィロスさんに　よろしく！

dialogue_en: Make sure you're good and rested!
dialogue_jp: あっ　お疲れ様です！

dialogue_en: Better get a good night's sleep!
dialogue_jp: ゆっくり休んでね

dialogue_en: Everyone, please, calm down!
dialogue_jp: みなさん　落ち着いて！

dialogue_en: I'm eager to talk to him too, but now's not the time!
dialogue_jp:
私だって
セフィロスさんと話したいんですよ？

dialogue_en: Please, everyone! Give them space!
dialogue_jp:
はあはあ……
みなさん　落ち着いて

dialogue_en: We need to leave these men in peace so that they can rest up for tomorrow.
dialogue_jp:
ほら　ゆっくり休んでもらわないと
困るでしょ

dialogue_en:
Come on, that's enough!
Please, go back to your homes!
dialogue_jp: ほらほら　みなさん解散して

dialogue_en: Don't make any trouble for Sephiroth!
dialogue_jp: 騒ぐと迷惑ですよ！

dialogue_en: Don't worry, we'll get your stuff where it needs to be.
dialogue_jp:
調査隊のみなさんの荷物を
運んでるんですよ

dialogue_en: I guess you're not allowed to tell us what's inside all these, huh?
dialogue_jp:
神羅印の箱には
なにが入ってるんでしょうね

dialogue_en: The survey team is the coolest.
dialogue_jp: はあ　調査隊かっこいいよなあ

dialogue_en: Man, why didn't I enlist like everyone else when I had the chance!?
dialogue_jp:
俺も　みんなといっしょに
神羅軍に志願しときゃよかった

dialogue_en: Heh... You wouldn't've lasted a day.
dialogue_jp: あははは　よく言うよ

dialogue_en: Who was it that used to say how scary the military was?
dialogue_jp:
軍隊は怖いって言ってたのは
どこのどいつだ？

dialogue_en: I have the perfect scarf for Sephiroth.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスさんに
プレゼントを用意したんだ

dialogue_en: He'll look so handsome in it.
dialogue_jp: 手編みのマフラーだよ

dialogue_en: Oh, my god! Mom!
dialogue_jp: やだ　お母さん！

dialogue_en: You told me you made that for Dad for your wedding anniversary!
dialogue_jp:
それ　お父さんにあげるって
言ってたやつじゃない

dialogue_en: Bet you wouldn't mind if the survey team had to come and drive 'em off.
dialogue_jp:
調査隊の人たちに見られたら
恥ずかしいよ

dialogue_en: Those SOLDIERs certainly are handsome, don't you think?
dialogue_jp:
ソルジャーってのは
みんなカッコいいしねえ

dialogue_en: What? Really? I thought you were happy he decided to stay at home!
dialogue_jp:
あら　アンタんとこは
実家に残ってくれて良かったじゃない

dialogue_en: I'm sure a good boy like Sephiroth sends his mother money all the time.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスみたいに出世して
仕送りでもしてもらいたいもんだよ

dialogue_en: You've grown so much since the last time we saw you! Oh─did you come looking for Tifa?
dialogue_jp:
あらまあ　何年ぶりだろ
ティファちゃんに会いに来たのかい？

dialogue_en: The least you could do is say hello to us. As if we're strangers! There's no need to be so standoffish!
dialogue_jp:
ほらアンタ　挨拶くらいしなよ
んも～　相変わらず無愛想だねえ

dialogue_en: You haven't changed one bit. That uniform can't disguise the naughty little boy I know.
dialogue_jp:
あはははは　子供の頃のまんまだ
制服着たって変わらないねえ

dialogue_en: If anyone on the survey team is feeling hungry, be sure to stop by!
dialogue_jp:
調査団のみなさ～ん
お腹がすいたら寄っていって

dialogue_en: We've got sandwiches stuffed with Nibelheim's famous simmered pork!
dialogue_jp:
ニブルヘイム自慢の
煮豚入りサンドイッチを用意したよ

dialogue_en: And there's more than enough chicken-and-veggie soup to go around!
dialogue_jp:
チキンとお野菜の
ごった煮スープもあるよ

dialogue_en: So eat your fill and ask for seconds, boys!
dialogue_jp: どうぞ　ほっこり温まっていって！

dialogue_en: That goes for the militia men too! We've got plenty more where this came from, so dig in!
dialogue_jp:
自警団のみんなも
たくさんあるから遠慮しないで

dialogue_en: SOLDIER! Good to see ya. How about a taste of home before ya go?
dialogue_jp:
ほら　ソルジャーさん
ふるさとの味　食べてみない？

dialogue_en: Wait a minute─is that Cloud!?
dialogue_jp: あらあら　クラウドじゃないの？

dialogue_en: Silly boy! You should've let us know you'd be paying us a visit!
dialogue_jp:
ちょっと　帰るなら
連絡くらいしなさいよ

dialogue_en:
Eat up, Cloud!
You've still got room to grow, y'know.
dialogue_jp:
あっ　クラウド
もっと食べていきなさいよ

dialogue_en: You remember these pork sandwiches, don't you? They're exactly like the ones Mrs. Tyler used to make.
dialogue_jp:
煮豚入りサンドイッチ　覚えてるだろ？
タイラーさんちの自慢の料理だよ

dialogue_en: I'm sure you must've taken them as snacks on a playdate before!
dialogue_jp:
ほら　アンタたち
お茶会によく持っていったでしょ

dialogue_en: Wait─did you go on any playdates?
dialogue_jp:
あっ　アンタは
行かなかったんだっけ

dialogue_en: Claudia must be so proud of what a fine young man you've become. Take care of yourself.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　ほんと立派になって
どうぞどうぞ

dialogue_en: You'll be spending the night at home, won't you? Maybe I'll pay your mother a visit.
dialogue_jp:
今日は実家に泊まるんでしょ？
あたし　遊びに行こうかしら

dialogue_en:
Oh, but I shouldn't impose.
You two must have a lot of catching up to do!
dialogue_jp:
あっ　お邪魔だわね
親子水いらずがいいか

dialogue_en: You don't wanna keep your mother waiting, do you?
dialogue_jp: 早くお母さんとこ　行ってあげな

dialogue_en: Don't be a stranger now, Cloud! I know your mother would be happy to see you much more often.
dialogue_jp:
たまにゃ顔見せに帰ってきなよ
お母さんを安心させてやらなきゃ

dialogue_en: Just so you know, we're pulling out all the stops for your team.
dialogue_jp:
調査団のみなさんのために
腕をふるうのよ

dialogue_en: Wonder if Sephiroth'll drop by.
dialogue_jp: セフィロスさんも来てくれるかな

dialogue_en: That's it... Just need to simmer a bit longer.
dialogue_jp:
コトコトコトコト
よ～く煮込んで

dialogue_en: This oughta help put some meat on those kids' bones.
dialogue_jp: みんなが元気になりますように

dialogue_en: Hey, good to see ya, SOLDIER!
dialogue_jp: ソルジャーさん　お疲れさまです！

dialogue_en: You can leave this gate to us: nobody's getting through on our watch!
dialogue_jp:
ここは俺たちが守ってますんで
安心してください

dialogue_en: Thanks for comin'. We really can't handle this ourselves!
dialogue_jp:
ありがとうございます
村を守ってください

dialogue_en: Whoa there, SOLDIER. Thought you weren't heading out till dawn.
dialogue_jp:
ソルジャーさん
調査は　明朝出発のはずです

dialogue_en: Be sure to rest up while you can!
dialogue_jp: 今日は　ゆっくり休んでください

dialogue_en: Alright, everybody! Gather round─it's time to Zanga-cise! Ready to get started? Let's Zanga!
dialogue_jp:
では　はじめましょう
ザンガン体操　第１の型
よ～い！

dialogue_en: Okay! Put your fingertips together, and lift your hands to the sky!
dialogue_jp:
はい　両手の指先を
天に向かって突き出しま～す

dialogue_en: Arms tight to the ears, and spread those hands!
dialogue_jp: 腕は耳につけて　手のひらは前へ

dialogue_en: Keep your arms straight! Feel the stretch all the way to your fingertips!
dialogue_jp:
まっすぐ　指先まで
ピンと伸ばしてくださ～い

dialogue_en: Good, good! Keep 'em straight─now stretch that spine!
dialogue_jp:
はい　伸びきったら
そのまま背伸び

dialogue_en: Now lift your heels! Hold it─hold it!
dialogue_jp:
かかとをしっかりあげて
踏んばって～！

dialogue_en: Inhale...exhale... Deep...steady breaths! Count to ten... Relaaax...
dialogue_jp:
ふ～～は～～……
ゆっくり呼吸　息止めないで
１０かぞえたら　脱力

dialogue_en: We're just getting started! Time for our second Zanga-cise pose─and here. We. Go!
dialogue_jp:
つづけますよ
ザンガン体操　第２の型
よ～い！

dialogue_en: Alright, stretch for the sky again! Be sure to keep your arms tight against those ears!
dialogue_jp:
はい　また両手を上へ
腕は耳につけま～す

dialogue_en: Hold that pose, bend your right knee...and lift your leg very slowly!
dialogue_jp:
そのまま右のひざを曲げて
ゆっくりと　ももをあげていきま～す

dialogue_en: Keep that knee bent at ninety degrees. Now, focus on your stomach, right below the belly button.
dialogue_jp:
ひざは９０度の角度で止めて
おへその下の丹田に力を込めて

dialogue_en: Good─keep your balance...!
dialogue_jp: はい　グラグラしな～い

dialogue_en: Inhale...and exhale!
dialogue_jp:
ゆっくり呼吸
吐いて　吸って

dialogue_en: Hoo...hah...
Now, reach even higher! For the stars!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　もっと伸びて
伸びて～！

dialogue_en: Don't forget to keep breathing! Now count slowly up to ten...then relaaax!
dialogue_jp:
は～い　息止めないで
１０かぞえたら　脱力

dialogue_en: We're not done yet! Are you ready? Next up is Zanga-cise pose number three!
dialogue_jp:
つづけますよ
ザンガン体操　第３の型
よ～い！

dialogue_en: One more time─both hands to the heavens! Keep your arms tight against the ears!
dialogue_jp:
はい　両手を上へ
腕は耳につけま～す

dialogue_en: Now, lower your arms slowly, then gradually spread them wide...until they're parallel to the ground.
dialogue_jp:
つづいて　腕をゆっくりと
水平の位置まで開いておろしながら

dialogue_en: Bend your left knee slowly...now raise that thigh!
dialogue_jp:
左のひざを曲げて
ももをあげていきま～す

dialogue_en: Extend your arms, and reach for that stretch!
dialogue_jp:
はい　両手は
まっすぐ伸ばして

dialogue_en: Remember to keep breathing. Inhale...and exhale!
dialogue_jp:
ここで呼吸
吐いて　吸って

dialogue_en: Hih...hah...
Good! Now hold that pose! Stay in position!
dialogue_jp:
はい　そのままキープ
グラグラしないで

dialogue_en: Inhale, exhale! Count to ten...and relax!
dialogue_jp:
吸って　吐いて
ふ～～は～～
１０かぞえたら　脱力

dialogue_en: Okay! That was some great effort! Now let's all take a short break.
dialogue_jp:
は～い　よくできました！
じゃあすこし休憩

dialogue_en: If you're feeling a bit tense, use this time to stretch.
dialogue_jp:
伸ばし足りないところがあれば
ストレッチして

dialogue_en: Now, once more from the top!
dialogue_jp: はい　もういちどいきますよ

dialogue_en: This routine was developed by Zangan himself!
dialogue_jp:
ザンガン先生の
長生き体操っていうんですよ

dialogue_en: Practice it every day, and you'll live long and healthy lives!
dialogue_jp:
みんなが健康で　いつまでも
元気に暮らすための体操なんです

dialogue_en: Normally, our star athlete Tifa is the one who leads us in these exercises.
dialogue_jp:
普段は　村いちばんの運動神経の
ティファちゃんが教えてくれるんです

dialogue_en: Master Zangan!
dialogue_jp: ああ　ザンガン先生！

dialogue_en: By all means, please, show us how it's done!
dialogue_jp: どうぞどうぞ　ご指導ください

dialogue_en: Where'd you say Sephiroth went?
dialogue_jp: セフィロスさんは　どこだって？

dialogue_en: He's holed up inside the mansion.
dialogue_jp: 神羅屋敷にこもってるらしい

dialogue_en: Too much exposure to mako...?
dialogue_jp: 魔晄を吸いすぎたんじゃないか？

dialogue_en: Then we oughta bring him some medicine!
dialogue_jp: よし　薬を届けに行くぞ

dialogue_en: Well, here we are... What now?
dialogue_jp: ここまで来たけど　どうする？

dialogue_en: What if he's sick and needs our help?
dialogue_jp: 倒れてたら　どうすんのよ

dialogue_en: Him? A little mako poisoning isn't gonna hurt a living legend.
dialogue_jp:
だが　英雄セフィロスは
そんなやわじゃないだろう

dialogue_en: Go and check on Sephiroth for us, will ya?
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスさんの様子
見てきてください

dialogue_en: Hurry, please.
dialogue_jp: よろしくお願いします

dialogue_en: If you're looking for Sephiroth, I saw him headed toward the mansion.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスさんなら
この先の神羅屋敷に向かったよ

dialogue_en: It's pretty late─you should get some rest, SOLDIER!
dialogue_jp: あれ　今夜はもう休んでくださいよ

dialogue_en: Out for a little nighttime fun?
dialogue_jp: あはは　まさか夜遊びですか？

dialogue_en: Hold it, SOLDIER! It's not safe to wander around at night.
dialogue_jp:
だめだめ！
ソルジャーさんでも夜は危険です

dialogue_en: Hey... You're not thinking of trying to ditch us, are you?
dialogue_jp:
もしかして　逃げ出そうなんて
思ってないですよね

dialogue_en: There something wrong?
dialogue_jp: なんかあったんですか？

dialogue_en: Thanks so much for checking out the reactor. You should get some rest─we can keep an eye on things here.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄炉の調査　お疲れさまでした
夜の警備は俺たちにまかせてください

dialogue_en: We had this big dinner planned, but it got called off when Sephiroth didn't show.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスが来なくて
ソルジャーとの食事会
中止になったんだってな

dialogue_en: Hey, thanks for helping keep our village safe.
dialogue_jp:
村の見まわりですか？
ご苦労さまです

dialogue_en: Haven't seen Sephiroth─least not around here.
dialogue_jp:
セフィロスさんは
こっちには来てませんよ

dialogue_en: I'm beat. No reason for you to be burning the midnight mako, either. Go get some shut-eye.
dialogue_jp:
ふわ～あ……眠い
アンタも夜更かしはやめて
はやく寝なさい

dialogue_en: Nothin' out of the ordinary so far tonight.
dialogue_jp: いまのところ異状なしだ

dialogue_en: Don't worry, sonny. If a fiend rears its head, I'll shout for someone quicker than you can say "Shinra."
dialogue_jp:
なあに　モンスターが攻めてきたら
誰か呼ぶだけだから大丈夫

dialogue_en: I've got a handle on things here.
dialogue_jp: こっちは　おまかせあれ

dialogue_en: You go ahead and treat yourself to a hot shower or whatever you fancy. You definitely deserve it.
dialogue_jp:
ソルジャーさんは
熱いシャワーでもあびて
ゆっくり休んでくれよ

dialogue_en: Help! Help!
dialogue_jp: 誰か　助けて！

dialogue_en: This way! C'mon!
dialogue_jp: こっちだ　急げ！

dialogue_en: Aaah!
dialogue_jp: うわあああ！

dialogue_en: Watch out!
dialogue_jp: 崩れるぞ！

dialogue_en: Aaah!
dialogue_jp: ああ……ギャアアア！

dialogue_en: Run, run!
dialogue_jp: 逃げろ！

dialogue_en: How could he do this!?
dialogue_jp: セフィロスがやったのか？

dialogue_en: Sephiroth! Stop!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　やめてくれ！

dialogue_en: Water! I need water!
dialogue_jp: 熱い　熱いよ……

dialogue_en: Aaah!
dialogue_jp: きゃあああ！

dialogue_en: Oh god!
dialogue_jp: 危ない！

dialogue_en: Sephiroth did this?
dialogue_jp: セフィロスがやったの？

dialogue_en: Sephiroth... No!
dialogue_jp: セフィロス　いやあああ！

dialogue_en: Aaah!
dialogue_jp: うわあああ！

dialogue_en: Who's there? Please... Please...
dialogue_jp: うう……助けて……

dialogue_en: Urg...
dialogue_jp: ぐあっ……

dialogue_en: Grah...
dialogue_jp: かはっ……

dialogue_en: Ung... Ah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……あああ……

dialogue_en: There's no need to rush...
dialogue_jp: 慌てない　慌てない

dialogue_en: Slow and steady wins the race.
dialogue_jp: 無理せずゆっくり行きましょう

dialogue_en: Wow, you're doing great today. Keep it up.
dialogue_jp:
今日は調子よさそうですね
いいですよ

dialogue_en: Easy does it... Go at your own pace.
dialogue_jp: ゆ～っくり　ゆ～っくり……

dialogue_en: Why don't we take a short stroll before lunch?
dialogue_jp: ごはんの時間まで　お散歩しましょう

dialogue_en: One step at a time. Keep going. You can do it.
dialogue_jp:
１歩ずつ　１歩ずつ
歩みを止めないで

dialogue_en: How about a break?
dialogue_jp: ひと休みしましょう

dialogue_en: It's okay. Take all the time you need, alright?
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫　時間はたっぷりあります

dialogue_en: No need to wear yourself out. Let's rest.
dialogue_jp: 無理は禁物　ゆっくり休みましょう

dialogue_en: So, how are you feeling today? Any changes?
dialogue_jp:
今日の体調はどうです？
お変わりないですか

dialogue_en: You're okay. Deep breaths...
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫　深呼吸して

dialogue_en: Slowly now... Breathe in... And out...
dialogue_jp:
はい　ゆっくり息を吸って～
吐いて～

dialogue_en: There, there. Just relax. Nothing to be afraid of.
dialogue_jp:
安心して……
怖くない　怖くないですよ

dialogue_en: Just relax... You're alright...
dialogue_jp: 落ち着いて　大丈夫よ

dialogue_en: You must be in so much pain. Don't worry, I'm here for you.
dialogue_jp:
つらいね　苦しいね
そばにいるから安心してね

dialogue_en: Let's take a little break and try again, alright?
dialogue_jp: ひと休みして　落ち着きましょう

dialogue_en: Don't go causin' trouble. You hear me?
dialogue_jp: なんだ？　面倒を起こすなよ

dialogue_en: Stay out of our way. Understood?
dialogue_jp: おい　仕事の邪魔はするな

dialogue_en: What a shit job to get stuck with.
dialogue_jp: つまんねえ任務させやがって

dialogue_en: Hope I never wind up a freak like them.
dialogue_jp: 黒マントにはなりたくねえよな

dialogue_en: Been bustin' my hump lookin' after those...weirdos.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントたちの
お守りをしてやってんだよ

dialogue_en: Damn... This job's depressing.
dialogue_jp: くそ　気が滅入るぜ……

dialogue_en: Travelers, huh?
dialogue_jp: よそ者か……

dialogue_en: Get what you need, then leave.
dialogue_jp: 用が済んだら帰ってくれ

dialogue_en: What're they doin' here?
dialogue_jp: なにしに来たんだ

dialogue_en: There's nothing here, y'know.
dialogue_jp: ここには　なにもないよ

dialogue_en: Not now. I'm...kinda busy.
dialogue_jp: 悪いね　いま忙しいんだ

dialogue_en: What do you want?
dialogue_jp: なんの用かな？

dialogue_en: Ugh, visitors...
dialogue_jp: ああ　いやだわ

dialogue_en: Go away.
dialogue_jp: ほっといて

dialogue_en: I don't have anything to say to you.
dialogue_jp: お話しすることはありません

dialogue_en: Just forget what you saw here.
dialogue_jp: ここのことは忘れてください

dialogue_en: This is Nibelheim. You got some business here?
dialogue_jp:
ここはニブルヘイム
この村に　なんの用だ？

dialogue_en: You're an odd one to come out to the middle of nowhere like this.
dialogue_jp:
こんなところまで旅してくるなんて
物好きだな

dialogue_en: This town is under the jurisdiction of Shinra. It has been converted into a treatment center for mako poisoning.
dialogue_jp:
この村は神羅カンパニーが管理している
魔晄中毒の人たちの
療養所になってるんだ

dialogue_en: If you're here to see a patient, ask a caretaker.
dialogue_jp:
療養者に面会なら
診療棟で聞いてくれ

dialogue_en: It's our job to ensure patients don't wander out.
dialogue_jp:
療養者が村の外に出ないように
見張ってるんだが

dialogue_en: But it's been difficult to keep track of them, what with the recent surge of admissions.
dialogue_jp:
最近は新しく入ってくるヤツも多いし
勝手に抜け出すヤツも多くてな

dialogue_en: Honestly, we're understaffed.
dialogue_jp: 正直　人手が足りてないよ

dialogue_en: An official investigation is underway here. Do what you need to do, then leave.
dialogue_jp:
ニブルヘイムは軍が調査中だ
用が済んだら　すぐに立ち去れ！

dialogue_en: The military has assumed direct control of Nibelheim. Non-residents are asked to limit their stay.
dialogue_jp:
ニブルヘイムは軍の管理下にある
居住者でなければ　長居はするなよ

dialogue_en: Hey there. Let me guess: here to visit someone? This is where they keep the patients who have milder cases.
dialogue_jp:
あれ　お客さん面会ですかい？
ここは軽症の療養者が入ってる棟ですよ

dialogue_en: Usually they don't make too much of a fuss, but something's got them all riled up lately. No idea what, though.
dialogue_jp:
療養のみなさん
いつもはおとなしいんだが
最近　急に暴れ出すようになってね

dialogue_en: Still, there's gotta be a reason for it. They've never acted like this before.
dialogue_jp:
いままでこんなことなかったから
なにかあるんじゃないかと心配でさ

dialogue_en: Anyhow, don't know if you're here for family or a friend, but I'm sure they'll be glad to see you.
dialogue_jp:
ご家族だか　お友達に会っていくなら
しっかり元気づけてやっておくれよ

dialogue_en: The food we serve to our patients is shipped to us from company facilities.
dialogue_jp:
療養所で使う食材は
神羅から定期的に届くんですよ

dialogue_en: The stuff we get isn't bad per se, but we try to make it as appetizing as we can.
dialogue_jp:
魔晄中毒っていったって
料理の味くらいはわかると思うしね

dialogue_en: Their taste buds still work fine, after all.
dialogue_jp:
せめて　美味しいものを
食べさせてあげたいよ

dialogue_en: We allow our patients to walk around─for their health and well-being.
dialogue_jp:
療養者のみなさんには
自由に行動してもらっています

dialogue_en: Please try to give them some space. Many are still uncomfortable with physical contact.
dialogue_jp:
むやみに近づかないでくださいね
他人との接触を
怖がってしまう人もいるんで

dialogue_en: It's reassuring to see them become more active.
dialogue_jp: 最近　みなさん元気がいいんですよ

dialogue_en: Until recently, they used to stand around all day doing nothing.
dialogue_jp:
これまでは１日中じっとしていることが
多かったんですけどね

dialogue_en: They've even started to form actual words. That might be the first real sign of progress.
dialogue_jp:
口にする言葉も
変わったような気がします
回復の兆しだと良いんだけど

dialogue_en: As if our current patients weren't enough to deal with, more sick people keep wandering in from outside the village. Where are they even coming from?
dialogue_jp:
もともと村にいた療養者に加えて
最近は　村の外からも
たくさんの黒マントが来て
居着いてしまってるんです

dialogue_en: Are we seeing some sort of epidemic?
dialogue_jp: 魔晄中毒の人が増えているのかしら

dialogue_en: Not sure what we'll do if this continues. We barely have enough staff as is.
dialogue_jp:
これ以上増えてしまうと
私たちだけじゃ
手に負えないかもしれません

dialogue_en: I'm not entirely sure why, but lately, some of the patients have started talking.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントの人たち　最近ハッキリと
言葉を発するようになったんです

dialogue_en: They all keep saying "reunion" over and over.
dialogue_jp:
『リユニオン』
そう言ってるように聞こえます

dialogue_en: What in the world are they trying to tell us?
dialogue_jp:
いったい　なにを
伝えたいのでしょうか？

dialogue_en: Still no idea what triggers their spasms?
dialogue_jp:
療養者たちの発作の原因は
わかったのか？

dialogue_en: None. The medical team is at a complete loss.
dialogue_jp:
いえ　医療班もまだ
特定できないそうです

dialogue_en: If only we could treat the underlying cause...
dialogue_jp: 原因がわかれば　対処もできるんだがな

dialogue_en: But until we can, just have to hold 'em down.
dialogue_jp:
力まかせに押さえるだけじゃ
体がもたない

dialogue_en: What, for twenty-four hours a day?
dialogue_jp: 昼も夜も気が抜けませんしね

dialogue_en: Maybe we should ask for additional staff.
dialogue_jp:
介護スタッフの増員を
頼んでみましょうか

dialogue_en: I hear they're planning on building a new facility for the patients.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントのための新しい設備を
計画してるらしいぞ

dialogue_en: Whaddaya say we push for a hot spring?
dialogue_jp:
モデオヘイムにあった温泉を
提案してみないか？

dialogue_en: Like the one in Modeoheim? Man, that thing was a little slice of heaven in the heart of a cold hell.
dialogue_jp:
あの現場は寒くて最悪の環境だったけど
源泉かけ流しの温泉だけは
最高だったよな

dialogue_en: If we get a big one, it'll be easier to help the patients in.
dialogue_jp:
広い風呂なら　入浴介助も
やりやすいだろうな

dialogue_en: A long, relaxing soak would be therapeutic for just about anyone.
dialogue_jp:
あったかい湯にゆったり浸かれば
黒マントだって喜ぶに違いない

dialogue_en: Three, two, one─robeman!
dialogue_jp: 黒マントさんが　こ～ろんだ！

dialogue_en: Three, two, one─robeman!
dialogue_jp: 黒マントさんが　こ～ろんだ！

dialogue_en: So those creepy outfits you see all the patients wearing? The company doles 'em out for free.
dialogue_jp:
黒いマントは
魔晄中毒の患者さん向けの
神羅の支給品なんですよ

dialogue_en: Probably to encourage people to keep their distance.
dialogue_jp:
わざと近寄りがたい雰囲気に
してるんですかね？

dialogue_en: They could all use a good scrubbing, if you ask me, but no time for that. Too many patients to look after.
dialogue_jp:
もっとキレイにしてあげたいんですけど
最近は患者さんが増えたんで
手がまわりません

dialogue_en: ...If only I could don a set of robes and just...space out all day...
dialogue_jp:
ああ　オレも黒マントを着て
ずっとボーッとしていたい……

dialogue_en: You know I came up around here, way back in the day.
dialogue_jp: 私　昔のニブルヘイムを知ってるんだよ

dialogue_en: It's strange. None of the buildings look like I remember. And where did all the people who used to live here go?
dialogue_jp:
村の建物もどこか違うようだし
住んでいた人たち
どこへ行っちゃったんだい？

dialogue_en: I keep asking who moved where, but no one will tell me anything.
dialogue_jp:
引っ越し先を聞いても
だれも教えてくれないんだ

dialogue_en: Don't know why, but those robed people really love the veggies from my garden.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントたちは
うちの菜園の野菜が好物なんだよ

dialogue_en: We're doin' what we can to help those guys get back on their feet.
dialogue_jp:
あいつらが　すこしでも回復するように
介護する日々だ

dialogue_en: It's never enough though.
dialogue_jp: 終わりは見えねえけどな

dialogue_en: Gotta lend the medical team a hand today... I can't catch a break!
dialogue_jp:
毎日忙しいな
今日は医療班の手伝いをするんだ

dialogue_en: Should prob'ly get to tidyin' up the rooms while there's still daylight.
dialogue_jp:
日が高いうちに
診察棟の掃除でもしよっと

dialogue_en: Another six months and I'm outta here. Hope I can end on a high note.
dialogue_jp:
オレの任期は　あと半年だ
せいいっぱい働くぜ

dialogue_en: Living out here in the country has done wonders for my health.
dialogue_jp:
ここに来てからは
みんな健康に暮らせているの

dialogue_en: I only just moved here from Midgar, actually.
dialogue_jp:
あたしはミッドガルから
移住してきたのよ

dialogue_en: Wait, am I allowed to say that?
dialogue_jp: あっ　これって秘密だっけ？

dialogue_en: Life is so much more relaxed here. I love it.
dialogue_jp:
ここに来たおかげで
毎日ゆっくり過ごせてる

dialogue_en: If only things could always be so peaceful...
dialogue_jp: この暮らしが　ずっと続けばいいのに

dialogue_en: Being a caretaker isn't easy, but it is rewarding.
dialogue_jp:
介護の仕事はキツイけど
やりがいはあるよ

dialogue_en: I feel so bad for these people. They did nothing to deserve this.
dialogue_jp:
なんにも悪くないのに
あんな状態なんて　かわいそう

dialogue_en: I hope I can help to make their lives a little bit easier.
dialogue_jp:
すこしは人間味のある暮らしを
してもらいたいの

dialogue_en: I actually used to look after these people when I lived in Midgar too.
dialogue_jp:
僕はミッドガルでも　黒マントたちの
お世話をしていたんですよ

dialogue_en: Was only a volunteer back then, but now I get paid a decent salary. Lucky me, huh?
dialogue_jp:
あの頃はボランティアだったんですけど
ここじゃ給料がもらえるんで
報われてます

dialogue_en: Best part is: there isn't a single thing to do around here.
dialogue_jp:
ほら　ここって
遊ぶ場所もないでしょ？

dialogue_en: Which means all that gil goes straight into savings. I'm gonna be rich!
dialogue_jp:
ほぼ貯金にまわせるから
帰る頃には潤っちゃいますね

dialogue_en: Be gentle, now. Isn't she nice and soft? Makes you feel fuzzy on the inside too, huh?
dialogue_jp:
優しく撫でてあげてね
ネコちゃんに触るとほっこりするわよね

dialogue_en: Do you know what that purring means? It means that she's happy. She's saying, "Thank you for the pets!"
dialogue_jp:
ネコがゴロゴロいってるでしょ？
喜んでるんだよ　ありがとうってね

dialogue_en: All we do is bend over backwards for these people, and what do we get? Grunts.
dialogue_jp:
あいつらって
優しく話しかけても反応ないし
やる気なくなっちゃうな

dialogue_en: What did you expect? They're mako poisoned. Just hang in there until your term's up, okay?
dialogue_jp:
魔晄中毒なんだから仕方ないって
任期が終わるまで我慢しようぜ

dialogue_en: I know, I know. They can't survive without us looking after them, but...
dialogue_jp:
誰かが面倒みてあげないと
生きられないことは
わかっちゃいるんだけど

dialogue_en: Hey, I get it. Like, why even bother, right?
dialogue_jp:
なんのために生かしてるんだ
っていう話だよな

dialogue_en: To be honest, sometimes I wonder if it'd be kinder to just put them out of their misery.
dialogue_jp:
いっそのこと楽にしてやったら
幸せなんじゃないかとか考えちゃうよ

dialogue_en: Careful out there. Fiends've started coming down off the mountain.
dialogue_jp:
ニブル山のモンスターが
このあたりまで降りてくるから
気をつけろよ

dialogue_en: The patients're all worked up.
dialogue_jp: 黒マントたちがおびえてる

dialogue_en: I'm thinkin' we might have monster trouble today...
dialogue_jp:
こんな日は
モンスターも増える気がするんだ

dialogue_en: We keep watch to make sure the patients don't wander off into the wilderness.
dialogue_jp:
村の外に
黒マントたちが出ていかないように
見張ってるんです

dialogue_en: Are you heading out? Then be careful. We won't be able to come to the rescue if anything should happen to you.
dialogue_jp:
外に出るなら　お気をつけて
村の外でなにかあっても
助けには行けませんから

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: なんだ？

dialogue_en: The area around the reactor is currently under investigation. So steer clear.
dialogue_jp:
ニブル魔晄炉周辺は軍が調査中だ
面倒を起こすなよ

dialogue_en: Guess this is where they keep all those black-robed freaks.
dialogue_jp:
この村は
黒マントの収容所になってるんだな

dialogue_en: ...A fact I'm gonna forget the minute I'm gone. I'm here to do a job─and not to talk about it.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　見なかったことにするけどよ
俺たちは言われた仕事を片付けるだけだ

dialogue_en: The services we provide here are strictly for the benefit of our residents.
dialogue_jp:
ここでは居住者の生活全般の
サポートをおこなっております

dialogue_en: Unfortunately, we're not in a position to assist travelers.
dialogue_jp:
すみませんが
旅の方のお役には立てないかと

dialogue_en: I'm going to have to ask you to leave.
dialogue_jp: お引き取りをお願いいたします

dialogue_en: Ugh, c'mon... Can't they speed it up a little?
dialogue_jp:
窓口の対応は
相変わらずノロいな……

dialogue_en: Someone needs to clean up all those fiend carcasses.
dialogue_jp:
モンスターの死骸の片付けを
頼みたくてね

dialogue_en: Everything's going extra slow because Nick's away on some business trip.
dialogue_jp:
入植管理者のフォーリーさんが
出張中らしくて　話が通じないよ

dialogue_en: I hate that we need Midgar's approval for every little thing.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルの偉い人が動かないと
お手上げよね

dialogue_en: Head office is in turmoil, so requests are being processed slower than usual.
dialogue_jp:
本社がゴタついてるらしくて
対応がいつも以上に遅いわ

dialogue_en: I was hoping to shorten my tenure here, but I guess that's not in the cards.
dialogue_jp:
任期短縮の相談したいんだけど
相手にしてもらえないのよ

dialogue_en: My mom needs to move in with me. I know you allow that for immediate family.
dialogue_jp:
故郷の母を呼び寄せたいんだ
身内は同居していいんでしょ？

dialogue_en: Like I told you before, by the time we've finished running her mandatory background check, your term here will already be up.
dialogue_jp:
ですから　途中増員の審査には
時間がかかりまして　結果が出る頃には
あなたの任期も満了です

dialogue_en: Then can I at least get an advance on my salary so I can send her the gil she needs?
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　報酬を前借りさせてよ
せめて仕送りしなきゃ

dialogue_en: All contracts are paid out at the end of term. I can offer you a loan, but...
dialogue_jp:
いえ　任期満了時という決まりです
融資なら対応できますが……

dialogue_en: He seems to like it here for some reason.
dialogue_jp: 彼は　ここが好きみたいなんです

dialogue_en: It's almost like he's...trying to work? Maybe he had a similar job in the past.
dialogue_jp:
働いてるつもりのようで
昔のこと　思い出してるんでしょうか

dialogue_en: This area's off-limits to civilians! This is the deputy commissioner's office. You're definitely not allowed back here!
dialogue_jp:
いけません　部外者がこんな所まで！
ここはムラサキ課長の執務室です

dialogue_en: Actually...you know what? I'll just pretend I didn't see anything. That way I can go home on time!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　でも見なかったことにします
定時退社がかかってるんで

dialogue_en: No one here but us Shinra employees. No siree Bob!
dialogue_jp:
見えてない
な～んにも見えてないですよ

dialogue_en: Please, you really need to leave before I get in trouble.
dialogue_jp: だから　どうか早々にお引き取りを

dialogue_en: Just finishing up for the day! Not breaking any rules!
dialogue_jp: さあ　今日中に仕事を片付けるぞ～！

dialogue_en: We've been informed that Mr. Murasaki was killed during some kind of incident...
dialogue_jp:
ムラサキ課長
事件に巻き込まれて殉職されたそうです

dialogue_en: He was such a good boss too... I'll miss him.
dialogue_jp:
面倒見のいい方だったのに
残念です

dialogue_en: Sometimes you can hear a woman's voice coming from the manor...
dialogue_jp:
神羅屋敷から
女の声が聞こえるんだってさ

dialogue_en: It's the ghost of someone who used to live there a long time ago.
dialogue_jp:
むかし住んでた女の幽霊じゃないかって
噂になってる

dialogue_en: Ghosts. Great. And to think this town used to be so peaceful...
dialogue_jp:
静かな村だったのに
最近　おかしなことばかり起こるよね

dialogue_en: Apparently there's this horrible curse on the place too.
dialogue_jp: あの屋敷は呪われてるって噂もあるよな

dialogue_en: According to legend, the land of the dead is just beyond Mt. Nibel.
dialogue_jp:
ニブル山の先は
死の国だって伝承もあるのよね？

dialogue_en: Wait─maybe that means the mansion was, like, built on the gates of hell or something! Oh god!
dialogue_jp:
もしかして変な所と繋がってるのかな
ああ　怖い！

dialogue_en: Have you guys heard any voices from Shinra Manor lately?
dialogue_jp:
神羅屋敷の女の声が
聞こえなくなったらしい

dialogue_en: No, actually... Maybe the supervisor dealt with it?
dialogue_jp:
管理人さんが
なにか対応してくれたのかな

dialogue_en: I guess we'll never know the truth behind those rumors now, huh?
dialogue_jp: あの屋敷の噂は　謎のままか

dialogue_en: Honestly? That is fine by me.
dialogue_jp: うん　でも近寄ると危ない

dialogue_en: I get the feeling that this town has a lot of weird, creepy mysteries that are better off forgotten.
dialogue_jp:
この村には　いくつも不思議があるけど
触れちゃいけない領域なんだと思うな

dialogue_en: You certainly don't look ill. Passing through, I take it?
dialogue_jp:
旅の方ですか？
急患ではないですよね

dialogue_en: If you are feeling unwell, though, you'll have to wait. We need to tend to our current patients first.
dialogue_jp:
具合が悪いなら　療養者の定期健診が
終わった後からの対応となります

dialogue_en: This is where we care for the patients. We provide checkups, treatments─whatever they need.
dialogue_jp:
ここは診療棟です
療養者の診察と治療をおこなっています

dialogue_en: If you're here to visit someone, I'm afraid you'll have to track them down yourself. We're a bit busy.
dialogue_jp:
療養者への面会なら
申し訳ないですが　直接探してください

dialogue_en: We've been dealing with so many new patients lately. It's impossible to keep tabs on everyone at all times.
dialogue_jp:
最近　療養者が増えてまして
日中の活動場所まで
把握できてないんですよ

dialogue_en: Oh, welcome. I'm afraid the staff is on break at the moment.
dialogue_jp:
ここは診療棟ですが
いまは　休憩時間です

dialogue_en: If you're looking for Christine, she's upstairs.
dialogue_jp:
料理長のダーエさんなら
２階にいますよ

dialogue_en: Don't worry. It'll all be over soon.
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫よ　ちょっと我慢してね～

dialogue_en: Just the same thing we did yesterday.
dialogue_jp: 昨日と同じよ　安心してね

dialogue_en: There, all done. Take care!
dialogue_jp:
はい　ご苦労さま
お大事に

dialogue_en: You're good to go. See you tomorrow!
dialogue_jp:
はい　異常なし
また明日

dialogue_en: Alright, the doctor will see you now.
dialogue_jp: はい　先生の前にどうぞ

dialogue_en: It'll be okay.
dialogue_jp: 怖くないですよ

dialogue_en: This room is for patients in critical condition.
dialogue_jp:
お引き取りください
重症者の部屋です

dialogue_en: Please just let them rest. They don't have much longer as it is.
dialogue_jp:
もう　長くはなさそうなんです
そっとしてあげてください

dialogue_en: You might've noticed how some of our patients have number tattoos on their arms.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントの人たちの腕には
イレズミでナンバーが彫られてるんです

dialogue_en: I'm not sure why that is, myself. Maybe it's to mark ones with different symptoms?
dialogue_jp:
でも　ナンバーがない人もいて
症状にも違いがあるのかもしれません

dialogue_en: You'd think someone would brief us on these things, considering we're the ones who actually have to look after them.
dialogue_jp:
私たち医療班が日々観察していくことで
なにかがわかればいいんですけど

dialogue_en: Oh, uh, h-hello! Sorry, but we're busy trying to make food for all the patients.
dialogue_jp:
わわっ　ここは療養者のみなさんの
お食事をまかなう調理棟です

dialogue_en: A whole bunch of those robed people just showed up out of nowhere. We've been struggling to keep up ever since!
dialogue_jp:
最近　外から来て
居着いてしまう黒マントが多くて
やりくりが大変なんですよ

dialogue_en: Oh─don't you worry, though! We're still making sure all our patients get three square meals a day.
dialogue_jp:
でも　創意と工夫を重ねて
１日３食しっかり提供しています！

dialogue_en: Oh─if it's Christine you're after, she's out delivering lunches.
dialogue_jp:
あっ　ダーエさんなら
診療棟にお弁当を届けに行ってますよ

dialogue_en: I just love our head chef. She always keeps things interesting around here!
dialogue_jp:
料理長のおかげで
毎日楽しく仕事できています！

dialogue_en: Seriously. I hope I can learn to be as coolheaded as her someday.
dialogue_jp:
わたしも料理長みたいに
いつでもどこでもおおらかにありたいわ

dialogue_en: You used to live here a long time ago, right? We'd appreciate it if you didn't cause us any trouble.
dialogue_jp:
あんた　ここにむかし住んでた人だろ？
面倒は起こさないでおくれよ

dialogue_en: Fine, if you're that desperate to buy something...
dialogue_jp: ふん　まあ欲しけりゃ売ってやるよ

dialogue_en: It's nothing personal, but...you shouldn't come back.
dialogue_jp: 言いたかないけど　もう来ないでほしいね

dialogue_en: This isn't your home anymore. Remember that, alright?
dialogue_jp:
あんたの故郷は　もうないよ
忘れるほうがいい

dialogue_en: She must've loved going shopping when she was well.
dialogue_jp:
この人は　きっと
買い物好きだったんでしょうね

dialogue_en: Maybe not for herself, but for others. Buying little trinkets and gifts for her family, or a partner.
dialogue_jp:
家族か　恋人か……
誰かのために買い物をしていた日々を
思い出してるのかな

dialogue_en: You're Shinra?
dialogue_jp: しんら～？

dialogue_en: Chinra?
dialogue_jp: ちんら～？

dialogue_en: You're so cool!
dialogue_jp: カッコイー！

dialogue_en: You so cool!
dialogue_jp: カッキー！

dialogue_en: You a SOLDIER?
dialogue_jp: ソルジャ？

dialogue_en: You a shoulder?
dialogue_jp: そるざ？

dialogue_en: You gonna fix those robe folks?
dialogue_jp: 黒マント　なおすの？

dialogue_en: You gonna fix 'em?
dialogue_jp: なおすの？

dialogue_en: Welcome. Would you like a room?
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃいませ　休憩されますか？

dialogue_en: Safe travels.
dialogue_jp: 良い旅を

dialogue_en: What's with this place? People in black robes everywhere you look.
dialogue_jp:
なんだよ　この村
どこも黒マントだらけだな

dialogue_en: Need to focus on tomorrow's survey.
dialogue_jp: 明日は魔晄炉調査なんだ

dialogue_en: The reactor here's one of the oldest models, I think. Never thought I'd get to see it for myself.
dialogue_jp:
ここの魔晄炉って初期型だろ？
まさかこの目で見れる日が来るなんてな

dialogue_en: Wutai wouldn't fight us over a backwater like this, right?
dialogue_jp: ウータイとの戦争　始まるのかな

dialogue_en: I understand this is supposed to be a form of physical therapy, but they really seem to be struggling with it.
dialogue_jp:
療養者のリハビリのための運動なんだが
なかなか　できるようにならなくてね

dialogue_en: Some martial artist named Zangan came up with this exercise.
dialogue_jp:
ザンガンっていう武闘家が
考案した体操らしいです

dialogue_en: That's what everyone tells me, at least.
dialogue_jp: くわしい由来は知りませんけど

dialogue_en: The reactor is off-limits.
dialogue_jp: ニブル魔晄炉は封鎖中だ

dialogue_en: You want to be arrested? Beat it!
dialogue_jp: なにしに来た　捕まりたいのか？

dialogue_en: You're in Shinra territory now.
dialogue_jp: ここは神羅の管理区域ですよ

dialogue_en: Ocean feels a lot bigger when your family's waiting on the other side.
dialogue_jp:
はあ……
海を泳いで故郷に帰れればな

dialogue_en: I'll take shipping duty any day over looking after our patients.
dialogue_jp:
村で黒マントの世話をするより
ここの業務のほうが気が楽だよ

dialogue_en: You never know what the tide'll bring in─or who.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントの人たちも
たまにこの港に流れ着くの

dialogue_en: Don't bother checking the warehouses. Everything's already been shipped.
dialogue_jp:
倉庫は空よ
もう村に運んじゃったから

dialogue_en: Is it just me or have the shipments been dropping in quality lately?
dialogue_jp:
神羅の定期便
だんだん質が下がってる気がするのよね
